NK103(pe)001:1: // a b+hi shi ny+tsa s+ya d+h+aa tu ti sma ////
NK103(pe)001:4: sarba d+harma tsit+ta dz+ny+aa na r+aa dza sid+d+hi b+ha k+sham tsar+ya a b+h+yi shiny+tsa ya /
NK103(pe)001:6: gzhi lam gyi chos brjod bya thams cad ngo bo
NK103(pe)001:7: tha dad min thabs kyis der ston 'bras bu lhun
NK103(pe)001:8: gyis grub pa'i sems nyid rang byung gi ye shes
NK103(pe)001:9: kyi gzhi lam 'bras bu gsum 'phags pas rgyal po
NK103(pe)001:10: rjod par byed pa'i tshul dngos grub gnyis 'og ma
NK103(pe)001:11: ltar thabs gzhan las ma byung bas rang byung du
NK103(pe)001:12: bdag dang dbyer med du rtogs nas nyams su len
NK103(pe)001:13: pas spyod par bcos ma'am rnal ma'i sgo nas sam
NK103(pe)001:14: 'phrul gyi lung bcu dbang bskur ba /
NK103(pe)001:15: chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems rang rig pa'i
NK103(pe)001:16: khyad par 'phags pas rgyal po nyid thams cad kyi
NK103(pe)001:17: ngo bor shar bas kun gsal ba'i //
NK103(pe)001:18: don de bla ma'i thabs kyis rig nas snod du
NK103(pe)001:19: dran zhing rig pa thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyi
NK103(pe)001:20: ror ma gyur pa med cing rnyog pa dang bral
NK103(pe)001:21: bas mchog / bdag don gyi mdzad pa /
NK103(pe)001:22: des na bsgom bya dang sgom byed gnyis bdag nyid
NK103(pe)001:23: du rtogs pa nyid rang byung gi ye shes chos
NK103(pe)001:24: kyi skur gsal ba'i gzhan don //
NK103(pe)001:25: de ltar chos ma lus pa bdag nyid skye med
NK103(pe)001:26: du gsal bas 'gro don bya mi dgos te rdo
NK103(pe)001:27: rje gsum gyis 'bad rtsol med par shugs kyis 'grub
NK103(pe)001:28: bo // dpe skal ldan rnams kyi 'dod pa skong
NK103(pe)001:29: ba'i yid sbyin gyi nor bu dam pa rnams kyi
NK103(pe)001:31: rang gi rig pa la che ba'i yon tan gyi
NK103(pe)001:32: gter chen ro gsum dus gcig tu myong bas mu
NK103(pe)001:33: kha'i gdong // mthar phyin pa de'i tshad ni gzung
NK103(pe)001:34: ba las 'das pa'i sku gsung thugs te nam mkha'
NK103(pe)001:35: kha'i gdong // lta bu'o // skabs 'dir don ji
NK103(pe)001:36: ltar mdzad na thun mong gi theg pa rnams thabs
NK103(pe)001:37: yin kyang rgyal po min la 'dir /
NK103(pe)001:38: thabs kyi rgyal por yin te zil gyis gnon pa dang /
NK103(pe)001:39: rtsol ba med pas kun grub pa dang /
NK103(pe)001:40: bcos ma thams cad rnal ma'i khongs su gnas pa'i phyir ro //
NK103(pe)001:42: ni che chung gis gnyis yin te de nyid bstan
NK103(pe)001:43: pa'i yang yin la bcud kyang yin pas de mnga'
NK103(pe)001:45: gsang ba'i bdag po sems dpa' rdo rje 'gro ba
NK103(pe)001:46: thams cad kyi yid kyi gcig tu mdzad nas de
NK103(pe)001:47: nyid kyang skye med du rtogs pa'i bdag nyid des
NK103(pe)001:48: dbang la brten nas ci mdzad na //
NK103(pe)001:49: 'gro ba dbang gnyis kyis nyid kyi thugs su dbyer med par smin par byed de //
NK103(pe)001:50: gang la dgongs na dus 'grel pa na gcig po
NK103(pe)001:51: 'di med tha ma'i snyigs ma lnga bdo ba'i sems
NK103(pe)001:53: gsang ba gsum las byung zhing gnas pas gsang ba'i
NK103(pe)001:54: rdo rje mtha' dag gi gter 'chad bar so sor
NK103(pe)001:55: dbang bskur thob pa ste yon tan du ma'i bdag
NK103(pe)001:57: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa gsum dang gnyis la lnga ste /
NK103(pe)001:58: sku bzhugs pa'i zhal dkon pa'i /
NK103(pe)001:59: tshig tu bsdus te gnas pa'i /
NK103(pe)001:60: mngon par rtogs shing sgrub pa'i /
NK103(pe)001:61: snyigs ma dang 'brel ba'i dus so //
NK103(pe)001:63: dus su rgyud nyon mongs pa drag pas gdul dka' ba dang /
NK103(pe)001:64: tshe thung la mos chung tshegs chung bas don mtha'
NK103(pe)001:65: dag rtogs par 'dod pa de gang gis 'dul na
NK103(pe)001:66: bas // 'di'i dbang thabs ni 'phrul tshig gi sgra ste gcig /
NK103(pe)001:67: rtogs pas theg pa'i don kun gyi lam 'bras rdzogs par rtogs pa'i bdag /
NK103(pe)001:68: lung gsum po thams cad bya bral rdzogs pa gcig
NK103(pe)001:69: pur 'dus par rtogs te dgongs pa rim par brgyud
NK103(pe)001:70: pa yi // dgu rum rgyal ba kun gyi thugs la brnag cing sbas pa sems kyi gter //
NK103(pe)001:71: 'di ma rtogs na theg pa gzhan gyis mi rtogs pa ni /
NK103(pe)001:72: long ba u lu pra sha kas //
NK103(pe)001:73: yan lag med pas lam du 'jug cing spyod lam
NK103(pe)001:74: yangs par spyad pa'i nyams med pa ltar du 'di
NK103(pe)001:75: ma rtogs pas // yid smon lam can gyi theg
NK103(pe)001:76: pa brgyad lam 'bras kyis rjes su zhen cing chags
NK103(pe)001:78: don phyogs med tshig dang bral ba ni tshig mtha'
NK103(pe)001:79: can gyi rkyen gyis brjod pa'i yul min pas mi
NK103(pe)001:80: rtogs kyang // rgyal po me long gi gdong pa can /
NK103(pe)001:81: 'phrul gyi khang pa na me long sgo dgu la bltas pa bzhin //
NK103(pe)001:82: don ji ltar bltas kyang rtog med rang byung snying
NK103(pe)001:83: po mthong ba'i lam dang las gzhan med par ngo
NK103(pe)001:84: sprad // de rtogs pa'i don sgom pa la yengs ma yengs kyi re dogs med pas sgom /
NK103(pe)001:85: med don gyi gzer chen gdab //
NK103(pe)001:86: sangs rgyas gzhan na med pas bgrod pa'i yul med
NK103(pe)001:87: rtog pa nyid ye shes gsal bas rtog pa'i 'jim
NK103(pe)001:88: rdzab las bsgral // tshig gi brjod pa'i lam chad
NK103(pe)001:89: de gtan la mi phebs kyang ye shes sgron ma'i
NK103(pe)001:90: thabs dang man ngag 'di sa ston to //
NK103(pe)001:91: ma h+aa de was bish+nu tsakra la drag po e'i ling+ga'i nang du sngags /
NK103(pe)001:93: phyag mtshan gyi dbang bskur bas /
NK103(pe)001:94: mi mthun pa dus gcig la bcom nas rang gi rigs su bltas pa bzhin te //
NK103(pe)001:95: don rdo rje de tshig lam gyi thabs kyis sems
NK103(pe)001:96: kyi sgo 'byed pa lde mig ste lhun grub gsum
NK103(pe)001:97: 'byed pa'o // 'phrul mig man ngag 'di gcig nas
NK103(pe)001:98: gcig tu brgyud pa'i zam pa ma chad pa'i lo
NK103(pe)001:99: 'byed pa'o // rgyus ni par // bka' ji ltar
NK103(pe)001:100: thob na dbang po lha yi drin gyis sum cu
NK103(pe)001:102: de ru lhungs nas 'dzam bu gling du snod ldan gyi don du babs //
NK103(pe)001:103: lag na rdo rje nyid kyis mngon sum du dga' rab la dbang bskur te //
NK103(pe)001:104: yun dus mtha' 'i skad cig nyid kyis 'bras bu rgyal ba'i sa la bkod //
NK103(pe)001:105: man ngag gi mtshan 'phrul mig brgyud pa'i rdo rje zam pa yin no //
NK103(pe)001:106: gnas tshul rang byung lhun grub de rnal ma'i dbang
NK103(pe)001:107: gis bde ba chen po'i don nyams su myong pa'i
NK103(pe)001:108: ngang // 'dod pa'i don kun gzhan nas thob par re ba med //
NK103(pe)001:109: de tshul gang gis she na /
NK103(pe)001:110: yon tan thams cad kyi rtsa ba rang sems dag par rtog pa la //
NK103(pe)001:111: sngags kyi theg pa ltar lha'i bzhugs gnas kyi man+dala dkyil 'khor bskyed pa med do //
NK103(pe)001:112: chos thams cad rang byung ye shes skye med kyi 'od rang gsal ba de la //
NK103(pe)001:113: rtsol bas lta ba'i theg pa brgyad po rtog pa las 'das te mi gnas pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:114: rang gi sems nyid du thams cad gcig pas phyogs
NK103(pe)001:115: ris med pa'i phyag rgyar 'dus shing gsal ba ni
NK103(pe)001:116: // 'og ma ltar phyogs 'dzin gyi bsam brjod dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni mchog ces bya'o //
NK103(pe)001:117: thams cad du snang yang rig pa las mi 'gyur
NK103(pe)001:118: bas bskyed du byar med pas ni mchog gi dngos
NK103(pe)001:119: grub ste // de cis she na 'jig rten las
NK103(pe)001:120: 'das pa kun mkhyen gyi go 'phang dang 'jig rten
NK103(pe)001:121: grub ste // pa'i // mig rnon la sogs pa
NK103(pe)001:122: thun mong gi dngos grub ji snyed pa chos rnams
NK103(pe)001:124: sems nyid ji lta bar rtogs pa la rdzogs te rang bzhin gyis lhun gyis grub bo //
NK103(pe)001:125: rtogs pa dbang du bstan pa /
NK103(pe)001:126: dngos po'i chos thams cad rang byung rgyal por bdag
NK103(pe)001:127: nyid ye dbang thob cing snang srid rang dbang du
NK103(pe)001:129: thun mong dbang bskur ba la zhen pa'i cha gnyis las grol bas mi rtog kyang //
NK103(pe)001:131: snang srid dran rtog brda la don ni lhun grub
NK103(pe)001:132: gsum ste de nyid kyang dgrol ba'i don brda tshig
NK103(pe)001:133: dbang gi man ngag bstan pa ni sbyin pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:134: de ltar gyur cing nyams su myongs pas re dogs
NK103(pe)001:135: med pa'i sems gang la na 'og nas ston pa'i
NK103(pe)001:137: dbang des rtogs na spyod yul rang grol ba'i ting
NK103(pe)001:138: nge 'dzin la 'byung 'jug med pa'i dbyings la rtog
NK103(pe)001:139: pa rang sar grol bas thim mo //
NK103(pe)001:140: dbang po 'bring gis yan mi thub pas don rtag
NK103(pe)001:141: tu dran pa rkyen gyi dus gsum bar ma la
NK103(pe)001:143: rig pa dran rtog ni snyigs ma'i rlung gi g.yo bas spar nas //
NK103(pe)001:144: 'dzin med rdzogs chen gyi ngang la mi gnas la //
NK103(pe)001:145: g.yo 'dzin rlung gi man ngag 'og nas 'byung ba ltar sbyin par bya'o //
NK103(pe)001:146: rtog pa'i rlung gis ting nge 'dzin dran pa la bskyod cing //
NK103(pe)001:147: mtshan ma yul stug pa'i spros pas 'chel ba la //
NK103(pe)001:148: thun mong ma yin pa bde ba chen po thig le'i man ngag ji ltar 'tsham par sbyin //
NK103(pe)001:149: sems kyi rnam grangs rtog pa can dang mtshan ma can la sogs pa gang dang gang //
NK103(pe)001:150: bcos ma'i thabs mtha' yas pa de dang de yi rjes su mthun par //
NK103(pe)001:151: rdo rje zam pa'i brgyud pa ma chad pa'i //
NK103(pe)001:152: bla ma rin chen srog 'gyur des //
NK103(pe)001:153: blo dang 'tshal tshad de bstan pa de'i sgo nas gter kha dbye //
NK103(pe)001:154: de nyid 'dir 'jug pa'i sgo kun phye ba yin //
NK103(pe)001:155: dbyig gi rdzas dang phrad pa yin //
NK103(pe)001:156: dper na lha sprul pa brgya byin gyi spyi bo
NK103(pe)001:157: yi gtsug gi nor bu mis ma mthong bar yod
NK103(pe)001:158: pa de la // man+dala brtsegs pa'i sgo bzhi yod de //
NK103(pe)001:159: de gang phye'ang nor bu de nyid yod pas mchod na yon tan che chung du thob par 'gyur //
NK103(pe)001:160: spyi blugs kyi dbang 'di ni thabs rgyal rin chen de //
NK103(pe)001:161: rtogs pa'i dus na 'bad rtsol dang bral ba'i dngos grub thob pa yin //
NK103(pe)001:162: rgyu 'bras med pa'i mthar phyin lhun grub yin //
NK103(pe)001:163: sngags bzlas pa dang tshig brjod pa dang bral ba'i nus mthu yin //
NK103(pe)001:164: nyams tha snyad bral ba'i don rig pas mtshon pa yin //
NK103(pe)001:165: las bzhi'i rtsol ba dang bral ba'i dngos grub yin //
NK103(pe)001:166: nyams kyi snang srid 'ching ba dang bral te bde chen ston pas lta ba yin //
NK103(pe)001:167: gang spyad kyang tshangs pa chen po las 'da' ba med pas dam tshig yin //
NK103(pe)001:168: tha mal gyi rtog pa dang phyogs 'dzin spangs pas sangs rgyas yin //
NK103(pe)001:169: thabs kyis thams cad la spong len med par rol
NK103(pe)001:170: pas 'khor ba'ang ma spangs te re dogs chod pa
NK103(pe)001:171: yin // phyogs gcig pa min pas theg pa'i rim pa ma lus dang //
NK103(pe)001:172: bskyed du byar med pas rgyal ba'i thugs bcud dngos gang yin //
NK103(pe)001:173: ji ltar snang ba thams cad ro gcig pas dngos po kun gyi bdag nyid do //
NK103(pe)001:174: de'i tshe na bstan pa'i phyir /
NK103(pe)001:175: 'di ni rgyal ba thams cad kyi //
NK103(pe)001:176: thugs kyi brnag pa dam pa'i thabs //
NK103(pe)001:177: gcig tu 'dus pa'i bde chen yin //
NK103(pe)001:178: 'di la ngos bzung gang yang med do //
NK103(pe)001:179: tshangs pa chen po rtogs nas ting nge 'dzin sems kyi rim btsal med //
NK103(pe)001:180: lus dang ngag gi bya btsal med //
NK103(pe)001:181: gang la dmigs kyang rnam bral med //
NK103(pe)001:182: bdag gzhan du snang yang gnyis snang bral //
NK103(pe)001:184: gnas dang ldan yang rten pa med //
NK103(pe)001:185: yul du snang yang 'gag pa med //
NK103(pe)001:186: longs spyod ldan yang chags med cing //
NK103(pe)001:187: rig pa dang dran rtog ci skyes pa tshangs pa
NK103(pe)001:188: chen por gsal bas ma spangs par bral bas bde
NK103(pe)001:190: de nyid kyi phyir 'di ni rdo rje lam mchog ste //
NK103(pe)001:191: skal ldan 'bad pa med pas grol //
NK103(pe)001:192: rgyal bu rgyal thabs thob pa dang 'dra ba ni dape'o //
NK103(pe)001:193: don sems kyi rin chen dbang //
NK103(pe)001:194: spyi bo'i bcud kyis lus kun la khyab pa ltar
NK103(pe)001:195: rig pa spyi blugs su shar bas spyi blugs tshangs
NK103(pe)001:197: bskur tshul 'bras bu dang bcas pa sems nyid rin chen dbang gis dngos po gcig gis rtogs na //
NK103(pe)001:198: theg pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba med par rdzogs par sbyin par byas pas //
NK103(pe)001:199: snang srid bde bar shar bas phrag brgya'i dbang thob ste //
NK103(pe)001:200: zhing khams bde ba dang stong pa gnyi ga'ang bde bar ma btsal bar longs spyod //
NK103(pe)001:201: brkam chags nyon mongs pa lnga snying gi pad+ma yi man ngag gi sbyor ba yis //
NK103(pe)001:202: rang 'dod pa ji ltar mos pa ltar 'i dngos grub stsol te 'byung ngo //
NK103(pe)001:203: 'og ma'i gdams ngag spong len dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis //
NK103(pe)001:204: thob tu re ma thob tu dogs 'bras bu dngos dang bcas pa des nar mi son te //
NK103(pe)001:205: thob pa'i 'bras bu rang la gnas pa las ma yin te gzhan du btsal yang na //
NK103(pe)001:206: rtogs nas grol ba'i 'bras bu rang las byung gi gzhan las 'byung ba min no //
NK103(pe)001:207: spyir gang 'dod pa la mos pa'i 'bras bu rgyu rkyen las byung ba can //
NK103(pe)001:208: rang rang gi ston pa'i bka' dang rang rang gi
NK103(pe)001:209: rtags dang gdams pa dang bden pa'i tshig gi dbang
NK103(pe)001:210: bskur ba na kaste bcos ma spyir bstan no //
NK103(pe)001:211: nub pa brtan pas nga gargyal du 'dzin pa'i dbang thob ste goms shing brtan pas //
NK103(pe)001:212: de ltar brtan pa'i 'bras bu dgra cabcom pa'i sa la'ang 'jug par nus so //
NK103(pe)001:213: yul 'dzin nga pa'i dbang shes drug dang bral ba'i ye shes la //
NK103(pe)001:214: bden bzhi la kun 'byung sdug bsngal je phra la
NK103(pe)001:215: lam goms pas 'khor ba'i rgyu 'bras 'gog par gsal
NK103(pe)001:217: srog rtog pa khaphyi nang du rgyu zhing rtog pa
NK103(pe)001:218: 'phel ba'i las kyi byed pa snyigs ma'i rlung nang
NK103(pe)001:220: dper na chu gzar 'bab pa'i thigs pa myur ba ste bgrang ba'i grangs kyis gzung ba'am //
NK103(pe)001:221: de las su rung bas rgyu ba dang rtog pa
NK103(pe)001:222: chad pa ni rlung gis bskyood pa'i smig rgyu lta
NK103(pe)001:223: bu'am // rlung yid la thim rtog pa mi rtog
NK103(pe)001:224: pa la thim pa ni rgya mtsho'i chu la chu
NK103(pe)001:225: bu'am // yi tsh+was // bskus shing thim pa'i dpe de'o //
NK103(pe)001:226: don zhi gnas lhag mthong 'brel par sbyar ba la //
NK103(pe)001:227: zhag rab ni zab ste drug dang nyis 'gyur 'bring
NK103(pe)001:228: bcu gnyis dang sum 'gyur tha ma bco brgyad gyis
NK103(pe)001:229: // thabs de dag gis bden pa chagtan la phebs par 'gyur te //
NK103(pe)001:230: dang po nas bzung ste bden pa bzhi la lam rim gyis 'jug par sbyar bar bya'o //
NK103(pe)001:231: gzhan snod bcud nyayul dang bcas pa'ang de bzhin du gsal bar bya //
NK103(pe)001:232: tshor ba jasdug bsngal na ba'i rgyun la bsgom par bya rang la goms nas //
NK103(pe)001:233: rang rgyal rten 'brel lugs 'byung la yid mu stegs
NK103(pe)001:234: tha mal 'khor ba la brtan par 'dzin pa de'ang
NK103(pe)001:235: lugs zlog gis bzlog pa yin //
NK103(pe)001:236: mu stegs kyi bdag 'dzin gyis stong par 'dzin pa nyid dmigs pa dngos po yin no //
NK103(pe)001:237: nga rgyal ma rig pa khong stong la ched du 'dzin pa'ang de nyid dang 'dra ba yin te //
NK103(pe)001:238: bdag med pa ni dmigs pa dang bral ba yin bas so //
NK103(pe)001:239: de dag las su rung nas nas phul re rim
NK103(pe)001:240: gyis re re phri ste 'bru zad nas 'o ma
NK103(pe)001:241: la brten tha ma kha zas dang zag pa bral
NK103(pe)001:242: bar byas te // de grub pa'i tshad ni zla ba gong bzhin sum 'gyur tshun chad do //
NK103(pe)001:243: kham gyi zas dang bral te zag pa zad nas
NK103(pe)001:244: sems yul la mi 'phro bar dbugs kyi dgang ste
NK103(pe)001:246: de'i tshad dbugs nang du gzung ba dang de lte
NK103(pe)001:247: ba'i thad kar gzung sems su rtse gcig tu gzung
NK103(pe)001:248: ba dang bcas // lo gcig bar gyis 'dres par dgang //
NK103(pe)001:249: ba la goms pa brtan nas dbugs kyi rgyu ba'ang de nas zad //
NK103(pe)001:250: de chad par gyur pas sems kyi 'dzin pa dang rtog pa'ang de nas mi gnas par nyams //
NK103(pe)001:251: par gyur de nas 'bras bu bzhi la gnas so //
NK103(pe)001:252: blo che bas dus ring zhig dang bral na gang
NK103(pe)001:253: rung la rkyen gyis rgyal thabs kyi dbang bskur du
NK103(pe)001:254: rung ba'o // gang zag gang gis na byang 'bras bu /
NK103(pe)001:255: chub kyi ming rgyu la btags pa ste gzhan gyi
NK103(pe)001:256: don bya bar sems dpa' 'i blo ldan gyis 'jug
NK103(pe)001:257: / dam tshig rang rgyud pa'i sgo gsum 'dul zhing
NK103(pe)001:258: bya ba ma yin ba'i cha sdom zhing 'da' bar
NK103(pe)001:259: dka' ba la gnas pa'i dam tshig nos te //
NK103(pe)001:260: mthun snang kun rdzob rang gi 'dod pa skyon med
NK103(pe)001:261: pa don dam ste bden gnyis ngos bzung med cing
NK103(pe)001:262: mi rtog par rtogs pas don la 'jug pa'i lam
NK103(pe)001:263: brtan te // lta ba sems can gyi rgyud kyi
NK103(pe)001:264: chos thams cad kyi rang spyi'i mtshan nyid rtogs nas
NK103(pe)001:265: brtan te // // ting nge 'dzin las su rung
NK103(pe)001:266: bas zhi gnas rtse gcig pas shes pa dang 'brel
NK103(pe)001:269: lhag mthong gsal yang na rgyan las /
NK103(pe)001:270: lam lngar tshogs sbyor zhi gnas sbyor //
NK103(pe)001:271: lhag mthong gsal bas mthong bsgom mthar //
NK103(pe)001:273: ba'i tshogs sbyor dang mthong lam dang sa bcu'i bar
NK103(pe)001:274: du 'phel ba'i skabs ni bskal pa grangs med gsum
NK103(pe)001:276: zhi gnas la gong bzhin brtan pa'i nyams rnyed nas //
NK103(pe)001:277: ting nge 'dzin rnam pa de gnyis zung du 'brel ba ni lam gyi ngo bo'o //
NK103(pe)001:278: brtags pas stong pa ni mnyam bzhag nam mkha' lta bu'o //
NK103(pe)001:279: de nyid las langs pa'i tshe phar phyin drug la spyad par bya //
NK103(pe)001:280: zhi gnas zla ba gcig gis ni thob ste brtan par gyur nas //
NK103(pe)001:281: zhi gnas de nyid thob nas lhag mthong brtags pas
NK103(pe)001:282: stong thun skyong nus te zhag la sogs par brtan
NK103(pe)001:284: sgom pa de nyid spyod pa stong pa chen po'i klong chen por dbyer med pa la //
NK103(pe)001:285: phal cher dbugs chen 'byin pa yi //
NK103(pe)001:286: de'i dus ni shes rab ting nge la sogs kyi
NK103(pe)001:287: rtsal chung na bskal pa du ma'ang gnas pa srid
NK103(pe)001:289: smon lam gyi stobs drag na myur du bskal pa gsum gyis 'grub //
NK103(pe)001:290: sangs rgyas kyi sa la dbang gis 'gro bas longs
NK103(pe)001:291: spyod rdzogs pa'i sku byin dang ldan pas phyag g.yas
NK103(pe)001:292: pa brkyangs nas // byang sems kyi mgo bo la
NK103(pe)001:293: phyag gser gi 'khor lo can gyi yid la zhen
NK103(pe)001:294: pa'i gdung ba bsal ba'i phyir gdugs kyis bkab nas
NK103(pe)001:295: pa brkyangs nas // ni // ci ma dzad na
NK103(pe)001:296: zhi gnas brtan pa'i zab mo stong rtog gi dbyings
NK103(pe)001:297: de nas 'gro don la bslang ba'i phyir badz+ra u
NK103(pe)001:298: pa brkyangs nas // ni // tish+ta zhes bya'o //
NK103(pe)001:299: mtshan ma thabs kyis zhing khams kyi bya ba mang
NK103(pe)001:300: po la bslabs shing de brtan par byas te //
NK103(pe)001:301: mtshon pa thun mong longs sku yi cha byad rgyan dang mtshan dpe byad ldan par byas te //
NK103(pe)001:302: bde gshegs kyi zhing khams kun tu sgron ma nyid du bsgrags te lung bstan no //
NK103(pe)001:303: dbar bskur ba'i rdzas ni rdo rjes spyi bor bum pas phyag la na bza' sa lus kun dang //
NK103(pe)001:304: rang rtags phyag rgya'i snying ga dang bzhi ru smon lam byin rlabs dgongs pas dbang bskur nas //
NK103(pe)001:305: rnam pa thams cad rig pa 'char ba ni mchog
NK103(pe)001:306: gi dbang rnams te skabs kyis bogs dbyung du med
NK103(pe)001:308: zhe 'dod can la mos pa'i don du mtshon pa'i tshig gsungs pa yin pas //
NK103(pe)001:309: lha rigs gsum gyi nga rgyal nyid rnam pa'i mtshan
NK103(pe)001:310: ma'i bde ba la mngon par zhen cing thob par
NK103(pe)001:311: 'dod pas // rdo rje rgyal po bya ba la
NK103(pe)001:312: mkhas pa dbang dam thob pa byin rlabs dang ldan
NK103(pe)001:313: pa ni phyi yi bka' rtags can no //
NK103(pe)001:314: lha'i sku gsung thugs dang yi ge mngon sum du thob par 'dod pa'i //
NK103(pe)001:315: don dam par lta ba stong pa 1nyid dang rnal
NK103(pe)001:316: 'byor cho ga yan lag bcu gcig gis mtshan 1ma
NK103(pe)001:317: lha sgom can // dngos po'i gnas lugs la bden pa 11gnyis kyi lta bas bcings pas //
NK103(pe)001:318: dngos po gsum la bde ba chen po nyams su myong ba'i srog dang bral lo //
NK103(pe)001:319: rigs gsum re re la sku gsung thugs kyis phye
NK103(pe)001:320: bas bka' rtags dgu dang bdag po gtso bo yum
NK103(pe)001:321: khro bo pho nya gsum gsum ste bco lnga yis
NK103(pe)001:322: // rnal 'byor pa'i lus ngag sems gsum gyis rtog
NK103(pe)001:323: pa'i sbyangs nas cho ga lnga dang byin brlabs drug
NK103(pe)001:324: gis lha rigs gsum nga rgyal bskyed pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:325: mtshan bcas mtshan med kyi ting 'dzin gyis rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa la sems kyi smon pa 'dings //
NK103(pe)001:326: mchod rdzas sgrub rdzas kyi dngos po'i sman dang lha sngags dang sgrub pa'i sngags sbyor gyis //
NK103(pe)001:327: bsgrubs pa'i mig rnon rkang mgyogs la sogs pa'i 'jig rten gsum gyi bya ba byed par bstan //
NK103(pe)001:328: don bzang ngan gtsang sme med pa dang lha bzang
NK103(pe)001:329: ngan spyod pa la gtsang smer 'dod pas ma mthun
NK103(pe)001:330: yang phyag rdor gsum gyi bstan pa so sor snang
NK103(pe)001:331: ba ni // blo che chung yi rim pa bzhin drang ba dang //
NK103(pe)001:332: thabs mi mthun pa kun kyi bdag por dbang bskur bas rim par byung ba ni //
NK103(pe)001:333: khrus dang gtsang sbra cho gas 'grub pa'i gtsang ma'i lag na rdo rje dang //
NK103(pe)001:334: rnal 'byor gyi sgo nas rigs bzhi'i sems dpa' dang
NK103(pe)001:335: mo bzhir gyur pas dpal 'byung lag na rdo rje
NK103(pe)001:336: dang // gdug pa 'dul bas dpa' dam rdzas la
NK103(pe)001:337: brtul zhugs dang ldan pa stobs kyi rdo rjer dang
NK103(pe)001:339: kri ya rigs gsum u pa ya rigs bzhi yo ga rigs lnga dang //
NK103(pe)001:340: de bzhin rigs dang gcig rigs stong la sogs pa mtha' yas pa rnal 'byor chen po dang //
NK103(pe)001:341: rang gang 'dod pa'i lha phyag na rdo rje dang bzhi ru nga sprul te //
NK103(pe)001:342: ci mdzad na blo che chung dang mthun pa'i bstan pa sngags kyi theg pa bzhi byin no //
NK103(pe)001:343: de yang rgyal po'i bka' bsgo ba kha blon chen pos bsgyur ba'i tshig gam //
NK103(pe)001:344: w+aa ra na s+ai'i tshos ma yis kha dog ji
NK103(pe)001:345: ltar bsgyur ba ltar 'gyur ba dpe de bzhin du
NK103(pe)001:346: // snyigs ma'i 'dul zhing 'gro ba rnams sngags kyi
NK103(pe)001:347: theg pa sna tshogs kyis 'dul ba'ang de bzhin no
NK103(pe)001:348: // // 'di ni dngos su mi ston pas brgyud pa'i sbyor ba ste //
NK103(pe)001:349: bcos ma dngos 'dzin rtog pa de ma bcos pas spang bar bya'o //
NK103(pe)001:350: gnas w+aa ra na s+ai'i bsil khang du //
NK103(pe)001:351: ston pa gtsang ma'i lag na rdo rje yis //
NK103(pe)001:353: phal pa dang mi mnyam ste /
NK103(pe)001:354: rkang mtheb sen mo'i zhes pa gnyis drang /
NK103(pe)001:355: phyag na rdo rje de nyid kyi lag mthil gtsang ma'i dris byugs te //
NK103(pe)001:356: rigs gsum stobs kyis dkyil 'khor bris pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:357: 'khor dam pa gsum bram ze gtsang ma /
NK103(pe)001:360: la dam phog dal du bcug cing nges par bstan pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:361: 'phrul thabs gyi me long rigs gsum la dgur phye ba ste de dal du bkram ste bkod pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:362: lha'i k+aa w+aa tsir dmigs pas nyan rang byang sems tha mal gyi dngos po'i rtog pa sbyangs //
NK103(pe)001:363: lha bco lnga dang nyer gcig yi mngon rtags dal
NK103(pe)001:364: du bcug sdom pa phog dbang bskur ba ni lag
NK103(pe)001:365: tu gtad pa'o // 'bras bu gtsang ma rdo rje
NK103(pe)001:366: 'dzin pa'i sa la sbyar nas nges par bkod de
NK103(pe)001:367: tu gtad pa'o // // de yang rnal ma'i dbang min pas bcos ma'i sbyor ba yin //
NK103(pe)001:368: gnas rin chen lhun stug bye brag par brtsegs pa'i gzhal yas khang //
NK103(pe)001:369: spyi'i ri bo 'bar ba'i ri rab ri'i rtse mo la bya'o //
NK103(pe)001:370: ston pa dpal 'byung lag na rdo rje yis //
NK103(pe)001:371: rdo rje dbyings ni rdo rje la sku gsung thugs
NK103(pe)001:372: rdo rje phra mo der zhugs pa la btags pa'o
NK103(pe)001:374: 'bar ba ni yon tan 'od dang bcas pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:375: rang bzhin ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor mngon du phyung ste bstan //
NK103(pe)001:376: gang la na dam pa ku ku r+aa dza /
NK103(pe)001:378: lcam go ma la mtshan can /
NK103(pe)001:379: tak+sha nak+sha ak+sha bya ba dang a ti ka tsan+d+ra lnga la mngon du bstan //
NK103(pe)001:380: stug po bkod pa'i gnas lha brag rdo rje'i rdzong phug tu //
NK103(pe)001:381: gtsang ma'i rigs 'dzin te dbang gi gral du bkod pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:382: de yang bcos ma'i dkyil 'khor yin //
NK103(pe)001:383: ma yin pa la yin par bsgoms pa'i ting 'dzin ni yid smon pa'i sbyor ba ste //
NK103(pe)001:384: dbu rgyan bum pa cod pan la sogs pa'i dbang rtags sbyor bas blo'i zhen pas nga rgyal smin //
NK103(pe)001:385: sgo gsum lha'i ngo bor mnyam pa nyid kyi lta ba'i tshig 'dzin cing //
NK103(pe)001:386: spyod pa de'ang don spros pa med pa mnyam pa'i tshig tsam las kyang 'das //
NK103(pe)001:387: dal du zhugs pa la rigs lnga'i dam tshig phog pa'ang yin la bsten pa'i lam gzhi can //
NK103(pe)001:388: lta ba dang rgod pa dang yan lag bzhi 'khyud pa yin //
NK103(pe)001:389: sbyor ba'i dam tshig bstan pa yin gyi dngos su dbang po gnyis sbyor ba min no //
NK103(pe)001:390: rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas 'dug na //
NK103(pe)001:391: khams gsum bsad kyang sdig pa med //
NK103(pe)001:392: ces pas zhing bcas bsgral ba'i gnas rnams ni //
NK103(pe)001:393: bsgral bya'i rtog pa lha ru bsgyur te bskyed pa dang gtso bos bsgral //
NK103(pe)001:394: bdag gi ting nge 'dzin gyi sbyor ba yis //
NK103(pe)001:395: bsgral bas spyod pa'i dam par 'dod do //
NK103(pe)001:396: lha phyir 'jog cing grub pa phyi nas 'dod pas
NK103(pe)001:397: phyi pa de'i don la rnal 'byor bsgoms la ting
NK103(pe)001:398: 'dzin rnams // cho ga'i rim pa yang na lam lnga'i ji bzhin nam /
NK103(pe)001:399: sbyar bas mngon du thob byar 'dod pa de //
NK103(pe)001:400: lha la sogs pa'i cho ga'i yan lag rnams //
NK103(pe)001:401: ting nge 'dzin dang rang rang gi sems kyi yid smon du bltas pa la 'dod pa 'byung ste //
NK103(pe)001:402: bcos ma'i dkyil 'khor la brten nas //
NK103(pe)001:403: phyi rtags yid smon dbang bskur yang //
NK103(pe)001:405: bcos ma'i sbyor ba'i yan lag go //
NK103(pe)001:406: rnal 'byor 'dod pa rang las 'byung bas phyi rol
NK103(pe)001:407: du rag ma lus pas nang gi rtags btab pas
NK103(pe)001:410: dang du blang ba'i brtul zhugs spyod pa lhur blangs nas //
NK103(pe)001:411: phyi pa gtsang sme can gyi gnyen po'i sbyor ba gtsor bzhag ste bstan //
NK103(pe)001:412: dam rdzas gtsang sme la blang dor 'dzin pa'i sems kyis su //
NK103(pe)001:413: mnyam pa nyid rdo rje'i don du ma son te tshig la gnas //
NK103(pe)001:414: gang gis na lag na rdo rje gsang ba'i brtul zhugs can kyis //
NK103(pe)001:415: gang la bskur ba'i yul ni sems dpa' rdo rje'i ting 'dzin rig pa'i 'og min gyi gnas //
NK103(pe)001:416: chags bral gyi blo chags can gyi dang mthun par bum pa'i dbang byin nas grol lam gyi /
NK103(pe)001:417: dbang gsum gyi don bsgrags te thar bar byed /
NK103(pe)001:419: spyi'i gnas sum cu rtsa gsum lha yi gnas yin la //
NK103(pe)001:420: khyad par gyi chos bzang lha yi 'dun sa ru //
NK103(pe)001:421: mchod sdong thabs dang shes rab kyi bde ba gtsug gi me tog thabs kyi byang sems dang //
NK103(pe)001:422: rdo rje gsang ba'i me tog nyi ma'i ngo bo dang //
NK103(pe)001:423: lha mo brgyad nyid mdzes pas kyi me tog gis //
NK103(pe)001:425: gang la na rdo rje 'dzin pa la mngon sum gtor te //
NK103(pe)001:426: gtso bo nyid dgyes pa'i rang gi lhag pa'i lha
NK103(pe)001:427: la phog ste yab yum spyan 'dzum pa dang bcas
NK103(pe)001:428: pa yis // mdangs kyis gcig la gcig gis bltas
NK103(pe)001:429: te bzhugs pa'i dkyil 'khor du sems dpa' rdo rje
NK103(pe)001:431: pra'i rim pas snod brtags pa dang 'tsham par rim par sbyar la bstan to //
NK103(pe)001:432: dad pa dang dam tshig brtson 'grus ldan pa'i sku gsung thugs la mos pa can //
NK103(pe)001:433: smon pa'i sbyor bas nges 'phangs nas //
NK103(pe)001:434: dngos su ma h+aa de wa'i bu ming ma h+aa sh+r+ai can no //
NK103(pe)001:435: brgya byin 'khor gyi bu de wa tsan+d+ra zhes bya ste de'i bu thu bo //
NK103(pe)001:436: lha lnga ni de wa r+aa dza /
NK103(pe)001:438: bo d+hi u pa ra dang bo d+hi rak+sha dang /
NK103(pe)001:439: de wa a ti ka tsan+d+ra ste rigs lnga phog cing dang mnyam par sbyar bas grub pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:440: gzugs brnyan zag med ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor nyid mthong zhing thos pas mngon par dga' ba'i //
NK103(pe)001:441: gang gis na ye shes gzugs brnyan bskyed pa dang
NK103(pe)001:442: bris pa min te rang la ma bsgribs te mngon
NK103(pe)001:443: du shar bas // dbang gang byin na bum pa'i
NK103(pe)001:444: dbang byin pas snod du rung ba dang rigs nges
NK103(pe)001:446: 'bras bu 'khor bar mi ldog pa mthong lam gyi sa la de nas bkod //
NK103(pe)001:447: dbang thob pa de lam ston nas 'khor gyi gco bo sems dpa' rdo rje yis //
NK103(pe)001:448: zhus pas ston pas gnang ba byin te lam gyi ngo bo bka' bzhin du bsgrubs te //
NK103(pe)001:449: snod bcud brtags pa'i thos bsam gyis //
NK103(pe)001:450: grol ba'i lam mtshan bcas mtshan med kyi ting nge
NK103(pe)001:451: 'dzin gyi sbyor ba ste shes rab gsum skyed do
NK103(pe)001:452: // bde ba ldang ba'i sems kyis 'du shes nges par bskyed nas //
NK103(pe)001:453: zab mo'i dbang dang bral ba'i yul min pas gsang
NK103(pe)001:454: ba'i bde gsal mi rtog pa'i ye shes de 'khor
NK103(pe)001:455: gyis gus pa dang bcas pas bstod cing zhus pas
NK103(pe)001:456: gnang // de nas gsang ba'i rdo rje 'chang yab
NK103(pe)001:457: yum dbang po thun mong thun min gyi khri gnyis
NK103(pe)001:458: gnang // ka la 'dzegs // thabs kyi tshul dang
NK103(pe)001:459: mthun pa sbyor pa'i yon tan brjod pas 'khor mos
NK103(pe)001:460: gnang // ka la 'dzegs // pa bskyed // gsang
NK103(pe)001:461: ba'i byang sems 'dres pa me tog 'thor ba 'thung
NK103(pe)001:462: ba ni blangs pa ste bla mas bde gsal mi
NK103(pe)001:463: rtog pa'i ye shes bskyed do mchod //
NK103(pe)001:464: rdo rje 'chang yab yum gyi gsang ba'i gzugs brnyan
NK103(pe)001:465: lus ngag dang skye mched dkyil 'khor du brlabs te
NK103(pe)001:466: // mtshon pa'i gzugs brnyan sor bzhi ma mdzub gang
NK103(pe)001:467: ba 'khril ba'i pang der bzhag ste rab gnas dang
NK103(pe)001:469: gsang ba bde chen gyi dgongs pa nang gi rtsa dang bde ba'i rigs 'dzin du //
NK103(pe)001:470: nges par lung bstan cing rdo rje che ge mo zhes ming phog ste //
NK103(pe)001:471: dbang thob pa'i rjes la bdud rtsi'i bcud blangs la
NK103(pe)001:472: rol pa'i spyod pa 'khyud pa dang brtse ba la
NK103(pe)001:474: mdog pad+ma dmar po ltar 'gyur te rlung dang rtsa'i nus pa'i stobs rnyed nas //
NK103(pe)001:476: rdo rje khri chen pad+ma mtshan ldan gyi thog tu bskyon //
NK103(pe)001:477: lha mo ru byin brlabs 'bar ba'i mkha' lnga la sbyor ba'i tshe slob ma gzhag /
NK103(pe)001:478: thabs shes rol pa'i rtsed mo dgu'i spyod pa ni khab rtse'i rol pa dang /
NK103(pe)001:486: nyam nga ba med pa'i rol pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:488: nyon mongs mtshams med mi dge ba kha na ma tho'i las rnams la //
NK103(pe)001:489: thabs kyis zin nas bag med sems kyis dug la sngags kyis btab pa ltar rol bar bya //
NK103(pe)001:490: dang po bde ba'i ngo bo ma rdzogs pa'i myu
NK103(pe)001:491: gu'i bar ma chad par bsgoms pas rigs 'dzin seng
NK103(pe)001:492: 'phrug 'dra te // lhag pa'i don dam pa'i bden pa man ngag gi rim pas rtogs pa yin //
NK103(pe)001:493: dbang gi nyams kyis stong nyid dang bde ba mi phyed pa'i man ngag sbyin cing lam du 'jug /
NK103(pe)001:494: rol pa'i ka ra bcu gnyis dbang gis dus su bla mas bstan //
NK103(pe)001:506: bde chen lhun grub kyi ka ra'o //
NK103(pe)001:507: bsgyur ba'i man ngag gi bzlog pa'i rim pas sa
NK103(pe)001:508: bcu gsum pa rdo rje 'dzin pa myong bar bstan
NK103(pe)001:509: // lus dang rlung bkug dang mnyes dang lus stod smad dang lung bsdam pa dang //
NK103(pe)001:510: rlung thig la sems gzung dang gsang gnas bde stong sprad dang phyag rgya bzhis bcing ba dang //
NK103(pe)001:513: gnyis med du sprad dang gar gyi 'pho ba thig le'i gar /
NK103(pe)001:515: bskyod pa phyag rgya'i gar dang gsum //
NK103(pe)001:519: yab yum gyi dga' ba bzhi bzhi ste brgyad ldan pa'i thabs chen gyis //
NK103(pe)001:520: don dam pa'i bde ba lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes mngon du bstan //
NK103(pe)001:521: stong pa rtogs pa'i don de nyid tshul la nyams su blang zhing gnas //
NK103(pe)001:522: byin brlabs bde ba skyed pa'i sngags kyi spyod pas byin gyis brlab //
NK103(pe)001:523: bde gsal mi rtog pa la goms pas tshe yi rigs 'dzin dbang thob ste //
NK103(pe)001:524: dus dang dus ma yin par 'chi ba gnyis ka med pa'i tshe dang sbyar //
NK103(pe)001:525: su la bskur na sras kyi thu bo nyer bzhag gong gi lnga //
NK103(pe)001:526: khyad par gyi gnas rdo ar mo li ga'i steng
NK103(pe)001:527: na mchod rten yod pa'i bum pa kha dog 'khor
NK103(pe)001:528: lo rtsibs brgyad sul dang bcas par 'bar bar bskur
NK103(pe)001:529: // spyi'i gnas sum cu rtsa gsum gnas chen po //
NK103(pe)001:530: rang rgyud pa min te sprul pa brgya byin sbyor ba'i dbang lha mor bsgyur te //
NK103(pe)001:531: gang du snang na brgya byin nyid kyi bu mo grags chen mo //
NK103(pe)001:532: 'phrul gyi me long la bltas pas lha rgyal kun gyi chags pa che chung rtogs nas /
NK103(pe)001:534: lag pa sprad pa la sogs pas grol bas gzungs chen te //
NK103(pe)001:535: de la brten nas bde ba chen por mtshon nas rgyal ba'i sras su nye bar gzhag /
NK103(pe)001:536: ye shes kyi lha mo'i gzugs brnyan te gzungs ma'o //
NK103(pe)001:537: gsang ba'i dbang gi khyad par gyis dkyil 'khor gsum te pra las shes pa dang //
NK103(pe)001:540: yab yum gnyis chags pa byang sems bde ba bskyod
NK103(pe)001:541: pa las rdo rje'i rwa bzhi'i sa bon chos kyi
NK103(pe)001:543: 'dod pa'i yul la bzlog pa'i thabs kyis gdab par bya //
NK103(pe)001:544: nyi zla gnyis med rig pa ye shes kyi klong du nyams 'char //
NK103(pe)001:545: de la goms pas tha mal gyi 'dod chags la
NK103(pe)001:546: sogs pa'i rtog pa sreg cing mi gnas pa'i me
NK103(pe)001:547: yin te // bde stong mi phyed pas rdo rje
NK103(pe)001:548: thabs rlung gis 'byed 'dzum gyis steng gi snying po
NK103(pe)001:550: mtshan nas sor bzhi'am lte ba nas thur du gcal
NK103(pe)001:551: ba na dbyings phyug 'khor lo gnas pa de me
NK103(pe)001:552: yis bsro // bas thig le lus khyab par rdzogs
NK103(pe)001:553: pa de'i steng lam nas 'bar nas rtsa sgo phyed
NK103(pe)001:554: nas thig le zhu ba de gong nas 'og tu
NK103(pe)001:555: yis bsro // bskul // ba la yang dang yang
NK103(pe)001:556: 'bad pas snying gi thig le'i gnas kyi rtsa mdud
NK103(pe)001:557: kha phye nas rlung gis bskyod pas bde ba'i rlung
NK103(pe)001:558: gis shes pa'i dwangs ma gsum 'dres pa rtsas rgyas
NK103(pe)001:559: yis bsro // bskul // gyur na // de'i tshe
NK103(pe)001:560: mngon shes rdzu 'phrul rkang mgyogs la sogs pa ji
NK103(pe)001:561: ltar 'dod pa'i bde ba 'byung ma chags pas mchog
NK103(pe)001:563: bde ba yang rlung gi man ngag la brten dgos
NK103(pe)001:564: pas rig pa ye shes kyi rlung dang 'dres te
NK103(pe)001:565: dbyer med pa'i thig le can //
NK103(pe)001:566: dbugs rngub pa dang bsdu ba'i man ngag sbyin no //
NK103(pe)001:567: des bden pa mthong zhing sa thob nas rdo rje
NK103(pe)001:568: 'dzin pa'i rigs 'dzin gyi sa thob nas gong du
NK103(pe)001:569: bsgyur ba yin pa'i phyir sa dang po nas brgyad
NK103(pe)001:570: pa'i bar du ting 'dzin 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du
NK103(pe)001:571: 'jug cing // sems dpa' brtan pa'i lung rig pa'i dam phog ste //
NK103(pe)001:573: ting nge'i lha mo la brten nas ting nges gnas
NK103(pe)001:574: med dkyil 'khor dam par gzhug ste ting nges dbang
NK103(pe)001:575: bskur bas // gong gi mtshams sbyor de nyid dkyil 'khor der zhugs te //
NK103(pe)001:576: sa brgyad pa la dbang thob nas sa bcu par
NK103(pe)001:577: 'gyur ba la longs skus rang bzhin lhun grub kyi
NK103(pe)001:579: ye shes kyi lha mo la brten nas bdag gzhan
NK103(pe)001:580: gyi don grub bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi dbang bskur
NK103(pe)001:581: te // longs sku'i rgyal dbang gi 'bras bu tshab byed pa'i skyes bu'i sar bzhag nas //
NK103(pe)001:582: 'og ma la gsang sngags kyi theg pa 'bum phrag gsum gyi bstan pa ting nges bsgrags //
NK103(pe)001:585: gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo dang gsum gsungs te //
NK103(pe)001:586: de ltar bcos ma'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni //
NK103(pe)001:587: 'bras bu thob kyang bcos ma yin pas /
NK103(pe)001:588: rnal ma'i dngos grub rnyed pa ma yin pas //
NK103(pe)001:589: brtul zhugs spong len spyod pa bcos ma'i dbang //
NK103(pe)001:590: 'di yis ma bcos pa de nyid mi thob ste //
NK103(pe)001:591: dper na spre'u dang rgyal po bzhin //
NK103(pe)001:592: spyor ba gzhan gyi dngos mi grub //
NK103(pe)001:593: 'di dag bcos ma'i sbyor ba ste //
NK103(pe)001:594: rang la smin kyang ma bcos pa'i 'bras bu mi 'grub ste //
NK103(pe)001:595: 'dus byas yin pas bim+ba ra yi 'bras bu bzhin no //
NK103(pe)001:596: gnas wa ra na s+ai'i klong phug tu //
NK103(pe)001:597: sha ri'i bu yi ston pa yis //
NK103(pe)001:598: bram ze ba ta ka'i 'khor bu de wa pa /
NK103(pe)001:600: mo'u pa gsum la dbang bskur lugs gong du bstan pa bzhin te //
NK103(pe)001:601: 'bras bu tshe stod dgra bcom zag pa zad //
NK103(pe)001:602: rnal ma ma rtogs pa'i skyon tshe smad ngan song gsum du brgyud //
NK103(pe)001:603: gnas bya rgod phung po'i 'gram logs su //
NK103(pe)001:604: dgon phug bye ma'i 'dabs sna ru //
NK103(pe)001:605: thob par 'dod pa'i gang zag dngos por lta ba'i rigs can te //
NK103(pe)001:606: bram ze la za rgan mo'i bu //
NK103(pe)001:607: dge slong sa ri bya ba de //
NK103(pe)001:608: dus ni nga rgyal skyes shing smin pa'i dus nga ni sdug bsngal zag pa zad //
NK103(pe)001:609: rgyal tshab skyes bu'i sa 'dzin zer //
NK103(pe)001:611: dgra bcom sha ri'i bu la sogs pa lnga brgya stong gcig 'dus nas //
NK103(pe)001:612: dbang gi ngo bo skyes bu chen por dbang lnga bskur ba gong du bshad nas //
NK103(pe)001:613: des kyang rnal ma'i 'bras bu ma thob pas 'khor ba'i gnas rab dgu ru brgyud //
NK103(pe)001:614: rten pa tshig gi dbang 'di ni //
NK103(pe)001:615: zhe 'dod la mos pa'i brkam chags can //
NK103(pe)001:616: rang rgyal mtshan ma'i bde thob pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:617: gnas gad+g+aa'i rgya mtsho de gling na //
NK103(pe)001:618: ded dpon slob dpon blon gyi bu thu bo //
NK103(pe)001:619: bram ze nor gyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin //
NK103(pe)001:620: phyi yi rdo rje rtags bskur thabs 'dzin pa //
NK103(pe)001:621: bka' lha'i dal bka' rtags bum pa gzhal yas khang gi /
NK103(pe)001:625: dril bu yum gyi rtags de brjod pa'i dang sngags kyi tshig gi dbang bskur te //
NK103(pe)001:626: bden pa'i smon lam gyi tshig gis nus pa sa bon tsam du gzhag /
NK103(pe)001:627: des kyang grol ba min pas 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho brgal ma nus //
NK103(pe)001:628: de cis na bskur bas thob pa'i dbang rnams ni //
NK103(pe)001:629: zag bcas nus mthu 'khor ba'i chos yin pas so //
NK103(pe)001:630: shar phyogs spyi'i gnas in+d+ra'i lung pa na //
NK103(pe)001:631: khyad par gyi rgya lung rdo rje brtsegs pa gang rung ru //
NK103(pe)001:632: phyag na rdo rjes dbang bskur bas dam pa'i rigs
NK103(pe)001:633: can du gyur pa gang gis in+d+ra b+hu ti yis
NK103(pe)001:634: dang // sa gang la na ga yul gser pa'i
NK103(pe)001:635: rgyal ba'i sras dang po rgyal po snying stobs can
NK103(pe)001:636: zhes bya ba bu thu bo //
NK103(pe)001:637: klu yi bu mo rgya mtsho dang //
NK103(pe)001:638: sing+ha'i u pa r+aa dza dang //
NK103(pe)001:639: lha yi bu ni dge ba can //
NK103(pe)001:640: dri ma med pa'i 'od la sogs //
NK103(pe)001:641: tshom bu'i grangs lnga bcu stong dang bcas //
NK103(pe)001:642: dal dang lha gang bsgrubs na phyag na rdo rje mngon bsgrubs te //
NK103(pe)001:644: thun mong gi spong ba de 'dir len brtul zhugs spyod pa grub pa thob pa'i dbang //
NK103(pe)001:645: gi tshul mnga' bas dge bar bskur na sdig pa khyod kyis srog chags gsad par bya //
NK103(pe)001:647: mtshams med byas pas pha rol phyin //
NK103(pe)001:650: phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa lhas gnang ba
NK103(pe)001:651: byin pas grub cing rgyud dang lung la 'byung ba
NK103(pe)001:652: ltar brten // des kyang mi grol bas de yang spyod log dngos gol te //
NK103(pe)001:653: mtshan ma g.yon gyi lam la bzhugs //
NK103(pe)001:655: gang g.yon phyogs pa ni chags pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:659: brkam chags rang ka sred ma spangs //
NK103(pe)001:660: chags pa g.yon gyi lam gyis khrid //
NK103(pe)001:661: de bcos ma'i lam yin pas bde chen lam dang
NK103(pe)001:662: de dag bral bas de kho na nyid mi mthong
NK103(pe)001:665: dpal o rgyan thor cog can gyi gling 'khor lo brtsegs pa'i khang //
NK103(pe)001:666: d+ha na ko sha'i gling phug tu //
NK103(pe)001:667: gser gyi brag phug yu ba can //
NK103(pe)001:668: de'i nang rdo rje'i rin chen sna bdun gyi gdan bting ste //
NK103(pe)001:669: rig pa lhun gyis rdzogs pas rin chen 'bar ba gsal byed bla ma'i man ngag kyis //
NK103(pe)001:670: brda sprad pas snang ba lhun gyis grub par phyogs
NK103(pe)001:671: mtshams thams cad rgyas pa gsal ba'i chos thams cad
NK103(pe)001:672: snying po gcig tu 'khyil bas gur phub ste //
NK103(pe)001:673: rnam grangs med pas yi ge med pa'i 'bru k+aa w+aa tsi'i dal gsum nyams su myongs pas bstims //
NK103(pe)001:674: rna brgyud pa gsum bar ma chad pa'i gdams ngag
NK103(pe)001:675: gi lung gi gter chen po sems nyid rnam rtog
NK103(pe)001:677: rang rgyud pa dang ltos pa'i rtog pa'i phyogs ris
NK103(pe)001:678: dang mtshams gcod pas phyogs med du rgyas pa'i 'khor
NK103(pe)001:679: lo bskor // sems nyid la yon tan rdzogs pas
NK103(pe)001:680: rin chen gcig bltas pas snang srid kun mthong bas
NK103(pe)001:681: 'phrul gyi me long tshig gcig la don rdzogs par
NK103(pe)001:682: lo bskor // bstan // rnam rtog ci skyes kyang
NK103(pe)001:683: rang rgyud pa'i rgyu ba med pa'i don rig pa
NK103(pe)001:684: phyogs med du gsal bar bskyed //
NK103(pe)001:685: thams cad rang byung ye shes stong pa dang snang
NK103(pe)001:686: ba'i rang bzhin rig pa phyogs med du gsal ba'i
NK103(pe)001:687: 'od la bzhugs // longs spyod rdzogs pa'i rgyan mtshan dpe dang ldan //
NK103(pe)001:688: rna brgyud spyi blugs tshangs pa chen po'i dbang bskur te //
NK103(pe)001:689: thob nas gang yang skyon du mi lta ste //
NK103(pe)001:690: rang byung dngos grub shar bar rtogs pa de nyid bde ba chen po'i sa la bkod pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:691: ji ltar rtogs par bya na bcos ma'i sbyor ba la brten nas //
NK103(pe)001:692: rnal ma'i sbyor ba rtogs par bya //
NK103(pe)001:693: 'dra 'bag ri mo lha 'dra yang lha yi lus min pa bzhin du //
NK103(pe)001:694: mtshan ma rtags kyis de kho na nyid kyi don mtshon par bya //
NK103(pe)001:695: bcos ma'i dbang bskur rtags kyi brda des //
NK103(pe)001:696: don mtshon te rtogs nas rtags phyis rtags la mi rten pas /
NK103(pe)001:698: rnal ma'i dbang bskur thabs chen po 'di dang //
NK103(pe)001:699: bral ba'i rnal 'byor gang dag ni //
NK103(pe)001:700: gang gis ji ltar btsal kyang don mi mthong bas /
NK103(pe)001:701: zhig mig dang bral ba yin //
NK103(pe)001:702: 'di nyams pa'i rnal 'byor lam tshol ba //
NK103(pe)001:703: ni dper na rgya mtsho 'jings las stegs bcas nas //
NK103(pe)001:704: nam mkha'i dngos po snyog pa dang 'dra'o //
NK103(pe)001:705: bde ba chen po'i man ngag 'di //
NK103(pe)001:706: dmus long gi mdun na gzugs bstan kyang mi snang bzhin //
NK103(pe)001:707: rigs chad dang dbang gi chu bo dang bral zhing
NK103(pe)001:708: skal ba ngan pa dang las kyis bsgribs pa rnams
NK103(pe)001:709: la // srog lus bral yang zur yang mi brjod de khar dbyung ba min no //
NK103(pe)001:710: khyad par du mi bstan pa'i dmigs bzung ba blo ngan dad pa chung ba dang //
NK103(pe)001:711: ngang gis blo 'phang dma' ba dang //
NK103(pe)001:712: thos pa chung ba'i blo sbram dang //
NK103(pe)001:713: theg pa dman la zhugs pa dang //
NK103(pe)001:714: rang rkyen ngan pas dregs pa dang //
NK103(pe)001:716: 'jig rten bya ba'i rgyud bsgrubs dang //
NK103(pe)001:717: thabs kyi bcud chen 'dzag pa dang //
NK103(pe)001:718: brkam chags ngan pas zin pa dang //
NK103(pe)001:719: snod kyi dri ma ma dag pas //
NK103(pe)001:720: bsgrub bya dam par mi sems dang //
NK103(pe)001:721: bla ma srog tu mi 'dzin dang //
NK103(pe)001:722: tha ma'i spyod pa nyams pa rnams //
NK103(pe)001:723: grib bzhin 'khor yang spang bar bya //
NK103(pe)001:724: lus srog bral yang las kyis bral bas gsang gnyer thub par bya'o //
NK103(pe)001:725: mtsho chen gser gyi 'og gzhi ltar //
NK103(pe)001:726: bla ma'i man ngag thob nas dad pa dang bsam pa dang grub mtha'/
NK103(pe)001:727: mi 'gyur bar brtan pa'i sems kyis bzung //
NK103(pe)001:728: gal te snod ngan la bcas pa'i rgya ral te dbang dang gdams ngag byin na //
NK103(pe)001:729: na rag rdo rje gtan gzhi ste //
NK103(pe)001:730: chad pa'i ris su nges pa yin //
NK103(pe)001:732: dam can rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i tshogs //
NK103(pe)001:733: bos pa bzhin du 'dus gyur nas //
NK103(pe)001:734: sha khrag la sogs dngos su za //
NK103(pe)001:735: dam shod gling gi dur khrod bzhin //
NK103(pe)001:736: mkha' 'gro rna nyan kun gyis sdud //
NK103(pe)001:737: de dag la brtan na skyon mtha' yas shing yon tan med des na thabs chen man ngag 'di //
NK103(pe)001:738: rjes su mthun pa'i lo tshigs su dam bcas la des mi spro bar gzung ngo //
NK103(pe)001:739: rin chen gter gyi dbang dang bka' thams cad kyi
NK103(pe)001:740: bcud 'dus pas snying po 'di dang po gang nas
NK103(pe)001:741: byung zhe na // kun bzang rgyal ba thams cad kyis //
NK103(pe)001:742: gsang ba'i bdag por bka' bsgo ba //
NK103(pe)001:743: gsang mdzod rdo rje sems dpa' ni //
NK103(pe)001:744: sum cu rtsa gsum bum thogs steng //
NK103(pe)001:745: srog shing rdo rje rtse dgu par //
NK103(pe)001:747: gsang ba gter 'dzin bdag por grags //
NK103(pe)001:748: dga' rab rdo rje bdag nyid kyang //
NK103(pe)001:749: de wa bzang skyong bu thu bo //
NK103(pe)001:750: kun dga' snying po bya ba yin //
NK103(pe)001:751: lag na rdo rje gsang bdag gis //
NK103(pe)001:753: nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud //
NK103(pe)001:762: 'bras bu'i klong dgu badz+ra so'u ma kha zhes bya ba rtsa ba'i rgyud dang /
NK103(pe)001:763: bshad pa'i rgyud las gsal lo //
NK103(pe)001:765: spyi blugs tshangs pa'i dbang bskur nas //
NK103(pe)001:766: dus mtha' nyid kyis sa la bkod //
NK103(pe)001:768: sems rgyud rig pa'i thor cog can //
NK103(pe)001:769: rgyal gyi rigs can d+r+wa ma'i yul //
NK103(pe)001:770: rgya phug d+ha na ko sha'i gling //
NK103(pe)001:771: phug tu gsal ba'i gnas rab bcas //
NK103(pe)001:772: gong du bshad lung gsum brgyud pa'i rtsa ba'i don //
NK103(pe)001:773: dgu rum sems kyi dkyil du sbas pa'i man ngag 'di //
NK103(pe)001:774: sems la glan cing bde la bkod //
NK103(pe)001:775: yid la brnag cing lus la bcang //
NK103(pe)001:776: bka' yi bde ba tshangs pa chen po'i dbang ma thob cing don ma mthong na //
NK103(pe)001:777: thun mong gi bka' phyi nang brgyud pa'i lung la brten nas //
NK103(pe)001:778: lus ngag sems sgo gsum gyi bya btsal gyis //
NK103(pe)001:779: ci btsal kyang brkam chags 'dod pa ste rtsol ba'i chu bo bskyed //
NK103(pe)001:780: bde chen srog dang bral ba'i gang zag slob dpon gyis mthong nas //
NK103(pe)001:781: de dag bsgral ba'i ched du gsal rab gnas su dbugs chen phyung //
NK103(pe)001:782: rna brgyud 'phrul mig rdo rje zam pa 'di gsungs //
NK103(pe)001:783: bka' yi thugs kyi nying khu ste //
NK103(pe)001:784: ngang pa'i mchu yis 'o ma bsdus pa'am //
NK103(pe)001:785: lha dang lha min gyis ri rab la n+aa ga
NK103(pe)001:786: klu 'jog pos bsrubs pas bdud rtsi 'byung ba ltar
NK103(pe)001:788: rgya mtsho rlung gis kha byams bzhin //
NK103(pe)001:790: bka' yi klong dgu bam po nyi khri bdud rtsi bcud bsdus pa'i man ngag yin gang yin na //
NK103(pe)001:791: rgyal po'i sa thob pas phal pa rang shugs kyis
NK103(pe)001:792: 'du ba ltar spyi blugs tshangs pa'i dbang chen 'di
NK103(pe)001:793: thob na theg pa kun gyi dbang thob pa yin
NK103(pe)001:795: thabs kyi rgyal po de yang gang zag blo che
NK103(pe)001:796: chung gi rim pa dang 'tsham par bcos ma dang
NK103(pe)001:798: slob ma'i rgyud brtags la che chung gi rjes su
NK103(pe)001:799: mthun pa'i gzhi ltar thabs dang rgyud brtag pa'i cho
NK103(pe)001:800: ga dang bcas // gsol ba gdab gnang ba sbyin
NK103(pe)001:801: 'jug pa'i rgyu sngon du 'gro ba yi rim pa
NK103(pe)001:802: ga dang bcas // dang // dman pa theg pa
NK103(pe)001:803: brgyad kyi lha sgom la sogs pa'i khyad par kun
NK103(pe)001:804: rtogs nas de la mi gnas par spangs pa'i //
NK103(pe)001:805: bcos ma'i dbang kun rdzogs tshangs pa'i dbang brda dang
NK103(pe)001:806: nyams kyis bstan nas ma rtogs na tshig dbang bskur
NK103(pe)001:807: bas rig pa phyogs med du dgrol ba'i phyir 'dir
NK103(pe)001:810: snang srid ye shes mtshon pa'i brda //
NK103(pe)001:811: zhes te snang ba dang po'i brda don lhun grub gsum du dgrol ba'i rim pa yis //
NK103(pe)001:812: thugs kyi klong brtol nas rna brgyud kyi man ngag
NK103(pe)001:813: brda sprad pa dang dgrol ba la sogs pa dbang
NK103(pe)001:815: 'phrul gyi me long sgo dgu thams cad gsal ba
NK103(pe)001:816: bzhin du rtogs na rig pa sna tshogs su 'char
NK103(pe)001:817: ba'o // rgyal po mngon du grub pas sgrub mi
NK103(pe)001:818: dgos pa lta bu rtogs na btsal mi dgos pa'i
NK103(pe)001:819: ba'o // man ngag sbyin // gsal bar byed pa'i
NK103(pe)001:820: tshig gis don rin chen rang 'bar ba sems nyid
NK103(pe)001:821: ba'o // man ngag sbyin // bstan // rtogs nas
NK103(pe)001:822: grub mtha' ngan pa'i dbang du mi 'gyur bar brtan
NK103(pe)001:824: rab la re dogs med kyang 'bring la yengs pa
NK103(pe)001:825: 'byung bas dran pa rkyen gyi gsal ba dang bar
NK103(pe)001:826: ma chad pa'i man ngag sbyin //
NK103(pe)001:827: dbang po tha ma la bcos ma bstan pas dran rtog lung gis skyod byed pas //
NK103(pe)001:828: g.yo 'dzin rlung gi man ngag 'og nas 'chad pa ltar du sbyin //
NK103(pe)001:829: sems nyid 'gyur zhing mi brtan chags pa'i spros pa la 'chel bas //
NK103(pe)001:830: de la bde ba thig le'i thabs lam gyi man ngag ji ltar 'tsham par sbyin //
NK103(pe)001:831: rin chen rang byung rtogs nas goms pa'i byin gyis brlabs pas //
NK103(pe)001:832: dus thams cad du don nyid las mi 'gyur bar brtan pa'i spyod pa shugs kyis 'byung ba can //
NK103(pe)001:833: brtan na mi 'gyur yul shes pa la 'dus te de kho na nyid lhun grub gyi tshe //
NK103(pe)001:834: mnyam rjes med par bde ba chen po dus thams cad du rig pas bsgrub ste 'byung par bya'o //
NK103(pe)001:835: dang po'i yan lag bdun bstan par bya ba ni //
NK103(pe)001:836: gnas dang dkyil 'khor dang slob dpon dang //
NK103(pe)001:837: slob ma dag dang 'jug rim dang //
NK103(pe)001:838: dus dang 'jug pa'i yon tan no //
NK103(pe)001:839: dang po rnam pa gnyis gsungs te //
NK103(pe)001:840: gzhi yi gnas dang rten gyi gnas //
NK103(pe)001:841: thams cad kyi gnas rang rig sems nyid yin de //
NK103(pe)001:842: rgyu dang bral ba'i dngos gzhi nyid //
NK103(pe)001:843: bde gshegs rgyal ba ma lus dang //
NK103(pe)001:844: rgyud drug sems can thams cad kyi //
NK103(pe)001:845: bzhugs gnas rmad byung khyad par can //
NK103(pe)001:846: tshad dang bral ba'i rin chen khang //
NK103(pe)001:847: mi 'gyur rdo rje rgyu las byung //
NK103(pe)001:848: rang byung ye shes gzhal yas khang //
NK103(pe)001:850: gnas tshul nyid gnas la gnas pa med //
NK103(pe)001:851: de las byung zhing gnas de ru kun 'dus shing //
NK103(pe)001:852: de nyid kyis khyab pas de yi rang bzhin du gnas //
NK103(pe)001:853: de'i ming ni byang chub sems nyid bde chen po //
NK103(pe)001:854: rmad byung thig le'i gnas zhes bya'o //
NK103(pe)001:855: rnal 'byor pa rten pa'i gnas ngo bo khyad par can bstan par bya ba ste gang zhe na //
NK103(pe)001:856: don grub rdo rje'i rigs can 'di //
NK103(pe)001:857: dang po bde ba'i gzhi yin pas //
NK103(pe)001:858: ye shes rgyu las 'byung ba yi //
NK103(pe)001:859: za ma tog gi rgyal mtshan nam //
NK103(pe)001:860: dpag phug rdo rje'i gdan stengs sam //
NK103(pe)001:861: w+aa ra na s+ai'i bsil khang ngam //
NK103(pe)001:862: don grub rin chen sul mngas sam //
NK103(pe)001:863: rgya phug ko sha gling phug gam //
NK103(pe)001:864: don grub bkra shis khang bu ru //
NK103(pe)001:865: ye shes dgos ched dang yon tan bstan pa'i phyir /
NK103(pe)001:866: stobs dang rig pa'i byin rlabs dang //
NK103(pe)001:867: bde ba'i gnas su bdud rtsi bcud spel ba //
NK103(pe)001:868: rnal 'byor tshe 'dzin rig pa'i byin rlabs stong //
NK103(pe)001:869: des na snyigs ma'i rgyu can dang po de //
NK103(pe)001:870: dge ldan rnal 'byor yin na rten gzhir gzung //
NK103(pe)001:871: ngo bo dkyil 'khor rang byung ye shes te //
NK103(pe)001:872: ma bcos dngos gzhi dkyil 'khor nyid //
NK103(pe)001:873: 'bri tshul thabs chen ye shes rang rig gsal //
NK103(pe)001:874: tshad mkha' ltar khyab pa'i bde chen po //
NK103(pe)001:875: ye shes dpag med yon tan gsal //
NK103(pe)001:876: nges tshig snying po len pas man+da la //
NK103(pe)001:877: rang la rdzogs pas lhun gyis grub //
NK103(pe)001:878: de'i yon tan ma spros par yongs su rgyas pas
NK103(pe)001:879: khyab la yon tan ma bsdus par rdzogs par chub
NK103(pe)001:880: // ji ltar snang ba'i chos thams cad ma bcos
NK103(pe)001:881: pa'i thig le'i 'khor du bsdus pas snying po'am gtso
NK103(pe)001:882: // bo'i rgyan te // snod bcud bsam brjod las 'das pas thig le chen po de'i ngo bo'o //
NK103(pe)001:883: de las mtshan ma dang rtog pa ci skyes pa
NK103(pe)001:884: sku gzugs 'bar ba dpag tu med par snang ba'i
NK103(pe)001:885: lha phyogs med pa'i gzhal yas khang mnga' ba //
NK103(pe)001:886: gdod nas che ba'i byin rlabs rdzogs par grub pas rab gnas mi dgos te rgyas so //
NK103(pe)001:887: bdag gzhan thams cad rang byung ye shes kyi ngo
NK103(pe)001:888: bor gsal ba las ma g.yos pas dal du mi
NK103(pe)001:890: snang srid dal du shar ba de nyid bdag nyid
NK103(pe)001:891: chen por gsal bas k+aa w+aa tsi'i dal bskyed pa
NK103(pe)001:892: med // ngo bo la rgya dang dbyibs dang bral
NK103(pe)001:893: kyang rol pa'i ngo bo rgya dbyibs su shar bas
NK103(pe)001:895: snying po rang byung gi dal 'dir phrin las bzhi'i
NK103(pe)001:896: ngo bo rdzogs par bstan pa yon tan thams cad
NK103(pe)001:897: lhun gyis grub pas gru bzhi rgyas pa'i yin //
NK103(pe)001:898: rang rig ye shes chen po la //
NK103(pe)001:899: 'khor 'das ma lus kun 'dus pas zla gam dbang gi dal rdzogs pa yin //
NK103(pe)001:900: mtshan ma'i rtog pa dang brkam chags nyon mongs pa ma lus pa 'joms pas //
NK103(pe)001:901: gru gsum drag po'i gzhal yas rdzogs pa yin //
NK103(pe)001:902: gnas lugs rtogs pa la rang byung dang zhen pa'i 'dzin rtogs spros pa ngang gis zhi bas //
NK103(pe)001:903: zhi ba chen po'i gzhal yas rdzogs pa yin no //
NK103(pe)001:904: ye shes 'bar ba'i lam me ba //
NK103(pe)001:905: 'i ngo bo dang rtogs pa'i dus na dngos po
NK103(pe)001:906: rang rgyud pa gsum 'joms pa'i khro bo chen po'ang
NK103(pe)001:908: bshad cing shar ba'i dal de dag lhang nge lhan ne 'od du zhi //
NK103(pe)001:909: ba chen po'ang rdzogs la gnyis su med par thim zhing 'dus pas thig le'i rang bzhin can //
NK103(pe)001:910: rdo rje nyi ma'i lha chen po //
NK103(pe)001:911: 'di ni rang bzhin rnal ma yi //
NK103(pe)001:912: dkyil 'khor chen po nyid yin te //
NK103(pe)001:913: de nyid khro dang zhi ba la sogs pa'i //
NK103(pe)001:914: bcos mar gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas ma lus pa'i dngos gazhi'am bdag nyid yin no //
NK103(pe)001:915: theg pa mtha' yas pa'i las rnams ma lus kun grub pa'i //
NK103(pe)001:916: rnal ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po ru //
NK103(pe)001:917: rtogs shing de ru zhugs pa med par mngon grub pa'i //
NK103(pe)001:918: rnal ma'i sbyor ba dam pa brtsams pa ni dal thams cad du zhugs pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:919: de ltar dal chen po'i ngo bor thams cad gnas kyang dang por sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pas //
NK103(pe)001:920: dngos bde'i bla ma dam pa'i thabs khyad par can kyis ma mtshon na mi grol te //
NK103(pe)001:921: per na rgyal po phru gu dmangs su 'khyams pa bzhin //
NK103(pe)001:922: du chos nyid rang gi mtshan nyid mi rtogs so //
NK103(pe)001:923: de nyid rtogs par bya na bdag nyid ni khams gsum snang srid 'khor ba'i rang bzhin can dang //
NK103(pe)001:924: mya ngan 'das pa'i bdag nyid yin de //
NK103(pe)001:925: des na 'khor 'das ma lus pa rnal 'byor pa'i
NK103(pe)001:926: shes pa gcig tu rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo yin par
NK103(pe)001:927: dbang gi dus su bstan pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:928: snang srid thams cad thug phrad gsum gyis bdag nyid
NK103(pe)001:929: kyi rig pa la sku gsum rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor
NK103(pe)001:930: bstan pa ni // kun gzhi ni chos sku chen po yin //
NK103(pe)001:931: longs spyod rdzogs pa ni gzhan dang ma 'dres pa'i ma rig pa nyon yid do //
NK103(pe)001:932: tshogs drug ni sprul pa'i sku rgya chen po'i //
NK103(pe)001:933: thun mong theg pa dang tha mal gyi brkam chags
NK103(pe)001:934: nyon mongs pa lnga nyid rigs lnga yin te de
NK103(pe)001:936: snying gi pad+ma rnam shes chos sku'i snying po gcig
NK103(pe)001:937: nyid du bstims pas bdag nyid kyi rtogs pa yang
NK103(pe)001:939: mdor na shes pa'i bye brag dran rtog ci skyes
NK103(pe)001:940: nam mkha' ltar mtha' yas pa thams cad 'khor ba
NK103(pe)001:941: dong sprugs kyi man ngag chu'i chu bur ltar bstan
NK103(pe)001:942: // rgyal ba'i rdul snyed 'jig rten sgron //
NK103(pe)001:943: tsit+ta de nyid rtogs pa'i sems nyid rin chen dkyil 'khor mtha' dbus dang bral ba ni //
NK103(pe)001:944: 'og min gnas chen mu mtha' yas /
NK103(pe)001:946: rtogs na sgra skad ma lus pa'i rnam pa yang //
NK103(pe)001:947: mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo'i gsung du gsal la //
NK103(pe)001:948: gzugs mchog thams cad sku yi dkyil 'khor du gsal bar rdzogs //
NK103(pe)001:949: dran rtog sems kyi rgyu ba kun //
NK103(pe)001:950: mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo'i thugs su gsal ba
NK103(pe)001:951: yin la ma rtogs pa la tshig gis de ltar
NK103(pe)001:952: du bstan pa'o // de ltar rtogs pas snod bcud dran rig thams cad ye shes dkyil 'khor yin //
NK103(pe)001:954: dus gsum khams gsum 'khor ba'i rang bzhin nam mtshan
NK103(pe)001:955: nyid can yin te bshad pa bzhin ma rtogs pas
NK103(pe)001:956: // brkam chags nyon mongs pa drug gi mtshan nyid du zhen pa ni //
NK103(pe)001:957: rgyud drug 'khor bar gnas pa'i sems can yin te //
NK103(pe)001:958: snying chos kyi 'khor lo'i rtsa ni rigs drug gi
NK103(pe)001:959: sa bon drug gi bdag nyid can du gnas so
NK103(pe)001:960: // tsit+ta'i 'khor lo rin po che de rang bzhin gyis //
NK103(pe)001:961: zag pa zad pas mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid de //
NK103(pe)001:964: dbus gsum du 'dus pa'i d+harma tsakra'i lte bar 'dus
NK103(pe)001:965: pa ni mi shigs pa'i thig le dwangs ma lnga
NK103(pe)001:969: rang rgyud rtsa bzhi thig le dwangs snyigs gnyis gar bcas pa ni //
NK103(pe)001:970: dwangs ma lnga'i thig le dag ye shes lnga yi thig le sems //
NK103(pe)001:971: yan lag gi rtsa brgyad kyi gong ma las gyes
NK103(pe)001:972: pa'i thig le zag bcas zag med gnyis kyi rang
NK103(pe)001:973: bzhin te thun mong khyad par gyi mngon shes su
NK103(pe)001:974: 'gyur ma rtogs na dwangs snyigs 'dres pas //
NK103(pe)001:975: khyad par tha mal pa'i dbang po drug po'i lam
NK103(pe)001:976: dang 'brel dwangs ma dang bral na dbang po ma
NK103(pe)001:977: tshang bar 'gyur // yul sna tshogs 'di rnams kyang
NK103(pe)001:978: thabs kyi zin na rang gi bde ba'i theg le
NK103(pe)001:979: tshang bar 'gyur // las // 'du ma zin na
NK103(pe)001:980: dwangs ma yul phyi shes pa nang gi mtshan nyid
NK103(pe)001:981: tha dad can du snang yang //
NK103(pe)001:982: nam mkha'i khams lta bu 'char ba de nyid kyis phye ba yin //
NK103(pe)001:983: te de yang ye shes gnyis med bde ba'i thig le'i ngang du 'dus //
NK103(pe)001:984: snying gi dbus kyi rtsa mdud kyi thig le dbyibs zlum por gnas pa yi //
NK103(pe)001:985: 'dab ma phyogs mtshams brgyad du gyes pa'i /
NK103(pe)001:986: kyi bdud sgo kha cig na //
NK103(pe)001:987: 'khor ba'i sa bon drug dang thugs h'u +aahgasunga +amo sku //
NK103(pe)001:988: 'das pa skyed par byed de kha cig la gnyid gnas /
NK103(pe)001:989: thig le de gnyis kyis khyab pas so so'i nus pa mi bslu ba can //
NK103(pe)001:990: dbus kyi thig le na kun gzhi dang mi g.yo
NK103(pe)001:991: ba'i rlung gnas te gzhan du mi rgyu bas mi
NK103(pe)001:992: 'gyur ba ste gal te 'gyur na tshe'i dus byed
NK103(pe)001:993: par 'gyur ro // de ni yi ge thung ngu
NK103(pe)001:994: a mi g.yo ba yi rang bzhin du gnas pa
NK103(pe)001:995: la 'pho ba'i tshe phyir 'byung ba yin no //
NK103(pe)001:996: rtsa bcud du bcas pa de dang 'brel te 'phros ba'i thig le brgyad //
NK103(pe)001:997: dbus su thabs kyis bsdus shing bltas pas rang byung
NK103(pe)001:998: gi ye shes nam mkha'i gzugs su thams cad skye
NK103(pe)001:1000: de nyid spros pa med pa'i thig le ru 'khyil cing 'dus ba'i tshul du gnas //
NK103(pe)001:1001: snying gi rtsa brgyad 'dus pa'i rtse mo ni 'khor lo //
NK103(pe)001:1002: ltar zlum por gnas te dbyibs kyi dpe gnye ma 'khyil ba'i tshul bzhin du rim par 'khyil te //
NK103(pe)001:1003: mngon shes lnga dang dbang po dwangs ma lnga dang
NK103(pe)001:1004: 'brel thob bya 'bras bu'i dus su dwangs ma'i bcud
NK103(pe)001:1006: rtogs na bde gshegs 'bras bu lhun grub kyi dkyil 'khor brjod pa las 'das pa sprul sku //
NK103(pe)001:1007: bde chen gyi rtsa so gnyis gnas pa mtshan dang
NK103(pe)001:1008: lhag ma rnams la gya brgyad dpe byad rang bzhin
NK103(pe)001:1010: ltee ba sprul pa'i 'khor ba gnas tshul 'khor lo gzugs khams te //
NK103(pe)001:1011: mtha' nas 'dus pa'i dbus kyi thig le'i ming rgod ma'i kha'o //
NK103(pe)001:1012: snying ga la spyi bo gtad nas sbrul lam gnye ma lta bu 'khyil ba'i gzugs //
NK103(pe)001:1013: spyir 'khor lo re re la thig le a wa
NK103(pe)001:1014: d+hu ti la brgyus pa'i tshul du thig le bzhi
NK103(pe)001:1015: bzhi bcu drug gnas pas dga' ba bcu drug gnas
NK103(pe)001:1016: te 'og 'og sdud cing 'dren pas dang yang dag
NK103(pe)001:1019: dngos 'dzin 'di dag sgyu ma zag pa med pa'i bde ba'i ros gang bar snang ngo //
NK103(pe)001:1020: des na thabs mkhas pas yang dag pa'i bde bar 'char bas spyad par bya'o //
NK103(pe)001:1021: thabs la mi mkhas na mu stegs dang mngal gyi grong khyer du 'gyur ro //
NK103(pe)001:1022: snying kha'i rtsa bzhi 'brel pa'i dbus mi shigs pa'i thig le dwangs ma lnga'i bcud dang 'brel te //
NK103(pe)001:1023: thabs kyis ma zin par bsgoms na 'bras bu bsam
NK103(pe)001:1024: gtan bzhi yi dga' bde bar 'gyur rtogs na ye
NK103(pe)001:1025: shes kyi zag med 'char ba can //
NK103(pe)001:1026: thig le'i phyi rol gong ltar 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad can //
NK103(pe)001:1027: thig le thabs kyis mngon du byas na dga' ba
NK103(pe)001:1028: bcu drug de dang 'brel cing nyams su myong ba'o
NK103(pe)001:1029: // 'jug pa'i dang po me rlung gnyis ni rten ma yin //
NK103(pe)001:1030: bzhi pa dang bzhi ste bcu drug ni longs spyod kyi 'khor lo 'dod pa yi longs spyod //
NK103(pe)001:1031: thun mong gi bde ba nyid la spyod pa'i rten yin no //
NK103(pe)001:1032: chos sprul gnyis ni zag med kyi bde ba skyed
NK103(pe)001:1033: pas rin chen 'dzed 'gengs sgyil bas rdzing gi 'gram
NK103(pe)001:1035: rtsa gsum gcig tu 'dus nas brgyud pa'i mdud pa'i
NK103(pe)001:1036: mtshan te me yi 'khor lo la reg pas 'gram
NK103(pe)001:1037: // thig le g.yas g.yon gnyis ni dbus kyi rtsa
NK103(pe)001:1038: la 'dus pas rtsa gnyis la sgo med pa yin
NK103(pe)001:1039: // // 'gro ba'i rgyud rnams kun gyi thun mong gi bde ba dang thun min gyi //
NK103(pe)001:1040: bde ba thams cad myong bar bya ba yin //
NK103(pe)001:1041: thabs shes gnyis ka la g.yas g.yon dbus kyi rtsa la 'dus pa'i thig le bde ba'i mchog /
NK103(pe)001:1042: mgrin pa longs spyod 'dab ma bcu drug gi gcig lce ste des ro la longs spyod par byed /
NK103(pe)001:1043: de yang dbus su 'dus pa'i bde ba rtse yis zin //
NK103(pe)001:1044: snying chos kyi 'khor lo'i thig le brgyad dwangs ma
NK103(pe)001:1045: bzhir 'dus te dang po bde ba chen por bcud
NK103(pe)001:1046: // du 'brel te de nyid rtsa g.yas g.yon gnyis
NK103(pe)001:1047: su 'khyil cing dbu ma la thim nas 'og tu
NK103(pe)001:1048: // 'dzag pa'i rtsa'o // thig le 'khyil pa ni
NK103(pe)001:1049: 'khor lo bzhi ru dga' bzhi rol cing gnas te
NK103(pe)001:1050: // 'dzag pa'i rtsa'o // // spyi bo bde ba chen gyi po 'khor lo bde bas /
NK103(pe)001:1051: gang nas 'dzag pa ltar 'og ma yang gang zhig 'dzag /
NK103(pe)001:1052: bde ba 'khor lo khyab pa dang gyen du bzlog
NK103(pe)001:1053: ste sgor phyin pa dang rtsa gsum dang lus bde
NK103(pe)001:1054: bas rgyas // bde ba'i rtsa'i rlung gi shes pa'i
NK103(pe)001:1055: dwangs ma rnams mi phyed pas rang byung bde bas
NK103(pe)001:1056: bas rgyas // rgyas btab ste // rlung dang rim
NK103(pe)001:1057: par ye shes la thim zag pa med pas dwangs
NK103(pe)001:1058: bas rgyas // rgyas btab ste // ma'i bcud de
NK103(pe)001:1059: // 'dres pas nyams su myong ba ni rdo rje
NK103(pe)001:1060: bas rgyas // rgyas btab ste // ma'i bcud de
NK103(pe)001:1061: // gnye ma'i tshul // du thig ler 'khyil nas
NK103(pe)001:1062: rgyu ba med pa'i thig le bde ba skye 'gag
NK103(pe)001:1063: med pa'i ros gang nas rgyun du gnas pa na
NK103(pe)001:1064: bas rgyas // rgyas btab ste // ma'i bcud de
NK103(pe)001:1065: // gnye ma'i tshul // // khams gsum ye shes
NK103(pe)001:1067: rlung khrag gi nad kyis zin pa'i shes pa'i phyi
NK103(pe)001:1068: rol tshul bzhin du nges par 'grel pa'i gcig 'gyur
NK103(pe)001:1069: // mnyam rjes med par ji bzhin gsal ba'i klungs su yan thub pas phebs pa yin //
NK103(pe)001:1070: ting nge las su rung ba la bar chod rkyen rnams dang bral ba yin no //
NK103(pe)001:1071: mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor lo 'dod pa'i ro la rgyun du spyod pas 'dod pa'i khams //
NK103(pe)001:1072: klad pa bde ba chen po ni gzugs med pa'i khams te //
NK103(pe)001:1073: cis na lus bde bas khyab cing bde ba'i dngos po med pa'i snying po can //
NK103(pe)001:1074: des na thun mong dang khyad par gyi bde ba
NK103(pe)001:1075: 'byung ba'i rgyu yi mchog ste skyed pa dang khyab
NK103(pe)001:1077: longs spyod bde ba'i nam mkha' ltar khyab cing der 'dus pas thig le can //
NK103(pe)001:1078: rnam dag chos sku 'dus ma byas pa'i rang bzhin yin //
NK103(pe)001:1079: 'khor 'das gnyis ka rang rig bde ba chen por snang la //
NK103(pe)001:1080: gsang ba'i thabs kyi nges pa la rgyud drug gi
NK103(pe)001:1081: gnas dang longs spyod gnas la sogs pa dor du
NK103(pe)001:1083: mya ngan 'das pa'i sku gsung thugs //
NK103(pe)001:1084: gzhan du re ba med de snang srid ma lus
NK103(pe)001:1085: rdzogs pa bde ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor yin pa'i
NK103(pe)001:1086: phyir ro te // yul ma grub ba la rang
NK103(pe)001:1087: gis bsam pa'i sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin te rtogs pa'i
NK103(pe)001:1088: phyir ro te // yul // bskyed pa dang mthun
NK103(pe)001:1089: par ye shes kyi dal spyan drang mos pa'i ni
NK103(pe)001:1090: mngon du snang ba med pas yid smon yin //
NK103(pe)001:1091: rang gi rtog pa'i blo yis de dag 'dres par brtags pas sbyor ba rtog pa yin ste //
NK103(pe)001:1092: des na bcos ma'i thabs kyis sbyor ba yin //
NK103(pe)001:1093: te rnal ma dang mi mthun pas ji bzhin dngos la mi 'jug par //
NK103(pe)001:1094: bcos ma'i brnyan ma mngon du byed pa la //
NK103(pe)001:1095: yang dag pa'i lam gyi don la dmigs nas 'jug byed dang //
NK103(pe)001:1096: dper na spre'u rnal ma dang spre 'bag bcos ma bzhin //
NK103(pe)001:1097: rtog pa de yis dngos po rnal ma de yi don mi 'grub //
NK103(pe)001:1098: des na bcos ma'i dkyil 'khor de shes nas mi 'jug par spang bar bya'o //
NK103(pe)001:1099: bstan pa'i rjes thog de nas rang gi sems nyid
NK103(pe)001:1100: yul drug tu byung rdzogs chen gyi dkyil 'khor 'di
NK103(pe)001:1101: // ma bcos pa ji bzhin mngon sum du shar ba kho na bas //
NK103(pe)001:1102: kyang mi grol bas rna brgyud kyi man ngag 'di
NK103(pe)001:1103: la sngar gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor pas de bzhin du
NK103(pe)001:1105: gang la bya na kha dog bkra zhing dbyibs gsal
NK103(pe)001:1106: ba'i gzugs 1dang brjod pa dang bral ba nyid zin
NK103(pe)001:1108: dngos po bral te rang bzhin med pa nyid zhim
NK103(pe)001:1109: pa dang nga ba dang de las gzhan pa'i 3dri
NK103(pe)001:1110: // mu kha'i lce ste ro drug ma bcos pa'i
NK103(pe)001:1111: thig le dbyings las shar kyang de nyid kyi 4ngang
NK103(pe)001:1112: // // reg bya 'jam rtsub la sogs pa sna
NK103(pe)001:1113: tshogs thig le las shar bas dbyings nyid 'dus pas
NK103(pe)001:1115: dran rig sna tshogs de nyid la 'char zhing de
NK103(pe)001:1116: nyid la kun 'dus 6pa'i chos so cog de dag
NK103(pe)001:1117: bde ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor te grangs ni rtsa
NK103(pe)001:1118: ba drug / drug tu snang yang bde ba chen po phyogs ris med pa gcig gi ngang //
NK103(pe)001:1119: de dag tu zhugs shing rtogs na rang byung gi ye shes mu mtha' med par 'jug /
NK103(pe)001:1120: dal de yang kha cig ltar bris pa'am bskyed pa
NK103(pe)001:1121: min pas 'di ni rang bzhin ma bcos pa'i dkyil
NK103(pe)001:1125: rang rig mchog gi slob dpon rnam pa gnyis te //
NK103(pe)001:1126: snang srid brda ru gnas pa ni don de kho
NK103(pe)001:1127: na nyid du rang grol nas gzhan 'grol bar byed
NK103(pe)001:1129: zab mo rtogs pa'i shes rab mchog dang ldan thun min gyi ting nge 'dzin thob pa //
NK103(pe)001:1130: nyan rang la sogs pa'i lta spyod dman pa'i blo
NK103(pe)001:1131: spangs khyad par 'di'i lta sgom kun shes pa'i blo
NK103(pe)001:1132: can // bstan pa ma lus pa'i bcud phyung bas
NK103(pe)001:1133: rtsol ba'i theg pa sa ma reg pas theg pa'i
NK103(pe)001:1134: can // yang thog la // bde gshegs sras byang
NK103(pe)001:1135: sems rig 'dzin dang bcas pa dang 'bras bu dman
NK103(pe)001:1137: spyi blugs kyi dbang 'di la re thag las shing
NK103(pe)001:1138: yon tan ldan yang mi rtog cing 'gro ba la
NK103(pe)001:1139: thugs brtse ba // nang gi nyon mongs pa dang
NK103(pe)001:1140: lha mi'i dri ma thams cad spangs te gnyis 'dzin
NK103(pe)001:1141: bral pas 'jig rten grags pa'i chos brgyad spangs //
NK103(pe)001:1142: sngon theg pa kun la sbyangs pa dang smon lam
NK103(pe)001:1143: btab pa dang lam ma nor bar dag pas bka'
NK103(pe)001:1144: mtha' dag gi mnga' bdag can //
NK103(pe)001:1145: shes rab 1dang dad 2pa dang ldan zhing thun mong khyad par gyi brtson 'grus khyad par du 'phags //
NK103(pe)001:1146: ma nor don rtogs brgyud pa gsum gyi gdung rgyud rdo rje zam pa ma chad pa //
NK103(pe)001:1147: snod gang dang ldan rtog cing gzhan gang gis 'dul gyi sems de'i tshod shes pa //
NK103(pe)001:1148: rab 'bring tha ma'i blo can la //
NK103(pe)001:1149: mthun par gsang bsgrags gzhan du min //
NK103(pe)001:1151: snod ldan la bcud mchog tu sbyin par byed pa thugs rje'i mnga' bdag /
NK103(pe)001:1152: yon tan 'di 'dra'i bla ma khyad par can dad
NK103(pe)001:1153: pa la sogs pas rjes su bzung bar byas te
NK103(pe)001:1154: // dka' bar gyur kyang gzung ba'i tshad srog lus bral yang bla ma yid kyis gzung //
NK103(pe)001:1156: de ltar 'dzin pa'i slob bu ni rgyal ba'i sras chen chos kyi rgyal tshab yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK103(pe)001:1157: ma nor don gyi bla ma ni //
NK103(pe)001:1158: rang gi sems nyid ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas
NK103(pe)001:1159: dang slob dpon du 'char zhing rtogs pa la rag
NK103(pe)001:1160: lus pas kun gyi bdag nyid do //
NK103(pe)001:1161: des na thams cad rang rig tu snang zhing 'dus pas rgyal po bas //
NK103(pe)001:1162: de nyid rtogs na sangs rgyas ma rtogs na sems can kun gyi dngos //
NK103(pe)001:1163: rtog pa snga ma'i rjes su phyi ma 'jug pas
NK103(pe)001:1164: rdo rje slob dpon 'bad rtsol med par che ba'i
NK103(pe)001:1165: yon tan rdzogs pas rin chen bdag /
NK103(pe)001:1166: sems nyid ma rtogs na 'tshang mi rgya bas rgyal ba kun gyi bla ma ni //
NK103(pe)001:1167: de nyid thams cad du snang bas kun byed rgyal
NK103(pe)001:1168: po zhes grags pas rang rig ye shes chen po
NK103(pe)001:1169: yin // rang sems 'di ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
NK103(pe)001:1170: thog mtha' med par mchog tu bkur zhing ma yengs par rjes su gzung //
NK103(pe)001:1171: rang rig ye shes kyi dbang du ma gyur pa med pas rgyal po 'di //
NK103(pe)001:1172: chos thams cad gsang sngags yin te med la mi zad pa mnga' bas gter gyi mdzod 'dzin cing //
NK103(pe)001:1173: bstan pa rgya mtsho chos kyi phung po sgra dang bral bar nyams kyis sgrogs pa'i bdag /
NK103(pe)001:1174: gcig rtogs pas kun rtogs pas man ngag rin chen gter gyi bdag /
NK103(pe)001:1175: rang bzhin ched du byas pa ltos pa'i mun pa sel bas ye shes sgron ma lham me ba //
NK103(pe)001:1176: de'i phyir 'jig rten theg brgyad dang dran rtog kun
NK103(pe)001:1177: gyi bcos ma dang rnal mas ji lta bar ston
NK103(pe)001:1178: pa po // bla ma rdo rje rin chen sems //
NK103(pe)001:1179: yin pas ma bcos pa'i slob ma la ma bcos don nyid ston pa yi //
NK103(pe)001:1180: bla ma rang nyid sangs rgyas der shar bas kun gyi dngos //
NK103(pe)001:1181: de dang ma ldan na phyi'i slob dpon gyi ji
NK103(pe)001:1182: lta bar bstan kyang mi grol bas rdo rje slob
NK103(pe)001:1184: slob ma ji ltar 'dod pa ltar smin pas rin chen sems kyi rang bzhin rtogs pas //
NK103(pe)001:1185: chos kun gyi rang bzhin phyogs med par 'char la dngos po'i de kho na nyid //
NK103(pe)001:1186: phyin ci log de nyid rang byung rgyal po de yi phyag rgya can no //
NK103(pe)001:1187: rdo rje zam pa ma chad pa de yi bcos
NK103(pe)001:1188: ma dang rnal ma dbang gis brda bral gyi don
NK103(pe)001:1189: de thob cing // 'khor 'das thams cad der 'dus
NK103(pe)001:1190: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan de la rag las pas
NK103(pe)001:1191: de thob cing // // ji snyed pa'i rnam rig
NK103(pe)001:1192: de dag thig le chen po de yi rigs las
NK103(pe)001:1193: de thob cing // // byung // dbang 'dis zin
NK103(pe)001:1194: na brkam chags nyon mongs pa drug ldan mngal sogs
NK103(pe)001:1195: skye ba bzhi po de dag ye shes chen po'i
NK103(pe)001:1196: de thob cing // // byung // bdag nyid //
NK103(pe)001:1197: de ltar rtogs na spyod yul rnam par dag pa
NK103(pe)001:1198: bde ba chen po lam 'bras bu thob pa dang
NK103(pe)001:1199: de thob cing // // byung // bdag nyid //
NK103(pe)001:1200: gzhan don bcas // rtogs pa'i dus na thams cad
NK103(pe)001:1201: sems nyid bde chen de bdag nyid //
NK103(pe)001:1202: thun mong gi spyod yul yang sems kyi rang bzhin can //
NK103(pe)001:1203: slob dpon dang slob ma don gcig pa las skye
NK103(pe)001:1204: med rdo rje'i theg pa la 'jug pa la gegs
NK103(pe)001:1206: rig pa gdod nas lhun grub gsum du rang snang
NK103(pe)001:1207: zhing gzhan la'ang ston pa'i bla ma'i rang bzhin te
NK103(pe)001:1208: // slob dpon de yi bka' rtags sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i rang bzhin can //
NK103(pe)001:1209: rtog pa thams cad rtogs pa las ma 'das shing mi gtong bas mi 'gyur rdo rje dbyings //
NK103(pe)001:1210: de ltar bstan pa des na slob ma bar chad
NK103(pe)001:1211: med cing 'jigs pa dang bral bas rdo rje'i bu
NK103(pe)001:1212: // rigs su nges pa'i bka' rtags yin //
NK103(pe)001:1213: 'khor 'das thams cad slob ma rtog pa'i rjes su 'brang bas rdo rje nyid //
NK103(pe)001:1214: ji ltar bstan pa de nyid bla ma dang tha mi dad pas rdo rje'i stobs //
NK103(pe)001:1215: dpon slob gnyis ka'i ngo bo rdo rje ngang nyid rtogs pa skye med rdo rje nyid gcig /
NK103(pe)001:1216: de lta bu'i rang bzhin rdo rje ye shes de nam mkha' ltar khyab cing gdal bas //
NK103(pe)001:1217: des na rdo rje lhun grub pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:1218: thabs rnams kyis brtags pas blo che chung yi rim pa'i rnal 'byor rig cing rtogs pa can //
NK103(pe)001:1219: de nyid ma bcos pa'i man ngag tu sdud dang
NK103(pe)001:1220: theg pa so sor 'thor ba'i lung la blo sbyangs
NK103(pe)001:1221: pa yi // sgra tsam min pa'i don rig pas
NK103(pe)001:1222: nyams su myong ba'i bde bar 'char ba la bzhag
NK103(pe)001:1223: pa yi // na // bskal pa du mar theg
NK103(pe)001:1224: pa thun mong la sbyangs pa'i sbyor ba ma nor
NK103(pe)001:1225: bas blo bogs su 'gyur ba'i rigs can nam //
NK103(pe)001:1226: chos nyid kyi rigs can rang bzhin gyis rgyud dag
NK103(pe)001:1227: pas sngar gang la yang ma sbyangs par 'dir 'jug
NK103(pe)001:1229: man ngag dang lam myur du 'jug cing rin chen thob nas gter ltar du 'chang bas so //
NK103(pe)001:1230: man ngag thob nas kyang bla ma rdo rje srog ltar tu gces par 'dzin //
NK103(pe)001:1231: rtogs nas sgom pa ting 'dzin dang lta ba shes
NK103(pe)001:1232: rab kyis snang srid rtsal du gyur cing thams cad
NK103(pe)001:1233: rdzogs // rtogs goms lhag pa'i ye shes kyis nyams
NK103(pe)001:1234: la phyogs ris dang 'phel 'grib med pas nyi ma
NK103(pe)001:1235: rdzogs // 'char // dad pa dang gzhi byed pas
NK103(pe)001:1236: brtson 'grus ni rgyu 'bras bu slob bu la rdzogs
NK103(pe)001:1237: rdzogs // 'char // // bla ma dang gdams ngag
NK103(pe)001:1238: 'dod pa'i rtsol bas lus ngag rlag par lo zla
NK103(pe)001:1239: dang tshe dang bskal pa stong du //
NK103(pe)001:1240: gyur kyang don gyi 'dod pa mi gtong //
NK103(pe)001:1241: ba ni mi 'gyur ba'i rigs su nges pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:1242: des bla ma'i thugs las bde ba 'bebs pa'i yan lag yin no //
NK103(pe)001:1243: de cir 'gyur na bdag nyid bla ma rdo rje'i srog tu grub cing dbyer med du 'gyur te //
NK103(pe)001:1244: tha mal gyi lus ngag sems gsum kyi rgyu ba med par //
NK103(pe)001:1245: gnas te re dogs chod pa sa de phan chad
NK103(pe)001:1246: rdo rje lus su 'gyur te de kho na mngon
NK103(pe)001:1247: du 'grub pa'o // theg pa'i don ston pa'i rdo rje bla ma gzhan la phan pa'i sems can //
NK103(pe)001:1248: de kho na nyid rtogs pas rgyal ba'i sras su
NK103(pe)001:1249: gyur pa bdag gzhan la phan pa'i yid kyi blo
NK103(pe)001:1250: can des // kyang slob ma rigs ngan pa dang
NK103(pe)001:1251: dad pa dang dam tshig la sogs pa med pa
NK103(pe)001:1252: khengs sems kyis tha mal pa'i 'jig rten dang khyad
NK103(pe)001:1253: med pa'i spyod pas lus dang ngag /
NK103(pe)001:1254: kyang rtogs sam dal bus bgas kyis mthong nas de ma thag tu bla ma des //
NK103(pe)001:1255: kyang gsang ba dam pa'i gter khyim rig pa'i sgo bsdams te thabs dang drag pos bskrad /
NK103(pe)001:1257: de cis na man ngag nyams pa'i rgyu yin pas
NK103(pe)001:1258: gsang ba ma bsrungs na nyes pa shin tu che
NK103(pe)001:1259: ste // dper na lus dang bral ba'i yan lag rgyus //
NK103(pe)001:1260: long ba lnga brgya la glang chen bstan pas glang
NK103(pe)001:1261: po'i lus su ngo shes pa mi thob pa ltar
NK103(pe)001:1262: // de kho na nyid kyi man ngag nyams pa'i thabs zhi gnas thig le rlung rnams kyis //
NK103(pe)001:1263: 'bras bu byang chub kyi lus su thob par mi 'gyur ro //
NK103(pe)001:1264: des na nang gi bla ma ni thun mong dang
NK103(pe)001:1265: khyad par gyi srog yin te de dang bral na
NK103(pe)001:1266: duhkha skye pas // lus ngag sems kyis dus gsum du //
NK103(pe)001:1267: rang gi srog dang 'bral ba'i las mi byed pa ni mchog go //
NK103(pe)001:1268: 'jig rten grags pa dang khe rnyed pa 'dod cing thar pa las ldog pa'i sems log gis //
NK103(pe)001:1269: dam tshig dang don de nyid las nyams par gyur pa'i rgyu shes pas ni //
NK103(pe)001:1270: nang rang dang phyi gzhan gyi don la rgyud sems sbyangs te mkhas pa //
NK103(pe)001:1271: 'khrul pa'i sems grags pa'i brgyad rnam par spangs nas mi gnas pa //
NK103(pe)001:1272: gal te rigs ngan yang don mthar phyin par 'dod pa'i brtson 'grus kyis //
NK103(pe)001:1273: go bgos te dad pa la sogs pa mi ldog par nges pa'i rigs rgyud can //
NK103(pe)001:1274: brtan pa dang mi 'gyur ba ni rdo rje'i lus
NK103(pe)001:1275: te de la shes rab brtson 'grus la sogs pa
NK103(pe)001:1277: bdag gi sems dus gsum du dga' ba'i tshor ba skye'o //
NK103(pe)001:1278: lung man ngag las grags pa'i yon tan gyis sems mkha' ltar rgyas pa'i chos bdag gis thos na //
NK103(pe)001:1279: bla ma'i rjes su mthun pa'i dga' dad 'dun pa'i yid kyis mos //
NK103(pe)001:1280: khyad par du bzung ba bla ma rdo rje skal ldan des kyang //
NK103(pe)001:1281: lus ngag spyod pa ci byed kyang //
NK103(pe)001:1282: g.yo sgyu dang kha gsag med pa'i dge byed cing //
NK103(pe)001:1283: zhal mthong ba dang de'i rnam pa dran pa'i 'du shes tsam gyi rgyud kyis //
NK103(pe)001:1284: mtshams med mi dge bcu la sogs thun mong dri ma kun 'joms shing //
NK103(pe)001:1285: nyi ma'i 'od bzhin duhkha zhi byed pa ni dus gsum gyi rgyal ba nyid der nges pas //
NK103(pe)001:1286: bla ma'i sku gsung rdo rje yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa la //
NK103(pe)001:1287: slob bus kyang de ltar shes nas rtag tu ma yengs par rang gis yid 'dogs shing //
NK103(pe)001:1288: bla ma'i dgongs pa thugs kyis ji ltar mos pa bzhin //
NK103(pe)001:1289: sgo gsum nyid gus pa'i sems kyis kun nas mnyes par byed cing //
NK103(pe)001:1290: dus rtag tu lus dang longs spyod la ma chags pa'i mchod pa 'bul bar byed pa'i gang zag /
NK103(pe)001:1291: de ni rigs kyi bu yin te //
NK103(pe)001:1293: bde ba'i zhing 'gyur skal ldan de //
NK103(pe)001:1294: zhing sa gshin po la sa bon btab pas mi slu ba ltar ro //
NK103(pe)001:1295: mi phyed pas rdo rje thabs kyis rtogs pa'i khri chen dag la bskyon //
NK103(pe)001:1296: skad cig la nges pa rnyed cing re dogs chod
NK103(pe)001:1297: pas bde gshegs nyid du rang rig mngon sum du
