NK103(pe)001:1298: nges par lung bstan pa thob //
NK103(pe)001:1299: yun dus mtha' nyid kyis rtog pa ci skyes de
NK103(pe)001:1300: ma thag tu grol bas 'bras bu'i sa la bkod
NK103(pe)001:1301: pa yin no // de nas de tshul ji ltar
NK103(pe)001:1302: brtag na rdo rje bla ma mtshan nyid bstan pa
NK103(pe)001:1303: pa yin no // des // slob bu'i don dad
NK103(pe)001:1304: pa sogs rtogs pa ni bdag gis gsal ba'i mngon
NK103(pe)001:1305: sum du phrad pa'i dus mam //
NK103(pe)001:1306: lus ngag sems kyi gzhan la chos dang ldan mi ldan gyi gtam gyi brda rtags kyis shes sam //
NK103(pe)001:1307: pra'am rmi ltas la sogs pa chos skyong mkha' 'gro'i lung bstan nam /
NK103(pe)001:1308: gnyis ka'i sems dga' mi dag'i pra yis brtag par bya'o //
NK103(pe)001:1309: de ltar snod du rung na thabs kyis man ngag
NK103(pe)001:1310: gtim pa'i gnas sam de thob cing rtogs na bla
NK103(pe)001:1311: ma rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gdan sa non pa ru
NK103(pe)001:1312: // bla mas de'i rgyud rig nas las dang skal ldan ni bde ba chen po de yi sar //
NK103(pe)001:1313: smin par bya phyir gdams ngag blo'i rim pa ltar sbyin par bya //
NK103(pe)001:1314: 'di la bya btsal sngon du tshogs 'khor gsol ba gdab gnang ba sbyin pa'i rim pa dang //
NK103(pe)001:1315: mngon rtogs kyi thabs kyi rim th+ra k+sha ni pra
NK103(pe)001:1316: ma ste rim pa k+sh+yid ni phrad cing mthong ba
NK103(pe)001:1317: karma ni las zin pa ste //
NK103(pe)001:1318: de ni rtsol sgrub lus dang sems kyi las //
NK103(pe)001:1319: snod ldan la dngos ngag gis mtshon te thig le'i mtshan nyid dang mi 'bral bar gnas pa la //
NK103(pe)001:1320: tha mal dang ched du byas pa'i sgo gsum gyi 'dod rtsol dang spros pa thams cad 'gags //
NK103(pe)001:1321: brjod par bya ba'i lung bstan min te sgra brjod pas thog tu mi 'bab bo //
NK103(pe)001:1322: thams cad ting nger gyur pa ni skal ldan slob ma'i sems kyi dkyil 'khor du //
NK103(pe)001:1323: rtogs pa'i rgyun gyis bde chen rang shar ba'i rnal 'byor pa la phyogs ris med pa'i phyir ram //
NK103(pe)001:1324: de ltar rtogs kyang ma bsgoms na seng ge dong
NK103(pe)001:1325: thag bkyigs pa ltar 'gyur bas klungs su phebs par
NK103(pe)001:1326: 'dod pas // gsang sngags 'phrul gyi spyi blugs tshangs pa rtogs pa'i lam chen nam //
NK103(pe)001:1327: bstan pa theg pa so so'i bye brag blo yi rim pa ji ltar 'tsham pas sam //
NK103(pe)001:1328: rang nyid gang 'dod tha mal gyi sgo nas smad las kyis //
NK103(pe)001:1329: rim pa gang ci 'dod pa de bzhin du //
NK103(pe)001:1330: bstan nas tha ma tshangs pa chen po'i dbang thabs
NK103(pe)001:1331: kyi rgyal pos la bzlas te mthar phyin par bya
NK103(pe)001:1332: // de ltar rtogs na snang grags thams cad rig
NK103(pe)001:1333: pa rang dbang du grol ba'i dpe gsal 'bar rin
NK103(pe)001:1335: bcud len sman dang ma ki ta //
NK103(pe)001:1336: gang zhig thabs dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa la
NK103(pe)001:1337: spang bya de nyid rig pa skye med kyi klong
NK103(pe)001:1339: bde chen du rtogs pa chen po'i thabs te lta spyod ting nge dang ldan par gyur na //
NK103(pe)001:1340: spyod pa dang bya ba'i chos ma lus pa gang gis gang de thams cad la //
NK103(pe)001:1341: bdag gzhan gyi bsam pa gang 'dod pa dang mthun pa'i sgo de nas spyad par bya //
NK103(pe)001:1342: de ltar btsal bya thabs kyi sgo nas ji ltar 'dod pa ci btsal ba //
NK103(pe)001:1343: de thun mong la 'bad rtsol du snang yang rtogs
NK103(pe)001:1344: pa la de yis 'bad rtsol med pa'i las te
NK103(pe)001:1345: // des bdag gzhan gyi don du rtsol sgrub dang 'bad rtsol ci byed kyang //
NK103(pe)001:1346: rnal 'byor pa de'i dgongs pa ni bya btsal med pa yin //
NK103(pe)001:1347: pas nyam dang rtsol sgrub med pa'i lam mo //
NK103(pe)001:1349: bshad pa'i mkha' 'gro'i ltas sam mngon shes lung bstan
NK103(pe)001:1350: dang sbyar ma ma ru ru tsit+ta a b+hi pra
NK103(pe)001:1352: sngags 'dis ni mkha' 'gros slob bu'i rgyud dag ma dag rmi lam du ston pa yi //
NK103(pe)001:1353: dang po slob mas dngos grub ji tsam na thob
NK103(pe)001:1354: kyi rtags kyi mngon shes sgrub pa dang 'brel ba
NK103(pe)001:1355: yin // don dang ldan pa'i snod kyi tshul du rig nas //
NK103(pe)001:1356: thabs chen gyi sbyor ba las rim brtsam par bya //
NK103(pe)001:1357: slob ma skal ldan gyi blo che chung mtha' yas pa yi khyad par gyis //
NK103(pe)001:1358: theg pa so sor bstan pa'i rim pa bzhin //
NK103(pe)001:1359: du rang gang 'dod pa'i smon lam gyi rjes su 'jug na //
NK103(pe)001:1360: so so'i grub mtha' gong du bshad pa'i rim pa bzhin no //
NK103(pe)001:1361: bcos ma'i dbang bskur gong du bshad pa de dag shes rab rim pa gong nas gong du bskyed //
NK103(pe)001:1362: nas brda don bral bas rnam rtog gi spros pa
NK103(pe)001:1363: dang tha mal gyi re dogs bcad la gang bde
NK103(pe)001:1364: bar btang yang thams cad de kho na nyid du
NK103(pe)001:1365: gsal bas // sems kyi dmigs pa zin par 'gyur te rim par gnas na //
NK103(pe)001:1366: rnam par rtog pa nyid bde chen du smin nas
NK103(pe)001:1367: rig pa de kho na nyid ma bcos pa'i dngos
NK103(pe)001:1368: por 'gyur ro // yang na dus gcig la grol ba'i thabs bstan par bya'o //
NK103(pe)001:1370: sems kyi rtog pa'i bye brag cha phra ba'am cha mnyam par 'jug pa kun skye na //
NK103(pe)001:1371: de'i sgo nas sems dpa' slob ma dam pa'i lus su phyogs ma red par 'jug pa ste //
NK103(pe)001:1372: sngon du bya ba zin pa de nas tshangs pa chen po'i dbang //
NK103(pe)001:1373: rgyal ba'i dgongs pa dam pa 'di ni skal ba can 'ga' la bskur bar gyur na //
NK103(pe)001:1374: skal ldan de ni skad cig dus mtha' myur ba yis //
NK103(pe)001:1375: nyid la sems dapa'am sems nyid dpa' bo chen po
NK103(pe)001:1376: rgyal ba dang dgongs pa mnyam pa nyid du 'gyur
NK103(pe)001:1377: // tha mal pa'i dngos por gnas pa la su ye shes chen pos kun tu khyab pa can //
NK103(pe)001:1378: zag pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas rtse
NK103(pe)001:1379: mor rtsa ba las byung zhing des ma reg pa
NK103(pe)001:1380: der phyin pa'o // yon tan mang po ma lus
NK103(pe)001:1381: pa'i rtsal rig pa phyogs bral te thabs kyis dus
NK103(pe)001:1383: rnam rtog theg brgyad kyi grub mthas bsgyur ba yi //
NK103(pe)001:1384: grub mtha' la ma sbyangs pa'i tha mal dngos 'dzin rtog pa can gyi gang zag gnyug ma'o //
NK103(pe)001:1385: rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i lha klu gnod sbyin la sogs pa rnams nyan cing dad par 'gyur ro //
NK103(pe)001:1386: rang gang 'dod pa'i smon pas rjes su sgrub par 'dod na //
NK103(pe)001:1387: dang po thun mong man+da lar //
NK103(pe)001:1388: bco brgyad kyis sbyang dang zhag bcu gcig tu bar
NK103(pe)001:1389: chad bsrung ba la sogs pa'i 'og nas bshad pa
NK103(pe)001:1390: bzhin bya // drag po 'jig rten btang nas dgon
NK103(pe)001:1391: par 'jug nus mi nus brtag pa'i rtsol bas sems
NK103(pe)001:1392: bzhin bya // stobs bsgyur // slob ma rang gi
NK103(pe)001:1393: sems 'jig rten gyi zhen rtog gang la yang spros
NK103(pe)001:1394: bzhin bya // stobs bsgyur // pa med na // de nas bde ba chen po'i man ngag sbyin //
NK103(pe)001:1395: nyams myong skye zhing 'char ba'i dus de ni rig pa'i dus mtha' yis //
NK103(pe)001:1396: rgyal ba'i sras su nges pa yin //
NK103(pe)001:1397: re dogs chad de grol bar mi 'dod pas bde gshegs nyid dang skal ba mnyam //
NK103(pe)001:1398: rtogs goms kyi ye shes la tshad med pas nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam //
NK103(pe)001:1399: rtogs pa'i rig pa'i ye shes nyid rgya mtsho'i klung
NK103(pe)001:1400: ltar zab pa dang rgya che bar ro gcig pa
NK103(pe)001:1401: rlabs la nyam nga ba med pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:1402: mngon du 'jug pa'i stobs grub pa med kyang //
NK103(pe)001:1403: rtogs pa'i yon tan rtsal chen po rig pa'i ngang
NK103(pe)001:1404: la rdzogs te ka la ping+ka seng ge phru gu
NK103(pe)001:1405: lta bu'o // 'o na rtogs na bdag gzhan gyi don thams cad mi nus pa ci zhe na /
NK103(pe)001:1406: dper na seng ge lcags sgrom mig mang su bcug ste dong thag bkyigs pas mchong mi nus pa'am /
NK103(pe)001:1407: kha gdong lcags kyi tha ram du bcug pas sgra 'byin mi nus pa dang 'dra'o //
NK103(pe)001:1409: bya rgod kyi gshog ru bkyigs te bcum pas 'phur mi nus pa bzhin //
NK103(pe)001:1410: rig pa rnal du sems la shar yang bdag gzhan
NK103(pe)001:1411: gyi don mtha' yas kyi nus pa ma rdzogs pa'i
NK103(pe)001:1412: phyir // 'dzin sems dag gi lcags bkrol yang //
NK103(pe)001:1413: goms pa'i bag chags bcings dang 'dra //
NK103(pe)001:1415: g.yo ba rnam par rtog pa'i rlung gi rkyen gyis spar te dkrugs ba yis //
NK103(pe)001:1416: sems kyi dwangs ma'i rgyu ba ma zin te //
NK103(pe)001:1417: rig pa'i dngos po de bzhin nyid kyi klungs su ma phebs par phyogs su lhung shing //
NK103(pe)001:1418: rig pa phyogs bral rtogs pa'i rtsal chen ma byang ste lhun gyis ma grub pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:1419: 'di la rtogs pa dang ting nge'i cho ga'i rim
NK103(pe)001:1420: pa med pa ste rtsol ba'i chu bo dang bral
NK103(pe)001:1421: bas so // dang por gdul bya ma rmongs pa
NK103(pe)001:1422: la snang srid kyi dngos gzhi'i sku gsum dang lhun
NK103(pe)001:1423: grub kyi dkyil 'khor du bla ma thabs ldan gyis
NK103(pe)001:1424: bas so // bstan // rang rig pa kun rdzogs
NK103(pe)001:1425: yul drug gi dkyil 'khor du shar bas ye shes
NK103(pe)001:1426: kyi lus la ma 'dres pa myong bas dgod //
NK103(pe)001:1427: nyams su myong ba'i 'phrul tshig rna brgyud gyi man ngag rna bar byin pas gzhug /
NK103(pe)001:1428: sems nyid phyogs med kyi lung la gtang gzhag med
NK103(pe)001:1429: par bsgom pa'i man ngag khyab gdal gyi nyams dang
NK103(pe)001:1430: bcas pa bstan // snod med la rgya rtags gdab
NK103(pe)001:1431: pa'i cho ga bya ste ral ba'i nyes dmigs 'di
NK103(pe)001:1436: nyams kyis mi bslu bar bkra shis yo byad /
NK103(pe)001:1438: nyams 'phel ba'i yan lag kun ldan pa'i mi ldan na skyo ba skye bas bar chad 'byung bas //
NK103(pe)001:1439: rang gi sems dang mthun te nyams dga' pa'i gnas sngar bshad pa de ru //
NK103(pe)001:1440: gsal byed kyi man+dala khor yug tu rin chen las byas pa'i 'od 'bar ba de'i //
NK103(pe)001:1441: rtsi stan byang sems gzhungs sa klad pa ra dkar
NK103(pe)001:1442: mo yi 'o mas sprin brag dkar po sa zhag
NK103(pe)001:1443: / thang chung bsres pa byugs la thag gcad par bya //
NK103(pe)001:1444: yang na dwangs snyigs phye ba'i dri chen gyis nag
NK103(pe)001:1445: mtshur du btsos pa'i gser chu zhun mas rtsi btab
NK103(pe)001:1446: ste // rgya chu mdog gi gling la yod pa
NK103(pe)001:1447: blangs pa'i be dur dang so ma ta legs par
NK103(pe)001:1449: yang na sha chen dang rak+tasa byug kha byug dri ma bral bar bya //
NK103(pe)001:1450: tsan dan shing dkar po bsad pa'i sol ba yis //
NK103(pe)001:1451: yang na bcud tha ma'i thig le dang dri chus skyong nul bya'o //
NK103(pe)001:1452: bzhu ba'i dngul chu zhun ma'i dwangs byug /
NK103(pe)001:1454: smin mtshams na sme ba dmar po bdun yod pa /
NK103(pe)001:1457: so dung so khor ba la shel chags pa /
NK103(pe)001:1459: mig la shel chags pa skye ba bdun pa tshangs pa'i ste /
NK103(pe)001:1460: pho'i sha tshil zos pa dang /
NK103(pe)001:1461: mo la sbyar bas ci bsgrubs pa 'grub /
NK103(pe)001:1462: tshil khro chu'i ther sor tsan+dana dkar pos bzhu ba zhag /
NK103(pe)001:1463: skye bdun ma bu btsas pa'i 'phrul gyi 'o ma
NK103(pe)001:1464: bsrubs pa'i mar dang bsres pa'i mar skye bdun gyi
NK103(pe)001:1465: ras gos sam rgyus pa'i sdong bu'i me yi //
NK103(pe)001:1466: dud pa thod pa dum bu gcig par btang ba
NK103(pe)001:1467: la mkha' 'gro'i pra sngags zhag bdun bzlas pas mig
NK103(pe)001:1469: mig sprin bteg ste bltas na stong chen 'jig rten rgyu gcig pa ma lus pa'i //
NK103(pe)001:1470: gang gi phyogs su bltas pa de thams cad ni
NK103(pe)001:1471: gsal bar 'gyur te slob ma'i snod dang rang gi
NK103(pe)001:1472: grub tshad brtag / de nas sgo phyogs mtshams brgyad dang ldan pa rat+na'i khri //
NK103(pe)001:1473: yid dang mthun pa la bshad pa'i byug pa kun byas te //
NK103(pe)001:1474: slob dpon lag na rdo rjer gsal bas gser gyi 'khor lor byin gyis brlabs bsrungs byas pa'i //
NK103(pe)001:1475: de yang lha gnas bum pa rtsibs brgyad pa'i 'khor
NK103(pe)001:1476: lo dbyibs gru bzhi sgo dang bcas par man+dala bya
NK103(pe)001:1477: // de dag sgo dbye ba dang gzhal yas su
NK103(pe)001:1478: brlab pa dang nang du 'jug pa'i las rnams thob
NK103(pe)001:1479: // par bya // gnas skabs kyi dang po gdams
NK103(pe)001:1480: ngag thob par bya ba'i sems bskyed nas dbang gi
NK103(pe)001:1482: sems la lta ba dang ting nge mi 'jigs bsrung ba'i lung zhes kyang bya /
NK103(pe)001:1483: brtan pa'i lus su ma red pa la //
NK103(pe)001:1484: bar chad 'byung bas de sngon lag na rdo rjes byin brlabs pa'i nus ldan du gyur pas /
NK103(pe)001:1485: gabsrung ba dang bar chad kabskrad pa'i rigs pa sngags te bu'i mgul du gdags //
NK103(pe)001:1486: 'dod pa lnga'i longs spyod kun la'ang 'byor pas 'di gdab //
NK103(pe)001:1489: gu gul bzlas pa byas la brdeg cing brab bo //
NK103(pe)001:1490: gnas dang longs spyod 'gro nyal dus su de bzhin bya ba ni man ngag go //
NK103(pe)001:1491: +amo badz+ra khayak+sha kro ta dz+wa la ha la ha la h'u phata /
NK103(pe)001:1492: yungs dkar rgyal po la +amo mchog phur la bzlas
NK103(pe)001:1493: pa byas la bsrung pa'am badz+ra tsakra rak+sha rak+sha mu
NK103(pe)001:1494: lu tsu le rak+sha rak+sha h'u h'u h'u /
NK103(pe)001:1495: zhes brgya rtsa'am stong rtsa brgyad bzlas la bsrung bar bya'o //
NK103(pe)001:1496: de nas thun mong ma yin pa'i zas kyis tun tu 'tsho bas /
NK103(pe)001:1497: yang na rgyus chen la srung skud byas la bsrung ngo //
NK103(pe)001:1499: rang gi lus dang bcas te longs spyod dbul te //
NK103(pe)001:1500: rin chen rgya mtsho'i rgyud las /
NK103(pe)001:1502: bla ma la yon phul bas nga dbang che ba
NK103(pe)001:1503: dngos yin snyam pa dang bsnyen bkur ma byas par
NK103(pe)001:1504: btsan thabs su 'dod pa'i sems de dag tu 'dzin
NK103(pe)001:1505: pa gtang // sgo gsum mos pa dang drung du 'gro bar 'dod pa'i bde ba bskyed //
NK103(pe)001:1506: skal ldan theg chen gyi rigs kyi bu de ni //
NK103(pe)001:1507: slob bu dam pa yin te dkon bas gcig cig la bstan par bya //
NK103(pe)001:1508: btsal ba'i gnas 'jig rten khams ni ma lus las //
NK103(pe)001:1509: rab 'byams kun tu dkrugs te btsal gyur nas //
NK103(pe)001:1510: snod dang ldan pa gal te phral gyi rkyen dang snga ma'i las kyis phrad gyur nas //
NK103(pe)001:1511: gzhung mi mthun pas the tshom za bas rtsod par 'gyur bas mang yang gsum las 'da' mi bya //
NK103(pe)001:1512: lam myur du skye zhing tshegs chung bas gdams ngag bcos rnal rim gyis thabs so sor sbyin //
NK103(pe)001:1513: rdo rje rgyal po mi bzhugs na de'i lta spyod
NK103(pe)001:1514: ma nor bar srong nus pa rgyal 'theb thu bo
NK103(pe)001:1515: de la bskur gyi gzhan la mi sbyin no //
NK103(pe)001:1516: dang po ting nge la gnas pa'i dus dang bral ba tha mal pa nas //
NK103(pe)001:1517: mthar phyin thun mtshams bcu phrag bdun //
NK103(pe)001:1518: du bla ma'i gdams ngag dang rang gi bsam pa
NK103(pe)001:1519: gnyis dang ldan pas don la the tshom med pa'i
NK103(pe)001:1521: zhag bco lnga zla phyed ni dbang po 'bring gi thun mtshams ni nyams thob pa'i dus te //
NK103(pe)001:1522: de las gzhan du rab kyi 'ang grangs bco lnga
NK103(pe)001:1523: de nyid kyis rdzogs 'bring gis thun mong gi nyams
NK103(pe)001:1524: rnyed kyang ma bcos pa ma thob pas khyad med
NK103(pe)001:1526: rab kyi de las gzhan par yang na skad cig la ste //
NK103(pe)001:1527: tha mal gyi sgo gsum gyi spyod pa'i yan lag bde chen du nyams pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:1528: dbang ma bskur ba'i dang po bcu gcig zhag gi dus //
NK103(pe)001:1529: rnal 'byor pas ci nus pa'i tshogs bsags dbang gdams ngag lus srog ting nge la bar gcod bsrung //
NK103(pe)001:1530: gong gi sngags ni rdo rje go cha ste des lus bsrung ngo //
NK103(pe)001:1531: khams bzang na 'pho ba'i thun mtshams nyi shu drug la //
NK103(pe)001:1532: thun mtshams brgyad du bsgom par bya ba'i tshul ni //
NK103(pe)001:1533: dngos po phyi nang snod bcud du snang ba thams cad na //
NK103(pe)001:1534: bu des ji ltar brtags shing yang dag tu zhen pas bzung ba yi //
NK103(pe)001:1535: 'khrul pas tha dad snang ba'i rnam rtog zhen pa'i yul de la //
NK103(pe)001:1536: brtags pas de kho na nyid ngos gzung ste shes par bya //
NK103(pe)001:1537: gong du bstan pa de bzhin du thun mtshams brgyad
NK103(pe)001:1538: la ni khams ngan zhing 'khrug par lta na thun
NK103(pe)001:1539: chung la grangs mang bar bslab //
NK103(pe)001:1540: nyin mtshan thun brgyad brgyad bcu drug dag tu thun
NK103(pe)001:1541: tshod grib ma 'pho ba gang rung gis rnam phye
NK103(pe)001:1542: ste bzhi la gso zhing bzhi bsgom //
NK103(pe)001:1543: rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid rgyan dang bcas pa'i lus //
NK103(pe)001:1544: ni bsgom bya'i yul gsal ba'i yul la rkyen gyis mi 'phrogs par blos brtag bya ste //
NK103(pe)001:1545: rkyen gang gis kyang ting nge mi g.yo sems snga phyi la mi lta bar thad du gzung //
NK103(pe)001:1546: bar bya ba ni dmigs pa rtse gcig pas gzhan la mi yengs par brtag pa'i dngos por dmigs //
NK103(pe)001:1547: de dag la nyams brtan nas thun bcu drug gi phyed brgyad po la 'bad //
NK103(pe)001:1548: grangs nyung la thun che bar /
NK103(pe)001:1549: dus gsum thad ka'am bdag brtag pa'i shes pas stong pa nam mkha'i 'du shes dngos //
NK103(pe)001:1550: spyod yul thams cad chad pa'i stong pa nyi tshe ba de //
NK103(pe)001:1551: rtogs na spyod lam kun tu nyams legs par brtag cing de ni ngos gzung bya //
NK103(pe)001:1552: de dag bstan tshul gyi rim pa'i nyams kyi don rnams ni //
NK103(pe)001:1553: thun mong phyogs su ma lhungs pa'i blo yis ngos zin nas phyis lhung ba'i re dogs med pas //
NK103(pe)001:1554: rtogs pa rdo rje theg dman du mi ldog pa'i go bskon te //
NK103(pe)001:1555: bu rigs nges dbang thob pa khyod rna brgyud dang bral bas rmongs pa'i dri ma can //
NK103(pe)001:1556: dus bskal par sbyong ba'i spong 'gegs sbyong sgyur sgrub pas tshi chad pa'i sdug bsngal nyid //
NK103(pe)001:1557: dus ding nas de nyid bde ba chen por gsal bar gnas //
NK103(pe)001:1558: gcong rong 'khor ba'i sgrib pa dang 'thoms pa'i mun pa nyid //
NK103(pe)001:1559: de nyid de 'dir rang byung gi ye shes phyogs med du gsal ba'i sgron mar spar //
NK103(pe)001:1560: snyigs ma lnga la gnas shing brten pa'i gnas ngan khams gsum po dus da lta nyid du //
NK103(pe)001:1561: rgyal ba'i sku gsum zhing khams bde ba'i klong gdal bar bsgyur //
NK103(pe)001:1562: des na nga yi don dang 'brel ba'i tshig 'di
NK103(pe)001:1563: thun mong dang khyad par gyi nad 'tsho bas bdud
NK103(pe)001:1564: rtsi'i bcud // snang srid ye shes su ston pas sgron ma'i 'od gsal bar byed pas 'bar can //
NK103(pe)001:1565: rtogs nas skal ngan la me brjod par rig pa'i steng du nan tan bya'o //
NK103(pe)001:1566: bshad pa rnams rtogs shing goms pa de nas goms
NK103(pe)001:1567: pa nyid kyang brtan zhing mthar phyin par 'gyur ba'i
NK103(pe)001:1568: thun mtshams ni zla ba ste //
NK103(pe)001:1569: blo chung bas nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste lo gnyis kyis mthar phyin /
NK103(pe)001:1570: blo che ba bcu gnyis lo gcig gis lam dam pa //
NK103(pe)001:1573: cing zhugs gang la yang nyam nga ba med par /
NK103(pe)001:1575: re dogs dang 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i tshe mthong ba'i lam zhes bya'o //
NK103(pe)001:1576: de yon tan ji tsam dang ldan par bstan par bya ba ni //
NK103(pe)001:1577: dbugs chen phyin nas rmi sangs bzhin //
NK103(pe)001:1579: tha mal dang grub matha'i phyi rol dang nang na gnas pa yi //
NK103(pe)001:1580: dngos po la zhen pa'i don rnams ma lus skye
NK103(pe)001:1581: lugs gsum du bsdus pas de nyid sku gsum du
NK103(pe)001:1582: man ngag gis ldan par bya //
NK103(pe)001:1583: snang grags kyi chos thams cad rang rgyud pa dang spang ba'i gzhi med de //
NK103(pe)001:1584: brtags shing snang ba de nyid don rang rig nyid
NK103(pe)001:1585: du gsal ba de mthong ba yin pa'i phyir ro
NK103(pe)001:1586: // sems nyid las phyi rol yul dang 'dod yon drug /
NK103(pe)001:1588: bla mas snang ba sems su bstan pa'i dus su
NK103(pe)001:1589: gnyis pa'i chos dngos po mthong bar mi dmigs te
NK103(pe)001:1590: // snang ba thams cad rang gi sems nyid rang snang ma bcos pa kho na yin bas so //
NK103(pe)001:1591: rig par mthong ba de yang phyogs 'dzin gyi dngos por grub pa yod ma yin //
NK103(pe)001:1592: dang por snang ba sems su bstan par yul sems gnyis pa med par mthong pas na //
NK103(pe)001:1593: de ni rig pa gnyis med kyang brtags pa yin //
NK103(pe)001:1594: sems de gnyis pa chos nyid skye med du bstan
NK103(pe)001:1595: pas yul shes gnyi ga med par mthong pas na
NK103(pe)001:1596: // gnyis med kyi phyogs la rung ba'i zhen pa'ang /
NK103(pe)001:1598: 'o na stong pa 'ba' zhig go zhe na gsum
NK103(pe)001:1599: pa skye med de nyid bde chen du bstan pas
NK103(pe)001:1600: de nyid chos thams cad du shar bas spong sgrub
NK103(pe)001:1601: kun byed de ma yin pa med pas thams cad
NK103(pe)001:1602: yin // bde ba chen po'i ye shes su snang yang rang rig skye med /
NK103(pe)001:1604: theg pa rang rang gi 'dod pa kun spangs phyogs med chen por shes pas chags chen po //
NK103(pe)001:1605: 'bad rtsol med par ye shes su kun sgrub pas bde ba'i klong las sel med pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:1606: de yang rang rgyud pa med pas sgyu ma 'bad
NK103(pe)001:1607: rtsol med pas lhun grub gang du yang ma bkag
NK103(pe)001:1608: par longs spyod pas yul la rol //
NK103(pe)001:1609: 'o na rdzogs gzhi de nyid yod do zhe na
NK103(pe)001:1610: de ni stong la thams cad 'byung bas gcig med
NK103(pe)001:1611: kun rdzogs pa'o // goms pa'i gang zag de ni
NK103(pe)001:1612: mthun snang gi rnam pa de nyid sdug bsngal nyer
NK103(pe)001:1613: zhi dang 'dod pa nyer bsten ma yin gyi dgyes
NK103(pe)001:1614: pa chen po rgyal ba kun gyi bde ba de
NK103(pe)001:1615: kun rdzogs pa'o // sgrub na // kun la snang
NK103(pe)001:1616: ba'i yul gyi rnam pa rang bzhin thabs nyams kyis
NK103(pe)001:1618: de 0nyid rig pa khong stong de las gsal ba mngon sum du byung ba dang //
NK103(pe)001:1619: 'byung gzhi'i rig pa de nyid ma grub par mthong pas sna tshogs kyi ngo bo de ldog pas //
NK103(pe)001:1620: spang bya de nyid rang byung ye shes stong pa nyid de yi rang bzhin te //
NK103(pe)001:1621: snang rig stong par snang ba de nyid rig pa de snang zhing de kho na //
NK103(pe)001:1622: nyid las mi 'da' ste dper na nyi ma'am rin
NK103(pe)001:1623: po chen 'od 'bar ba'i rang bzhin yin pa bzhin
NK103(pe)001:1624: du // ye shes kyi rang 'od dang ngo bo de nyid du snang ba las //
NK103(pe)001:1625: yul dang rgyu rkyen dang byed pa po gzhan gyis byas pa min pas rang snang 'ba' zhig go //
NK103(pe)001:1626: rig pa'i rang byung gi ye shes chos skur gnas
NK103(pe)001:1627: pa de mngon du gsal ba'i tshe rnal 'byor pa'i
NK103(pe)001:1628: // sems nyid la rnyog ma'i dri ma med pa la //
NK103(pe)001:1629: dus gsum du bzhugs pa ni phyogs ris med par
NK103(pe)001:1630: mnyam pas nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i
NK103(pe)001:1631: sems rgyal ba'i dgongs pa lhun gyis grub bo //
NK103(pe)001:1632: 'dzin pa rang rig pa'i rlung gis snyigs ma tshogs
NK103(pe)001:1633: bdun dang dwangs ma de kho na nyid chos nyid
NK103(pe)001:1634: kyi rlung // las bems po'i rlung dwangs ma srog
NK103(pe)001:1635: la rten snyigs ma rtsa ba dang yan lag tu
NK103(pe)001:1637: rlung lam du shes na yon tan 'char ba des
NK103(pe)001:1638: na snang srid thams cad de bzhin bshad pa de
NK103(pe)001:1640: cir snang yang de kho na nyid mi g.yo bas dor ba med pa yi //
NK103(pe)001:1641: yul sems gnyis med de rig pa bde ba'i mchog kun tu gsal ba'i ye shes yin //
NK103(pe)001:1642: rgyu rkyen las 'das pas rang byung phyogs 'dzin gyis
NK103(pe)001:1643: ma bsgribs par ye nas gnas pa'i don ma bsgribs
NK103(pe)001:1644: par shes pa de 'og ma ltar btsal ba rnams
NK103(pe)001:1646: rtsol ba'i sdug bsngal dang bral bas bde ba chen po'i bar ma chad pas ngang du shar //
NK103(pe)001:1650: ye shes kyi lus te rten pa dang rtogs dgos
NK103(pe)001:1651: la med na bems por 'gyur bas de dang bral
NK103(pe)001:1653: dus gsum du nam mkha'i mthar gtugs kyang 'byung bar
NK103(pe)001:1654: mi 'gyur te me dang tsha ba lta bu'i phyir
NK103(pe)001:1655: ro // lus de dang bral ba'i ye shes de
NK103(pe)001:1656: kho na nyid de mi srid de nam mkha' la
NK103(pe)001:1657: bgos byas pa'i blun po bzhin no //
NK103(pe)001:1658: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo phyogs med du gcig pas de'i ngang du mnyam zhing rdzogs pa yin //
NK103(pe)001:1659: skyed byed kyi rgyu rkyen kha cig stong pa 'ba'
NK103(pe)001:1660: zhig la ye shes su 'dod pa ni nor te/'du
NK103(pe)001:1661: ba dang 'bral ba ste med pa'i phyogs med kyi
NK103(pe)001:1662: ye shes ni // skyed byed rang rgyud pa'i rgyu
NK103(pe)001:1663: dang bral bar rtsol bas ma bskyed par rang bzhin
NK103(pe)001:1664: ye shes ni // 'byung ngo // zhes bya ba'i
NK103(pe)001:1665: don te des na stong par lta mkhan dmyal bar
NK103(pe)001:1666: 'gro bar gsungs pa bden pa kho na'o //
NK103(pe)001:1667: ji skad du mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i mtshan gzhi can //
NK103(pe)001:1668: de ni srid par mi rung ste //
NK103(pe)001:1669: zhes she na bdag nyid la yon tan gang rdzogs
NK103(pe)001:1670: pa de nyid myong ba dang gdags su rung gi
NK103(pe)001:1671: // min na me zhes pa'i ming dang tsha bar
NK103(pe)001:1672: dang bral na mi thob ba long ba la mig
NK103(pe)001:1673: // can / rigs ngan la rgyal po /
NK103(pe)001:1674: zhes gdags su mi rung ba bzhin no //
NK103(pe)001:1675: des na don dam tshangs pa'i dbang gis mngon sum
NK103(pe)001:1676: du bstan pa bde ba chen por nyams su myong
NK103(pe)001:1677: zhing gsal lo // rtogs goms kyis bde chen gyi
NK103(pe)001:1678: ngo bor rang gi mtshan nyid myongs pas bde bar
NK103(pe)001:1679: snang srid thams cad rgyas 'gyur na //
NK103(pe)001:1680: yul drug du snang yang bde chen ma bcos pa'i
NK103(pe)001:1681: thig le yin pas thams cad du re dogs med
NK103(pe)001:1682: par ci bde bar nos shig pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:1683: rang mtshan ma rtogs pa'i skyon thig le khong stong
NK103(pe)001:1684: 'am ma bcos pa'i bde chen ma rgyas te thabs
NK103(pe)001:1686: rig par snang bar bstan yang ched du byas pa'i rtog pa ste //
NK103(pe)001:1687: zhen 'dzin gyi yul dang bral yang rtog pa 'gags pa yin te ye shes skye ba min no //
NK103(pe)001:1688: gnyis su snang yang gzung 'dzin gyi mtshan ma yin //
NK103(pe)001:1689: yul shes kyi spros pa bkag kyang phyogs med kyi don mi gsal bas rmugs pa yin //
NK103(pe)001:1690: yon tan rang la rdzogs par gnas kyang sgra tsam
NK103(pe)001:1691: yid la byed pa ni log pa'i nga rgyal yin
NK103(pe)001:1692: // tshig tu yon tan brjod kyang brkam chags skye
NK103(pe)001:1693: ste don dang bral na bshad pas 'gro ba lam
NK103(pe)001:1694: // mi ldog pa // des na bde ba la rol pa'i rgyas //
NK103(pe)001:1695: thig le'i dbyings su bla ma'i thabs kyis gdab par bya'o //
NK103(pe)001:1696: cig ste rnam pa yongs kyis med /
NK103(pe)001:1698: des na snang ba'i yul 'di dag bsam gyis mi
NK103(pe)001:1699: khyab pa'i dus na med pa rang gi sems su
NK103(pe)001:1700: rlabs te tha dad pa med pa yin pas //
NK103(pe)001:1701: yul drug gis bsdus pa ril gyi mtshan nyid man
NK103(pe)001:1702: ngag gis sems su mngon sum du bstan par bya
NK103(pe)001:1703: // sgro btags kyi rtog med stong pa'i ngang nyid la rol pa sna tshogs shar ba yi //
NK103(pe)001:1704: tshig 2ma byung ma skyes pa la sogs gi sgro 1btags tha 3snyad pa yin //
NK103(pe)001:1705: bstan bya dngos po sna tshogs 'di rnam par rtog pa rba rlabs yin pas de las grol ba'i //
NK103(pe)001:1706: rang byung ye shes chen po phyogs 'dzin las grol
NK103(pe)001:1707: ba'i ngo bo rnam pa mtha' yas pa'i mtshan nyid
NK103(pe)001:1708: can // yul du snang ba dang 'dzin par rtog
NK103(pe)001:1709: pa de nyid kyis de nyid dag par byed pa'i
NK103(pe)001:1710: brda don bkrol te ci skyes pa nyid //
NK103(pe)001:1711: ma bcos ngang gis ye shes su gsal lo //
NK103(pe)001:1712: gang rig pa'am dran pa de nyid kyis spong len gyi rtog pa thams cad rnam par spangs te //
NK103(pe)001:1713: sems skye med nyid phyogs thams cad du gsal bar rang shar bas yul yul can dang bral //
NK103(pe)001:1714: thag pa sbrul du mthong ba de la bcad btub
NK103(pe)001:1715: mi dgos kyi thag par mngon sum gsal ba'i log
NK103(pe)001:1716: rtog bral te zhen pa ldog pa ltar sna tshogs
NK103(pe)001:1717: kyi snang ba spang mi dgos so //
NK103(pe)001:1718: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo de nyid mthong bas 'khrul ma 'khrul gyi the tshom med //
NK103(pe)001:1719: yul la shes pa rgyu ba med pas yengs pa
NK103(pe)001:1720: med pa ni ye shes rgya mtsho phyogs med kyi
NK103(pe)001:1722: bsgom bya sgom byed med par ngang gis gsal bas ji ltar brtags kyang rtog sgrib ngang gis med //
NK103(pe)001:1723: gcig tu ma nges par rdzogs chen thams cad du
NK103(pe)001:1724: shar te gang yang yin pas re dogs kyi gol
NK103(pe)001:1725: sa med do // phyogs 'dzin rnam dag gi rang
NK103(pe)001:1726: bzhin rtogs pa'i sems kyi ye shes kyi yul du
NK103(pe)001:1727: ma gyur pa rdul tsam med pas so //
NK103(pe)001:1728: snang rig stong gsum gyi ro bde bar shar ba'i ye shes su myong ba yin //
NK103(pe)001:1729: ched du byas pa'i sgo gsum gyi rtsol ba med
NK103(pe)001:1730: pas na rang byung yin te gzhan la rten mi
NK103(pe)001:1731: 'cha' bas so // de la ni ji skad bya
NK103(pe)001:1732: na yul yul can dang bral ba'i ye shes yin
NK103(pe)001:1733: 'cha' bas so // zhes bya'o // rang byung ye
NK103(pe)001:1734: shes de ni 'khor 'das kyi chos kun gyi bdag
NK103(pe)001:1735: ste thams cad du 'char bas so //
NK103(pe)001:1736: mkha' khyab kyi lung ngam don dam bcud kyi lung
NK103(pe)001:1737: ngam bstan pa rdzogs pa'i lung ste 'dir 'dus pa'am
NK103(pe)001:1738: bzlums pas thig le can zhes bya'o //
NK103(pe)001:1739: rang gi rig pa nyid yul dang yul can du
NK103(pe)001:1740: rtogs pa'i dus nyid na ye shes te de las
NK103(pe)001:1741: sel med pa'o // ma bcos pas de bzhin dang
NK103(pe)001:1742: ma bsgribs pas ye shes la sogs pa yon tan
NK103(pe)001:1743: du ma'i gdags gzhi dang ldan pas can //
NK103(pe)001:1744: ched du gnyer ba'i thabs dang rgyu rkyen bral bas
NK103(pe)001:1745: na de las byung ba'i dngos grub gnyis don du
NK103(pe)001:1746: gnyer ba med // des na chos kun mi 'gyur
NK103(pe)001:1747: bar thams cad la khyab pas nam mkha'i rang bzhin
NK103(pe)001:1748: gnyer ba med // can // rnam smin gyi lus
NK103(pe)001:1749: dang bral bas rnam rtog rang rgyud pa'i yan lag
NK103(pe)001:1750: gnyer ba med // can // med // thams cad
NK103(pe)001:1751: kyi rang bzhin nam dngos gzhi the tshom bcad pas
NK103(pe)001:1752: rang rgyud pa'i brtags pa bral //
NK103(pe)001:1753: 'dzin pa kun spangs rol pa sna tshogs 'byung bas 'dzin pa kun gyi dngos gzhi can //
NK103(pe)001:1754: dran zhing rtog pa mi shigs pa'i gsal ba'i rlung
NK103(pe)001:1755: thams cad la khyab pas ye shes rgyus zhes bya'o
NK103(pe)001:1756: // bde ba chen po nyid dbyer med par shar
NK103(pe)001:1757: ba'i thogs pa med pa'i ye shes rlung zhes bya'o
NK103(pe)001:1758: // // kho na de nyid ma bcos pa nam
NK103(pe)001:1759: mkha' ltar khyab pa'i ye shes des gang la ldan
NK103(pe)001:1761: rnam rtog gis dus kun tu g.yo ba med par
NK103(pe)001:1762: kun tu bde ba chen pos kyang khyab pa can
NK103(pe)001:1763: // phyogs su shar ba med par kun tu rang bzhin cir yang gsal ba'o //
NK103(pe)001:1764: ye shes 'di ni rmi lam nyams myong ma bkag
NK103(pe)001:1765: kyang rang rgyud pa'i shes pa mi skye bzhin du
NK103(pe)001:1767: thun mong dang mtshan bcas dang mtshan med dang zhen
NK103(pe)001:1768: pa'i rgyud dang bzhi bral ba te mi gnas pa'i
NK103(pe)001:1769: rang rig ste // spros bral gyi sgyu ma de'i
NK103(pe)001:1770: rtsal ji ltar shar yang ngo bo las ma g.yos
NK103(pe)001:1771: pas 'dzin ma 'gags pas thabs sna tshogs su 'phro
NK103(pe)001:1772: rang rig ste // ba'o // tha dad med pa'i
NK103(pe)001:1773: rig pa stong pa chen po'i ngang du phyogs ris
NK103(pe)001:1774: med par gsal te bde ba chen po'i klong du
NK103(pe)001:1775: rang rig ste // ba'o // 'khyil // rol pa'i
NK103(pe)001:1776: spros pa ma bkag par rnam 'phrul sna tshogs su
NK103(pe)001:1777: shar yang rig pa'i thig ler bsdus te rlabs rgya
NK103(pe)001:1779: shes pa gsum gyis ma bcos lhun grub gsum kyar rang rig pa'i ngang la shar //
NK103(pe)001:1780: ngo bo dang rtogs pa'i ma skyes pa dbyer med pa'i sems nyid phyogs med kyi thig le la //
NK103(pe)001:1781: thams cad thig le'i klong du rdzogs pas re dogs
NK103(pe)001:1782: dang rtsol sgrub bral ba'i sgom med kyi ting 'dzin
NK103(pe)001:1784: rtsol sgrub kyi bya ba med pa'i don la yon
NK103(pe)001:1785: tan kun lhun gyis rdzogs te nyi ma dang 'od
NK103(pe)001:1786: lta bu'o // yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyu dang lhun
NK103(pe)001:1787: gyis grub pa'i 'bras bu gnyis ldog cha tha dad
NK103(pe)001:1788: kyang rgyu rkyen med pas rdo rje'i ngo bor gcig
NK103(pe)001:1790: gzhi lam 'bras bu'i chos thams cad rang sems ngo bo'i yin pa'i phyir //
NK103(pe)001:1791: rang bzhin ched du byas pa ltos pa'i 'dzin rtog
NK103(pe)001:1792: spros pa thams cad de las byung zhing der grol
NK103(pe)001:1793: bas rang zhi // ched du byed pa dang thig
NK103(pe)001:1794: pa'i rtsol ba thams cad kyi rig pa'i yon tan
NK103(pe)001:1795: gyis so so ngang gis grub //
NK103(pe)001:1796: theg pa gzhan gyi rtsol ba'i chu bo nyer bzhi
NK103(pe)001:1797: dang bsnyen sgrub gyi yan lag la rag ma lus
NK103(pe)001:1798: te bral ba'i lam ni mchog yin te bgrod pa
NK103(pe)001:1800: thams cad nyams su myong ba ni dgyes pa chen
NK103(pe)001:1801: po ste bshad pa ril 'dir bsdus pa'i theg le
NK103(pe)001:1802: yin // dmyal ba la sogs pa rgyud drug re
NK103(pe)001:1803: re la yang las mtshan ma ngo bo yul gyi
NK103(pe)001:1804: rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad dang
NK103(pe)001:1805: yin // // phyogs 'dzin gyi mya ngan las 'das
NK103(pe)001:1806: pa ni myang 'das te rgyal ba'i sku gsung thugs
NK103(pe)001:1807: yin // // la sogs pa // che ba'i yon
NK103(pe)001:1808: tan ma lus pa kun kha na ma tho ba
NK103(pe)001:1809: med pa'i bde chen rig pa phyogs med pa'i ngang
NK103(pe)001:1811: ltar rtogs pa'i dus na ji bzhin pa dang ma
NK103(pe)001:1813: ji snyed pa'i chos kun 'dir rdzogs la yul dang
NK103(pe)001:1814: ngo bo mtshan ma'i spros pa med pa'i ngang du
NK103(pe)001:1815: gsal // chos thams cad ro gcig par 'dus pas chos ma lus pa 'byung /
NK103(pe)001:1817: dbang sgyur bas kun gyi bdag po'o //
NK103(pe)001:1818: phyogs med gdeng du gyur pas rnam par rtog pa
NK103(pe)001:1819: ma mthong bas rtog pa'i ngo bo'i rgyu ba bral
NK103(pe)001:1820: // de'i nus pa dang rtogs pa'i stobs kyis dus gsum bral ba'i rang rig nyid //
NK103(pe)001:1821: sgom pa'i rtsol ba dang bral bas rtogs pa'i ye shes rgyun mi 'chad //
NK103(pe)001:1822: thun mong dang thun min gyi rnam rtog rang rang
NK103(pe)001:1823: gi lta sgom 'bras bu la zhen pa'i mtshan ma
NK103(pe)001:1824: ji snyed pa'ang rtsa ba rang byung ji bzhin pa
NK103(pe)001:1825: thig le las mi 'gyur bar de kho na nyid
NK103(pe)001:1826: du gsal ba'o // zhen brtags ye shes su gnas
NK103(pe)001:1827: 'gyur ba ni dus gsum gyi rgyal ba'i dgongs pa
NK103(pe)001:1828: bdag la gsal ba'i lung chen yin //
NK103(pe)001:1829: theg pa 'og ma'i byed rtsol rnams 'dir thams cad rol pa rang snang la ma spangs pas //
NK103(pe)001:1830: 'jig rten 'das pa'i lam 'bras kyi yon tan dang
NK103(pe)001:1831: 'jig rten mthong lam ma thob pa tshe dang longs
NK103(pe)001:1833: sems kyi rol pa ma lus pa rang las byung zhing gnas pas 'dus //
NK103(pe)001:1834: shes bya ma lus pa thams cad sgrub pa'i lam
NK103(pe)001:1835: mchog dang ting nge dang ye shes kyi ngo bor
NK103(pe)001:1836: gyur pas kun gyi bdag nyid yin no //
NK103(pe)001:1837: theg pa rang rang gi 'dod pa smin pa'i 'bras
NK103(pe)001:1838: bu 'dir ma btsal bar rdzogs pas kun gyi dngos
NK103(pe)001:1839: gzhi can // theg brgyad kyi rtsol sgrub kyis mthun
NK103(pe)001:1840: pa blang mi mthun pa dor skyed byed kyi rgyu
NK103(pe)001:1842: lus can ma lus pa rtsol bas so sor ma bsgrubs kyang thams cad 'dus //
NK103(pe)001:1843: rang rang gi 'dod pa rtsol bas thob par byed
NK103(pe)001:1844: pas bsnyen sgrub don du gnyer ba'i rgyu rkyen kun
NK103(pe)001:1845: dang bral ba'o // lung rigs kyis gang 'thad blang
NK103(pe)001:1846: 'gal ba dor 'bras bu la mos shing 'dod pa'i
NK103(pe)001:1847: phyogs 'dzin gyi rtsol ba la dga' ba'i //
NK103(pe)001:1848: lam mthar phyin pas bogs dbyung du med par che
NK103(pe)001:1849: ba'i 'bras bu phyogs 'dzin gyis thob par 'dod na
NK103(pe)001:1850: // dpe blo chung bas rmongs pa'i rmu long rgod de bya ba mang bas nam mkha' la //
NK103(pe)001:1851: gser gyi them skas tshol kyang mi 'grub ba 'dra //
NK103(pe)001:1852: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi ngo bor mthong ba las
NK103(pe)001:1853: thabs sna tshogs kyis grol bar 'dod pa'i sems kyis
NK103(pe)001:1854: // thar pa'i go 'phang blang ba dang 'khor ba'i
NK103(pe)001:1855: rgyu 'bras dor ba'i sdug bsngal spong 'gegs la sogs
NK103(pe)001:1856: pa byed cing rtsol ba yis //
NK103(pe)001:1857: 'bras bu 'dod pa'i dbang gis rdo la gser bzhin
NK103(pe)001:1858: log par lta ba ni 'khor bar spyi 'greng rdeg
NK103(pe)001:1859: pas sgo 'dir zhugs pa mchog go //
NK103(pe)001:1860: don dam tshangs pa'i dbang 'di ni dgos pa 'byung bas rin chen mi zad pas gter gyi dngos //
NK103(pe)001:1861: yin la chos kun rig pa phyogs med du mi
NK103(pe)001:1862: phyed pas don gcig 'khor 'das kyi rnam pa kun
NK103(pe)001:1863: gyi sems bdag / nyid du rtogs pas lam bgrod
NK103(pe)001:1864: du med de lhun grub gsum nyid sku gsum du
NK103(pe)001:1865: rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol ba'i lam //
NK103(pe)001:1866: che ba'i khyad par kun 'dir rdzogs pa'i ji bzhin pa nyid 'bras bu'i mchog /
NK103(pe)001:1867: tu shar ba ni rtsol ba la mi ltos pas
NK103(pe)001:1868: rgyu 'bras dus gcig tu dbyer med pas thig le'i
NK103(pe)001:1869: ngang // las ma 'das pas bya med lhun sngar bshad rdzogs sems kyi gter //
NK103(pe)001:1870: snang srid skur gsal ba'i dus na spyod yul ril
NK103(pe)001:1871: rgyan du ma gyur pa med pas thun min gyi
NK103(pe)001:1872: dpe byad dang mtshan chen po'i rgyan rdzogs te //
NK103(pe)001:1873: snang srid thams cad ye shes mtshon pa'i thabs su
NK103(pe)001:1874: ma gyur pa med pas phyag rgya dri ma med
NK103(pe)001:1875: // rnam par rtog pa thams cad dbang thob dus
NK103(pe)001:1876: na rig pa de bzhin nyid las mi 'gyur ba
NK103(pe)001:1877: dri ma med par gsal ba'i thugs yin pa'i phyir
NK103(pe)001:1878: // // snang srid sku gsung thugs kyi rgyas btab cing de'i ngo bor gsal bas phyag rgya can //
NK103(pe)001:1880: nyon mongs pa sogs par snang yang ma nges pa'i
NK103(pe)001:1881: ting 'dzin thun mong ma yin pa'i bde ba chen
NK103(pe)001:1882: po'i ror ma gyur ba med pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:1883: dran rtog ci skyes kyang ting nge'i yan lag seng
NK103(pe)001:1884: ge rnam par bsgyings pa la sogs pa'i ting 'dzin
NK103(pe)001:1885: stong dang rtog pa gang skyes ting nger bcas //
NK103(pe)001:1886: rtog pa thams cad kyi ngo bo mi rtog pa'i
NK103(pe)001:1887: bde ba las gzhan med par gcig tu 'khyil ba'o
NK103(pe)001:1888: // lo ka dang rtsol brgyad kyi bde ba ma
NK103(pe)001:1889: lus pa kun rang grol chen por grub pa'i bde
NK103(pe)001:1890: // ba can // rang gzhan gang du'ang mi rtog
NK103(pe)001:1891: ste rang byung ye shes bde ba chen po'i thugs
NK103(pe)001:1892: // ba can // so // rang byung ye shes
NK103(pe)001:1893: blos dpag tu med kyang ting 'dzin 'bum phrag gi
NK103(pe)001:1894: // ba can // so // sgo // ni theg
NK103(pe)001:1895: pa gzhan gyis bskal pa mang pos thob la theg
NK103(pe)001:1896: pa 'dis ni gang zag skal ldan la dang po
NK103(pe)001:1897: rtogs pa'i dus nyid nas rdzogs pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:1898: rgyud drug bshad zin 'khor ba ma lus pa'i //
NK103(pe)001:1905: snyigs ma la sogs par snang ba'i rnam pa ji snyed bsam gyis mi khyab pa //
NK103(pe)001:1906: gzugs spyi'i rnam par snang ba rags bshad zin pas bsdus pa kun //
NK103(pe)001:1907: ji snyed pa'i lus de dag thams cad rang las
NK103(pe)001:1908: byung zhing 'du bas 'khyil pa'i de nyid ye shes
NK103(pe)001:1910: nam mkha' ltar tshad bzung ba las 'das pa'i sku ste rang la gnas pas rdzogs te //
NK103(pe)001:1911: zag med kyi ye shes ma lus pa 'dus pa'i gang gis kyang mdzes pa'i rgyan mnga' ba //
NK103(pe)001:1912: des na sku lnga bzhi gsum la sogs pa ma
NK103(pe)001:1913: lus 'dus pa sku yi bcud de rig pa'i sku
NK103(pe)001:1914: yin pas so // gang la grags kyang ngo bos
NK103(pe)001:1915: stong pas yul shes su 'dzin cing pa chags pa
NK103(pe)001:1916: dang bral ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gsung
NK103(pe)001:1918: rgyud drug gi brda dang sgra skad mtha' yas pa /
NK103(pe)001:1922: rig pa rang snang gi la sogs te //
NK103(pe)001:1923: rab 'bring la sogs yi ge pa brjod pa rnams //
NK103(pe)001:1924: ma lus pa skye med rdo rje'i gsung //
NK103(pe)001:1925: du mjal zhing snang bar mdzad pas rmad byung gcig
NK103(pe)001:1926: go bas kun go ba lhun gyis grub pa'i gsung
NK103(pe)001:1927: dbyangs nyid // cir yang mi rtog pa'i ye shes su brda mjal zhing thams cad go //
NK103(pe)001:1928: bar ston bas de dag thams cad ma bcos pa'i
NK103(pe)001:1929: don ston pa'i rig pa'i dal du 'jug pa'i sgo
NK103(pe)001:1931: lhun grub tu dbugs phyung ba'i bde chen dri ma med par ston pas tshangs pa'i gsung //
NK103(pe)001:1932: sku gsung thugs thams cad kyang sems nyid la rdzogs pas 'bad rtsol med pa'i bde ba chen po //
NK103(pe)001:1933: rgyu rkyen gzhan bcad pas rang byung 'bad rtsol med
NK103(pe)001:1934: pas lhun grub gang dang yang dbyer med pas rdo
NK103(pe)001:1935: rje ste // sku gsung thugs rdo rje gsum 'dus pas yon tan kun gyi dngos gzhir gyur //
NK103(pe)001:1936: shes pa brgyad 'dus pa'i rang bzhin thig le rnam
NK103(pe)001:1937: shes dgu pa de las tshogs brgyad 'byung zhing thim
NK103(pe)001:1938: pa yi bdag / rnam shes brgyad kyi snying po
NK103(pe)001:1939: ye shes lnga yin la de yang rtogs pa'i shes
NK103(pe)001:1940: pa la 'dus pas rdo rje mnga' mdzad pas rgyal
NK103(pe)001:1941: pa yi bdag / // snang srid bde ba chen
NK103(pe)001:1942: po'i dal du rig pa'i sdug bsngal la rig pa'i
NK103(pe)001:1943: pa yi bdag / // rgya // btab pa las
NK103(pe)001:1944: mi 'da' la de sus rtogs pa kun grol zhing
NK103(pe)001:1945: bde ba'i lam nyid la gzud de sgra dang bral
NK103(pe)001:1946: ba'i tsit+ta'i dkyil du bstim mo //
NK103(pe)001:1949: phyag na rdo rje lung gsum gyis rgyal byed kun
NK103(pe)001:1950: dga' la brgyud pa'i mdo chen 'di nyid yin no
NK103(pe)001:1951: // bya ba dang yo ga bzhi ste lnga dang
NK103(pe)001:1952: spyir theg pa'am ma khyad par klong dgu'i bdag nyid
NK103(pe)001:1953: gsum sku gsung thugs te de dag ril gyi mdo
NK103(pe)001:1954: // ni dbang 'adi'o // chos ma lus pa'i gzhir
NK103(pe)001:1955: gyur pa ni bdag gi rig pa dngos po med
NK103(pe)001:1956: // ni dbang 'adi'o // pa // brjod pa kun
NK103(pe)001:1957: gyi gzhi tha snyad kun tu snang bas bdag nyid
NK103(pe)001:1959: dag tu snang zhing bya ba byed kyang yi ge
NK103(pe)001:1960: la sogs pa gang du snang ba de dag tu
NK103(pe)001:1961: 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog rgyu ba bral ba'o //
NK103(pe)001:1962: nam mkha'i dngos pos stong ste mi snang pa bzhin //
NK103(pe)001:1963: du gnas lugs bstan pa dang bral yang ma lus
NK103(pe)001:1964: pa thams cad kyi ngo bor shar bas sems kyi
NK103(pe)001:1965: gter te gzhan la snang ba med pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:1966: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga nyid dbang po lnga'i longs
NK103(pe)001:1967: spyod de de nyid rgyal ba rnams kyis kyang spyad
NK103(pe)001:1969: de cis na dbang yul drug po de nyid ni
NK103(pe)001:1970: ye shes chen po thug pa med pa'i longs spyod
NK103(pe)001:1971: gter gyi bcud // de rtogs te goms nas bde
NK103(pe)001:1972: ba chen po'i longs spyod nam mkha' ltar rgya chad
NK103(pe)001:1974: tu gyur pa mthong nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams
NK103(pe)001:1975: rang gsal ba'i gzhal yas de tshom zhing bde bar
NK103(pe)001:1976: byed pa'i gnas // de ni thun mong gi spyod
NK103(pe)001:1977: yul du ma gyur pas gsang ba'i gnas chen zhes
NK103(pe)001:1978: bya la phyogs 'dzin gyi dri rnyog dag pa'i gnas
NK103(pe)001:1979: byed pa'i gnas // so // dang po skyed pa'i
NK103(pe)001:1980: rgyu dang bral ba'i ra kun gyi dngos gzhir shar
NK103(pe)001:1981: bas tha ma gang du yang 'gag med du rang
NK103(pe)001:1982: byed pa'i gnas // so // gsal ba can //
NK103(pe)001:1983: rgyal ba kun gyi sku gsung thugs nyid ngo mtshar
NK103(pe)001:1984: rmad du byung ba'i ngo bo yang sems kyi /
NK103(pe)001:1985: de kho na nyid kyi bcud do //
NK103(pe)001:1986: che ba'i yon tan ma lus pa 'dus pa'i rin po che //
NK103(pe)001:1987: brjod bya chos kyi phung po nam mkha' ltar rgya
NK103(pe)001:1988: mnyam zhing mtha' thug pa ma lus kun ngo bo
NK103(pe)001:1989: gcig tu 'dus pa'i bdag nyid ni phyogs bcu na
NK103(pe)001:1990: bzhugs pa'i // rgyal ba ma lus pas gsungs pa'i bstan pa kun gyi gtso bor gyur pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:1991: de ni rgyal ba kun gyi thugs kyi bcud 'dus pa rtogs nas de nyid lam du gyur pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:1992: bdag gzhan med pas spyod yul dang bral te gang yang ma yin ba'i rang rig de nyid ni //
NK103(pe)001:1993: bde gshegs rgyal ba kun gyi thugs yin par bstan to //
NK103(pe)001:1994: dngos gzhi bral ba'i ye shes de nyid //
NK103(pe)001:1995: kyi rang bzhin dang rtogs pa las bde gshegs dang
NK103(pe)001:1996: rgyal ba ste de dag 'di las byung bas kun
NK103(pe)001:1997: gyi yum mo // 'di las chos ma lus pa spros pas 'khor 'das kun gyi rgyu'o //
NK103(pe)001:2001: ngo bo nyid kyi zag pa zad pa ni rgyu rkyen gyis 'dus ma byas so //
NK103(pe)001:2002: bstan pa'i chos kun 'dus shing de nyid kyi thig le chen po'i bcud du gyur pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:2003: rang rig pa'i ngang du gsal la de nyid rang
NK103(pe)001:2004: byung gi ye shes kyi sgron ma ste de la
NK103(pe)001:2005: // 'phel 'grib med pas nam mkha'i dbyings she'o //
NK103(pe)001:2006: rtogs ni ji snyed pa'i sdug bsngal ji ltar rgyu
NK103(pe)001:2007: ma spangs rang byung ye shes su dag pas bde
NK103(pe)001:2008: ba'i klong du 'khyil ba yin no //
NK103(pe)001:2009: 'khor ba dang nyon mongs pa spang du med pas ye shes bsgrub pa dang bral lo //
NK103(pe)001:2010: 'bras bu la re ba med pas 'khor ba la dogs pa bcom pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:2011: shes bya shes byed kyi rgyun bcad pas yul yul can dang bral ba'o //
NK103(pe)001:2012: tha mal dang ched du byas pa'i brkam chags lnga
NK103(pe)001:2013: dang bral te rang byung gi ye shes su gsal
NK103(pe)001:2014: bas // 'khor ba'i rnam rtog ci skyes pa nyid ye shes chen po'i klong du snang ngo //
NK103(pe)001:2015: ched du byed pa dang theg pa so so'i rtsal ba dang ting 'dzin gyi rim pa spangs nas //
NK103(pe)001:2016: rang rang gi 'bras bu gzhan nas thob par 'dod pa'i yul dang bral lo //
NK103(pe)001:2017: las dge dang mi dge gang la yang khur du lta ba'i rnam rtog bral //
NK103(pe)001:2018: chos thams cad 'dir mnyam zhing rdzogs pa chen po'i
NK103(pe)001:2019: yin la de nyid thig le chen po yin bas
NK103(pe)001:2020: // dkar gsum mngar gsum gtsang dang sha lnga bdud
NK103(pe)001:2021: rtsi lnga sme bar 'dzin ba'i blo rtog dor zhes
NK103(pe)001:2022: // gdams // phyi nang gi chos thams cad ma lus rang byung ye shes su gsal la //
NK103(pe)001:2023: ji ltar spyod pa thams cad rnam par dag dal
NK103(pe)001:2024: gang du yang rtog pa med pas gnang ba dang
NK103(pe)001:2026: ji ltar 'dod dgu bde bar spyod ces bya'o //
NK103(pe)001:2027: rtogs nas gang du'ang mi rtog bde chen phyogs med du shar ba nyid //
NK103(pe)001:2028: de nyid ni spyod pa'i rgyal po yin pas rgya mtsho zhes ste //
NK103(pe)001:2029: ma rtogs par lus ngag yid gsum gyi spyod pa gtso bo ru 'jog par byed pa //
NK103(pe)001:2030: de yang zhes pa'i spyod pa nyid yin te rang byung dang dam pa'i spyod pa min no //
NK103(pe)001:2031: rang byung lhun grub kyi don la gnas pa de nyid la //
NK103(pe)001:2032: lam gyi yan lag kun de nyid kyi yon tan
NK103(pe)001:2033: gyi cha la rdzogs pas 'og ma las khyad par
NK103(pe)001:2034: che de'i don bstan pa'i phyir //
NK103(pe)001:2035: mi dmigs sgyu ma'i brkam chags kyi duhkha dang bral bas bde mchog ni //
NK103(pe)001:2036: dus rtags tu snang rig stong gsum dbyer med par gsal na lta ba yin no //
NK103(pe)001:2037: de nyid ma bsgoms kyang gsal bar gdeng du phebs na sgom pa'i mchog go //
NK103(pe)001:2038: sku gsung thugs kyi snying po chub par rtogs pas dkyil 'khor yin no //
NK103(pe)001:2039: thabs kyis bstan yang gdod nas rang la rdzogs pas dbang bskur yang rdzogs pa yin no //
NK103(pe)001:2040: rtogs pa'i don de nyid sgo gsum gyis nyams su len par ni spyod pa'i mchog go //
NK103(pe)001:2041: nam yang bde mchog las skad cig kyang mi g.yo ba ni ye shes 'bar ba'i klong //
NK103(pe)001:2042: sa lam ji ltar spyad kyang de'i ngang las mi
NK103(pe)001:2043: ldog cing bde ba chen po'i klong du gyur pa
NK103(pe)001:2044: // de ni don gyi snying po sgyub pa'i dngos grub khyad par can 'grub pa'i mchog 'bras bu //
NK103(pe)001:2045: ye nas ngo bo nyid kyis mi 'da' ba yi
NK103(pe)001:2046: rtogs nas bsrung mi dgos pa dam tshig yin ste
NK103(pe)001:2047: // rang byung rtogs pa'i phyag rgyas btab cing de'i
NK103(pe)001:2048: don la bya byed med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis sgrub
NK103(pe)001:2049: pa'i sgro skur med pa'i lung chen yin no //
NK103(pe)001:2050: 'dod yon ma lus pa bde ba chen po'i klong
NK103(pe)001:2051: du thim zhing rnam rtog skye med kyi zhal du
NK103(pe)001:2053: bde ba chen po'i mchod pa yin //
NK103(pe)001:2054: mchod pa dang yul kyang rang la gsal bar rdzogs pas phul ba yin //
NK103(pe)001:2055: snang srid sku gsum du byin gyis brlabs pas phyogs 'dzin ye nas dag /
NK103(pe)001:2056: dus rtag tu rang las byung bas mchod pas rol
NK103(pe)001:2057: zhing snying po'i don du bstab na mchod pa'i gnas
NK103(pe)001:2059: rtogs pas gnyis su med par gyur pas bde ba
NK103(pe)001:2060: chen po mdzes pa'i rgyan du ma gyur pa med
NK103(pe)001:2061: pa'o // gdul bya'i don ma lus pa ji ltar
NK103(pe)001:2062: bsam pa ltar rdzogs shing 'byung pas rin po che
NK103(pe)001:2063: pa'o // zhes bya'o // de bas na rang rig
NK103(pe)001:2064: 'pho 'gyur med pa ni rmad byung ngo mtshar gyi
NK103(pe)001:2065: pho brang snying po yongs su rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor
NK103(pe)001:2066: pa'o // zhes bya'o // che // che ba'i yon
NK103(pe)001:2067: tan kun rdzogs rgyal ba bzhugs pa'i pho brang ste
NK103(pe)001:2069: 'gro ba'i bla ma yon tan rin chen dang 'dra
NK103(pe)001:2070: zhing srog gsum du 'gyur ba rtogs goms dang ldan
NK103(pe)001:2071: pa des // phyin ci log thams cad bdag nyid
NK103(pe)001:2072: du rtogs te lta dgongs zab pa'i gdeng dang ldan
NK103(pe)001:2073: pa des // na // chos thams cad la nyam
NK103(pe)001:2074: nga ba med par dbang bsgyur ba ni dbang phyug
NK103(pe)001:2075: rgyal po ste phyogs ris med pa'i don la zhugs
NK103(pe)001:2076: pa des // na // pa yin // rtogs pa'i
NK103(pe)001:2077: thabs dang ldan na lhun grub kyi rang gnas yin
NK103(pe)001:2078: pa des // na // pa yin // // lhun
NK103(pe)001:2079: grub gsum rang nyid sku gsum du gsal na spyan
NK103(pe)001:2080: pa des // na // pa yin // // drangs pa yin // pas gzhan nas bstim mi dgos /
NK103(pe)001:2081: bdag gzhan du 'dzin pa dang bral na dri ma dus gcig la dag pa zhes bya'o //
NK103(pe)001:2082: rtogs pa'i don dang mi 'bral ba'i mos pa dang
NK103(pe)001:2083: ldan na rtsol ba dang bral ba ni smon pas
NK103(pe)001:2084: 'phags pa'o // phyogs 'dzin gyi don la chags pa
NK103(pe)001:2085: dang bral rang rig don gyi na bla ma mnyes
NK103(pe)001:2086: te rgyal ba rig 'dzin bla ma kun dus gcig
NK103(pe)001:2088: rgyal ba kun gyi dgongs pa'i zhe phugs ni dgu
NK103(pe)001:2089: rum du sbas pa'i thig le thabs dang bcas pa'i
NK103(pe)001:2090: man ngag de // bde chen gyi gdeng du dbang
NK103(pe)001:2091: gi sgo nas bstan na de kho na nyid kyi
NK103(pe)001:2093: thun mong gi 'dul sdom dam tshig ltar bsrung mtshams dang bcas pa ni /
NK103(pe)001:2095: rtogs pa'i gdengs las mi g.yo bar rten par mtshams kyi //
NK103(pe)001:2096: dam tshig 'di yang gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba /
NK103(pe)001:2097: yang gsang rmad byung gi dam tshig ste //
NK103(pe)001:2098: thun mong gi 'dul sdom dang phyi nang gi dam tshig las 'phags pas khyad par can te //
NK103(pe)001:2099: sgo gsum gyis ched du bsrung bya med de ma bsrungs kyang 'gal ba med /
NK103(pe)001:2101: thabs khyad par can nam 'phrul gyi lung bcus bcos
NK103(pe)001:2102: ma rnal mar rtog pa dang ldan don las ma
NK103(pe)001:2104: bsnyen sgrub la sogs pa'i rtsol bas mngon du sgrub pa mi dgos te //
NK103(pe)001:2105: de'i don dbang gi dus su rdo rje'i nyid mtshon
NK103(pe)001:2106: pa'i tshig gis brgyud pa dang nyams su ldan pas
NK103(pe)001:2107: brjod par bya'o // 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po
NK103(pe)001:2108: 'od snang ba'i gnas ngang phug rin po che'i gling
NK103(pe)001:2109: bya ba yod gi rin chen so so las byas
NK103(pe)001:2110: brjod par bya'o // pa'i sgo // bzhi yang rin
NK103(pe)001:2111: po che 'phrul gyi rgya mdud sna bzhi'i sgo dang
NK103(pe)001:2112: brjod par bya'o // pa'i sgo // bcas // pa'i
NK103(pe)001:2113: rgyal po la mnga' ba'i lde mig gis khrol na
NK103(pe)001:2114: rin po che'i gter khyim la gzhan la rag ma
NK103(pe)001:2115: lus par dbang bsgyur ba'i bdag po mdzod //
NK103(pe)001:2116: rin po che dang 'bru la sogs pa'i longs spyod
NK103(pe)001:2117: kyi gter la mnga' mdzad cing rol ba bzhin du
NK103(pe)001:2118: // bla ma'i man ngag lde mig lta bu rdo
NK103(pe)001:2119: rje tshig gis mi shes pa'i rgya mdud bkrol na
NK103(pe)001:2120: // // byang chub kyi dkar po che ba'i yon
NK103(pe)001:2121: tan ma lus pa'i gter la rtsol med nyid gyis
NK103(pe)001:2122: dbang sgyur ba'i mnga' bdag mdzod //
NK103(pe)001:2123: rdzogs chen gyi rang bzhin de nyid lung dam pas bkrol na shes rab kyi mig phye bas //
NK103(pe)001:2124: gang mthong na bde ba chen po phyogs ris med
NK103(pe)001:2125: pa rtogs na rang gnas kyi dkyil 'khor nyid mthong
NK103(pe)001:2126: ste // dbang gis thabs kyis zin na yon tan bsam yas pa'i mnga' bdag yin ste //
NK103(pe)001:2127: rdo rje rgyal po slob dpon du gyur pa thob pa ni 'bras bu yin //
NK103(pe)001:2128: lta dgongs la re dogs med cing bdag gzhan gyi
NK103(pe)001:2129: don grub pas bde gshegs nyid dang skal ba mnyam
NK103(pe)001:2130: // rdo rje'i theg pa la zhugs pas byang chub
NK103(pe)001:2131: rdo rje'i rigs su nges de gang zag gang la
NK103(pe)001:2132: // bstan na // theg pa mthar phyin pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa yi lam des //
NK103(pe)001:2133: ma bgrod par theg pa dman pa rtsol brgyad la zhugs pa'am //
NK103(pe)001:2134: rigs rgyud dbang po chig chod dam //
NK103(pe)001:2135: sbyangs pa'i 'phro can gang yang rung //
NK103(pe)001:2137: theg pa rang rang gi grub mthas shes pa ma bsgyur ba'i snam bu tshos med lta bu //
NK103(pe)001:2138: de gnyis ka thun mong gi blo can gyi gang zag ste ba ta rta'i gzeb //
NK103(pe)001:2139: lcags su bcug pa 'grol ba dang 1'dra 2bar rnam
NK103(pe)001:2140: rtog ye shes su dgrol ba'i thabs rna brgyud kyi
NK103(pe)001:2141: chu bo dang bsrung bral gyi dam tshig bstan //
NK103(pe)001:2142: rang bzhin gyi phyag rgya chen po bstan pa tsam gyis btsal med du rdzogs par bskyed //
NK103(pe)001:2143: yod med rtag chad kun la khyab pa'i ye shes phyogs med du gsal zhing 'bar ba'i sku ni //
NK103(pe)001:2144: chos kyi dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang sprul pa'i sku mtha' dag dang //
NK103(pe)001:2145: khro bo khrag 'thung dang zhi ba rgyas 'bring bsdus pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas kun //
NK103(pe)001:2146: rol pa'i snang ba mtha' yas pa 'dir 'dus pa'i
NK103(pe)001:2147: ye shes kyi lus yin pas chen po sgrib byed
NK103(pe)001:2148: med par // gsal zhing nyams su myong 'bar bskyed
NK103(pe)001:2149: pa yid ches par mngon sum du mthong bar bya
NK103(pe)001:2150: med par // // bdud rtsi lnga bza' ba dang
NK103(pe)001:2151: rig pa'i spyod pa las spyod lam thams cad du
NK103(pe)001:2153: 'dir man ngag rtogs pa'i skabs te bde thob thun mtshams bar pa re dogs bcad pa yi dus //
NK103(pe)001:2154: sku gsum mngon sum du 'jug pa'i man ngag gi dbang rnams dus gcig tu rdzogs //
NK103(pe)001:2155: rang bzhin dang ltos pa'i dge ba dang sdig pa'i las kyi rnam rtog skabs 'dir med //
NK103(pe)001:2156: ces med na rnam smin gyi rgyu 'bras ngan pa zad pas pad+ma dang 'dam ltar mi gos par //
NK103(pe)001:2157: rang gi rig par rtogs la gang la yang chags
NK103(pe)001:2158: pa dang thogs pa med pa bde ba chen por
NK103(pe)001:2159: thob pas na // chos thams cad lhun grub gsum
NK103(pe)001:2160: du mnyam par rdzogs te rang byung gi longs spyod
NK103(pe)001:2161: nyid la rang byung ye shes nyid rol //
NK103(pe)001:2162: rig pa rang gsal phyogs ris med pa'i bde ba zag pa med pa'i longs spyod sgrub //
NK103(pe)001:2163: de ltar ma chags pa khong du chud pas kun
NK103(pe)001:2164: la spyod kyang rang byung pa'i ye shes su rang
NK103(pe)001:2166: de ltar rtogs pa la rang sems nus pa brtas
NK103(pe)001:2167: pa'i dgongs pa'i stobs dang yul shes pa la thim
NK103(pe)001:2168: pas ni // bshad pa'i rnam rtog phyogs ris su bcad pa dang bral ba'i byang chub kyi sems //
NK103(pe)001:2169: nyid rang byung gi ye shes su 'gyur te bde
NK103(pe)001:2170: ba chen po'i longs spyod du gyur pas nus pa
NK103(pe)001:2172: thams cad du 'byung ba sa chu me rlung bzhi
NK103(pe)001:2173: las smin cing 'grub pas skyed pa'i rdzas thams cad
NK103(pe)001:2174: rang gi sems // nam mkha' ltar rtogs shing lus
NK103(pe)001:2175: rdo rje lta bur 'gyur zhing gsal la brtan pa'i
NK103(pe)001:2176: rang gi sems // zas su 'gyur // 'di ni
NK103(pe)001:2177: rgyal ba dang dbyer med pas rdo rje rgyal po
NK103(pe)001:2179: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rdo rje'i ngang du tshim par bya'o //
NK103(pe)001:2180: rtogs pa sgo gsum rdo rje des gang brjod pa
NK103(pe)001:2181: ni tshig ste de dag gi lam nas de kho
NK103(pe)001:2183: bdag don bshad pa'i don rtogs nas gzhan don skal
NK103(pe)001:2184: ldan 'ga' la don dang 'brel ba'i phra ba'i tshig
NK103(pe)001:2186: bshang ba dri chen gci ba dri chu khu ba
NK103(pe)001:2187: byang sems la sogs sha chen dang rak+ta bsdu te
NK103(pe)001:2188: // de dag la blang dor du rtog pa dang
NK103(pe)001:2189: 'jig rten pas smad cing dor ba'i kha na ma
NK103(pe)001:2190: tho ba'i zas bza' ba ste gong du bshad do
NK103(pe)001:2191: // // sa la sogs te 'byung ba bzhi //
NK103(pe)001:2192: dngos po'i rdzas su 'gyur bas mthun mi mthun thams cad la dngos su baza'o //
NK103(pe)001:2193: sbrang rtsi rgod dang ba dmar zal yi 'o ma ste tshe ring ba'i rdzas dang //
NK103(pe)001:2194: bzang sdug ni sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga lce pog gu gul dkar po dang //
NK103(pe)001:2195: tsha lnga dang rdo chu yi khu bar brag zhun cong zhi dkar po mu zi dang bcas //
NK103(pe)001:2196: rang gi chu yis gtor te zos par gyur na //
NK103(pe)001:2197: lus rdo rjer 'gyur ba dang zas bdud rtsi ru
NK103(pe)001:2198: lus kyi bcud du chags shing na ba dang 'chi
NK103(pe)001:2199: ba'i gnod pa mi nus te //
NK103(pe)001:2200: bong nga nag po la sogs pa'i dug mtha' dag
NK103(pe)001:2201: la'ang mthu gsad pa dang byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags
NK103(pe)001:2203: thun mong gi dngos grub de yi rjes su nga
NK103(pe)001:2204: rgyal la sogs pa'i sems 'jug pa ni mchog gi
NK103(pe)001:2206: thabs kyis bcos la sems nyid rnam par rtog pa de dag dang bral bar bya'o //
NK103(pe)001:2207: dus gsum du rang gi bde ba chen po la lus ngag yid gsum mi g.yo bar 'jug ste //
NK103(pe)001:2208: rab 'bring tha ma 'jug pa'i thun mtshams su dus kyis gong du bstan pa ltar bya'o //
NK103(pe)001:2209: gang dang gang rjes su mthun par rang rang gi
NK103(pe)001:2210: nus pa dang gdul bya pha rol 'dul pa'i bsam
NK103(pe)001:2211: pa dang las sbyang bar byas te //
NK103(pe)001:2212: rang gi rig pa nyid sgra dang gsung du lhun
NK103(pe)001:2213: gyis grub ste de nyid don dang 'brel cing mi
NK103(pe)001:2215: ste de dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas na thabs
NK103(pe)001:2216: su smra ba dang brjod pa ni ngag gi kha
NK103(pe)001:2217: na ma tho'i las thabs dang ldan pas tha mal
NK103(pe)001:2218: dang / dge ba ta ha cang ches kyi /
NK103(pe)001:2219: 'dod pa la rtog pa dang ngan pa thun mong du 'gal pa'i tshig smras kyang //
NK103(pe)001:2220: nyes par mi 'gyur te ji skad brjod pa ma
NK103(pe)001:2221: lus pa ni rang byung gi ye shes snying po
NK103(pe)001:2223: yin la sgra ji snyed ma lus pa'i sgra bsgrags
NK103(pe)001:2224: shing sgra la thun mong gi tshig gi don med
NK103(pe)001:2225: do // rtogs pa can gyis tshig de skad skal
NK103(pe)001:2226: ba can la brjod de sgo gsum ma bcos bag
NK103(pe)001:2228: skye med rdo rje dang 'brel ba'i ngag gi spyod pa bya'o //
NK103(pe)001:2233: gzhan gyis rtogs par dka' ba'i don la ngam pas e ma'o //
NK103(pe)001:2234: chos thams cad snying po byang chub kyi ngo bor
NK103(pe)001:2235: mnyam zhing de'i ngang du rdzogs pa ni thig le
NK103(pe)001:2236: chos sku ste sku yi bcud do //
NK103(pe)001:2237: nam mkha'i bya ltar thogs chags med de ma lus
NK103(pe)001:2238: pa rdo rje ru gsal ba des ji ltar spyad
NK103(pe)001:2239: pa ni lus kyi las so //
NK103(pe)001:2240: spyod par byed pa'i las dang bya ba'i yul gnyis phyogs med kyi klong du gnyis med de //
NK103(pe)001:2241: de ltar snang ba thams cad phyogs med kyi ye
NK103(pe)001:2242: shes rang rig las de dag thams cad du shar
NK103(pe)001:2243: cing las // gang byed kyang de dag tu zhen
NK103(pe)001:2244: pa'i rtog pa med de rang byung ye shes nyid
NK103(pe)001:2245: las su shar ba'i phyir ro //
NK103(pe)001:2246: ci spyad thams cad thun min gyi sgyu ma chen
NK103(pe)001:2247: po ste dngos su lhun grub gsum dang sku gsum
NK103(pe)001:2248: du gsal la // chos gang la yang ma chags
NK103(pe)001:2249: par zhen pa 'dzin pa med pa ngang shugs gis
NK103(pe)001:2250: spyad par bya'o zhes gdams so //
NK103(pe)001:2251: rang rgyud pa med pa'i dpe dper na mig 'phrul
NK103(pe)001:2252: mkhan gyi sgyu ma byas kyang rang rgyud pa med
NK103(pe)001:2253: pa bzhin no // rtogs ldan gyi gang zag de
NK103(pe)001:2254: yis las ci spyad pa de la shes pa yul
NK103(pe)001:2256: rang gi rig pa de nyid la rgyud drug gi rgyu 'bras thams cad bsdus //
NK103(pe)001:2257: pa ste rig pa las gzhan pa med pas so //
NK103(pe)001:2258: rnam rtog tu 'dzin pa'ang dngos su bde chen skye med kyi klong du bsgral ba'o //
NK103(pe)001:2259: de lta'i rnal 'byor pas srog gcod ma byin len pa dang //
NK103(pe)001:2260: 'dod logs la sogs lus kyi las //
NK103(pe)001:2261: de dag ni gang zag tha mal dang theg pa
NK103(pe)001:2262: thun mong rnams bag tsha zhing nyam nga ba de
NK103(pe)001:2263: kha na ma tho bas phog pa'i spyod pa //
NK103(pe)001:2264: thams cad tshul der ni spyod cing nyams su blang zhes bstan to //
NK103(pe)001:2265: de ltar mi dge ba'i chos mngon sum du spyad pa'i las rnams kyis //
NK103(pe)001:2266: ci'i phyir mi gos she na lta ba dang spyod
NK103(pe)001:2267: pa la 1thag 1chod 11cing yengs pa med pa dang
NK103(pe)001:2268: dgongs pa'i the tshom bral ba'i //
NK103(pe)001:2269: nyams myong snang rig stong gsum rgya ma chad de gsal ba nyid bde ba'i rgyal po'o //
NK103(pe)001:2270: de lta bu'i gang zag de ni rnal ma'i don thob pa yin pas //
NK103(pe)001:2271: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan pa'i thabs chen gyis //
NK103(pe)001:2272: bde ba chen po mthar phyin pa byang chub tshol
NK103(pe)001:2273: zhing mtshon par byed pa las thabs dang theg pa
NK103(pe)001:2274: gzhan gyis bskal pa bye bar kyang 'bras bu thob
NK103(pe)001:2275: pa min mo // de nyid kyi dbang dang thabs
NK103(pe)001:2276: kyi bya yi sgra tshad dang tshig gis mtshon pa
NK103(pe)001:2277: pa min mo // min no // rnam rtog zhi
NK103(pe)001:2278: dang rang byung snying pos thams cad du rgyas pa'i
NK103(pe)001:2279: rang bzhin can du bzhugs so //
NK103(pe)001:2280: dbyibs lus kyi yon tan legs mdangs gsal /
NK103(pe)001:2294: gang gi sgo nas kyang yid du 'ong /
NK103(pe)001:2295: phrad par 'dod cing mi skyo yid 'phrog cing bde ba skye bas 'grogs 'dod pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:2296: gsang ba'i chags che pad+ma rgyas /
NK103(pe)001:2298: thabs la mkha' pa'i yon tan kun ldan bu mo de //
NK103(pe)001:2300: byin brlabs sbyor ba'i thabs kyis yang na dbang bskur /
NK103(pe)001:2305: dam rdzas sbyin pa'i bsnyen pa gsum rdzogs pa'i //
NK103(pe)001:2306: bde ba chen pos kun la rgyas 'debs pas phyag rgya mtshon pa'i rgyu //
NK103(pe)001:2307: phyag rgya bzhis dbang po gnyis bsrungs pas bde ba chen po mngon du gsal bar bya'o //
NK103(pe)001:2308: yab yum gnyis kas bde ba chen po rang rig tu brtag par bya ste //
NK103(pe)001:2309: rin chen gter gyi man ngag kun rdzogs tshangs pa'i dbang sbyin //
NK103(pe)001:2313: dka' thub can bcad pa'i skal ldan bde ba skye ba'i rgyu can gyi bu de //
NK103(pe)001:2314: rgyu 'bras kyi ngan rtog ste 'dod yon la zhen pa'i brkam chags ni //
NK103(pe)001:2315: dgag spangs ma bsgyur bar rang byung gi ye shes
NK103(pe)001:2316: bde ba chen por 'byung zhing myong ba la the
NK103(pe)001:2317: tshom med // kun la spyod nus pa'i rang lus
NK103(pe)001:2318: nyid gang ltar 'dod pa la dbang sgyur bas rgyal
NK103(pe)001:2320: chags sdang gi rnam rtog ma spangs par ngo bo
NK103(pe)001:2321: nyid thabs kyis ye shes su sgyur bar byed la
NK103(pe)001:2322: // rig pa mthar phyin nas ma bcos bde ba
NK103(pe)001:2323: chen po'i thig le phyogs med par shar cing tha
NK103(pe)001:2325: rig pa ma skyes pa nyid mi 'jig pas rdo
NK103(pe)001:2326: rje de nyid rig pa'i me tog dbang gi man
NK103(pe)001:2327: ngag ni thabs chen gyi rtsi ste de'i las //
NK103(pe)001:2328: sgyur zhing nad gso bar byed pa ni dpe me tog e ka ta yis bsgyur ba bzhin no //
NK103(pe)001:2329: rgyu rkyen med pas rang byung zhing rdzogs pa'i dkyil
NK103(pe)001:2330: 'khor bzhi'am drug lus la gnas par rtogs par dgod
NK103(pe)001:2331: // bshang kha na phyi nang du rgyu ba'i bems
NK103(pe)001:2332: po'i rlung dang de'i steng na drod can me gru
NK103(pe)001:2333: gsum dang 'khor lo bzhi'i thig le bde ba'i khams
NK103(pe)001:2334: // // mi g.yo bar rtsa so so na gnas
NK103(pe)001:2335: pa de 'khor lo rkyen gnyis gcig tu brtsis pas
NK103(pe)001:2336: lnga ni gyen du 'bar bas rim pa dang spyi
NK103(pe)001:2337: bo nas gsang gnas su 'dzag rim pas 'gengs te
NK103(pe)001:2338: // // // rlung gi stobs dang sa bon sreg
NK103(pe)001:2339: cing bde ba'i stobs drag po'i ni ma ste rim
NK103(pe)001:2340: par spar dang gang bar byed pa'i thabs nyid do
NK103(pe)001:2341: // // // // bde ba'i yan lag dang thabs kyi /
NK103(pe)001:2343: dran pa lta ba'i yan lag gang rung gis sems mngon par 'du byed kyis //
NK103(pe)001:2344: lus de las ni 'khor lo bapa zhi'i rim bzhin du lus sems kyi bde ba dbab //
NK103(pe)001:2345: lte ba na rtsa rgod ma'i kha gnye ma 'khyil pa lta bu /
NK103(pe)001:2346: rdo rje dang pad+ma'i ge sar dang 'brel pa dang rin chen kha thur du bltas pa'i rdzing //
NK103(pe)001:2347: ting nges rtsa bzhi sprad par sbyar zhing thabs dang
NK103(pe)001:2348: shes rab gnyis ka'i rtsa gsum gyi thig le gyen
NK103(pe)001:2350: rlung gis me 'bar bas bde ba skye ba'i myu
NK103(pe)001:2351: gu thig le rang bzhin lhan cig skye pa bzhibs
NK103(pe)001:2352: // lus kyi bcud rtsa de'i bcud thig le de'i
NK103(pe)001:2353: bcud nying khu'i nyams su myong ba'i bde ba de
NK103(pe)001:2355: yab yum gyi bde ba chen po'i bcud thig le thabs kyis gyen du brlabs pas //
NK103(pe)001:2356: tsit+ta sems bde bas rgyas shing 'khor lo dgang //
NK103(pe)001:2357: de'i stobs kyis rin chen ni sems te bde chen gyi rdzing gi pad+ma bzhi gang ba'o //
NK103(pe)001:2358: de'i bcud kyis lus sems rgyas //
NK103(pe)001:2359: bde ba de nyid rgyu rkyen bral zhing skye ba
NK103(pe)001:2360: med par sems pas thung ngu a la cung tsam
NK103(pe)001:2361: phog / bde ba'i rtags lus 'dar kun rdar du
NK103(pe)001:2362: phab pas 'phar rjing du phab pas mig mi 'tshum
NK103(pe)001:2364: sems kyi bde ba'i dmigs pa rtse gcig tu bsdus par 'gyur na //
NK103(pe)001:2365: sems nyid bde ba chen po'i ting nge thob bar tshor ba ste //
NK103(pe)001:2366: de la brten nas rten dang bral ba'i bde ba
NK103(pe)001:2367: rig pa rang byung phyogs ris med pa'i klong du
NK103(pe)001:2368: gsal bar nyams kyis dbab pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:2369: sngon gang la bskur ba'i lo rgyus gtsug tor bsgyur
NK103(pe)001:2370: ba'i gsang bdag gi sprul pa dbang rtags dbu rgyan
NK103(pe)001:2371: dang rdo rje ldan pa yis //
NK103(pe)001:2372: de wa r+aa dza lha'i rgyal po 'jam dpal mu tra rdo rje sems dpa' dang //
NK103(pe)001:2373: mi'i rgyal po bde byed in+d+ra b+ho d+hi rin 'byung dang //
NK103(pe)001:2374: gnod sbyin rgyal po u par b+ho d+hi rnam snang klu rgyal dag k+sha ga don grub //
NK103(pe)001:2375: lha min gyi rgyal po de wa a mi tsan+d+ra mtha' yas ste de lngas //
NK103(pe)001:2376: tshig dbang rin po che nos nas tha ma'i lus //
NK103(pe)001:2377: 'di nyid ma spangs par rgyal ba lnga yi rigs su byas pa des na thabs kyi theg pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:2378: ma brgyud par da lta nyid mngon sum du bde
NK103(pe)001:2379: ba myong ba'i nyams khyad par can la dbang byed
NK103(pe)001:2381: rgyal ba lnga'i sku gsung thugs phyag rgya ste rgyas 'debs pas so //
NK103(pe)001:2384: bac+wa ba mngon du btab par nus pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:2385: tha mal phyi rgyud pa las khyad par du ston
NK103(pe)001:2386: te rgyal bar gsal ba nyid kyis rol pa mdzad
NK103(pe)001:2387: pa'i phyir ro // sngon gyi tshul de bzhin dus
NK103(pe)001:2388: tha ma da lta'i gang zag spyod cing thob pa'i
NK103(pe)001:2389: skal ldan pho mo'i rigs gang rung la //
NK103(pe)001:2390: gdams ngag rgyun ma chad pas thog ma'i rin chen
NK103(pe)001:2391: ji ltar 'dod pa ltar tshig gis dbang gang rung
NK103(pe)001:2392: bskur ro // de'i nus stobs kyis snang grags kyi
NK103(pe)001:2393: chos thams cad rang byung ye shes bde ba chen
NK103(pe)001:2394: po'i lus su gtan la dbab bo //
NK103(pe)001:2395: rtogs pa de ma thag de nas bde ba sbyor
NK103(pe)001:2396: ba'i thabs yan lag tu bcas pa bslab cing sbyin
NK103(pe)001:2397: te // ye shes bde ba'i 'khor lo bzhi bshad zin de //
NK103(pe)001:2401: bde ba chen por bskyed pa'i rim pa ste 'ju
NK103(pe)001:2402: 'dul rlung la sogs pa thabs so so'i nas rim
NK103(pe)001:2403: pa bzhin gyis las spyod cing bslab par bya'o //
NK103(pe)001:2404: ka ma la sh+aastra 'dod pa ra na nyid bstan bcos te de yi bstan bcos las //
NK103(pe)001:2405: gsungs pas 'am rmongs byed thig le'am /
NK103(pe)001:2406: chags pa'i phreng ba nas byung ba ltar bde ba rgyas pa'i chos la 'bad par bya'o //
NK103(pe)001:2407: bde ba rgyas par bya ba'i phyir //
NK103(pe)001:2408: de nas a li ka brgya dang pra ha ra
NK103(pe)001:2409: brgya ste phrag gnyis bsnol mar dang 'dod sbyor gyi
NK103(pe)001:2412: tsim+pa ka bcu bcu ste bcu phrag gsum mo //
NK103(pe)001:2413: de dag la sogs pa gzhan ma lus par 'dod
NK103(pe)001:2414: pa'i bstan chos kyang du mas bstan pa ltar bya
NK103(pe)001:2415: / chags pa bskyed pa'i gnas kyang /
NK103(pe)001:2416: mgo bo dang lus stod smad dang yan lag rnams
NK103(pe)001:2417: la ji ltar mthun pa'i thabs dang sbyar bar bya'o
NK103(pe)001:2418: // bde ba'i 'khor lo rim pas dbab cing rim par 'khyil lo //
NK103(pe)001:2419: thig le'i gnas kun rdar zhugs pas 'dar snying la
NK103(pe)001:2420: skad 'byin dang lus la khyab par rgyas pas mchong
NK103(pe)001:2421: zhing rgyug dwangs ma thig le la thim pas mthun
NK103(pe)001:2422: bya ba thams cad nus pa'i spyod pa bya ba
NK103(pe)001:2423: kho na'o // thams cad nyams pa med par bde
NK103(pe)001:2424: ba chen po gsal ba'i sngar gyi zug rngu las
NK103(pe)001:2425: dbugs phyung nas nyam nga ba med par ngal bso
NK103(pe)001:2426: kho na'o // ba'o // de lta bu'i nyams de
NK103(pe)001:2427: dus gsum gyi bde gshegs rgyal ba thams cad kyi
NK103(pe)001:2428: kho na'o // ba'o // // sa basngagasa shing dgongs
NK103(pe)001:2429: pa rtse gcig tu mdzad pa rang bzhin gyis bde
NK103(pe)001:2430: ba'i rgyud du gnas pas 'khor lo nyid //
NK103(pe)001:2431: ces bstan cing de las gzhan pa'i rgyal ba dang
NK103(pe)001:2432: bral ba'i phyir rang nyid rgyal ba mngon sum pa
NK103(pe)001:2433: yin pas // ji srid pa'i chos thams cad de ltar 'gyur bas ye shes bde bar 'bar ba'o //
NK103(pe)001:2434: bde ba gzhan las 'phags pas bde mchog zhal gdong pa ngo bstan pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:2435: mu kha'i tshegs chung ngus thob pas man ngag sbyin //
NK103(pe)001:2436: pho mo gnyis ka mtshan dang ldan pa rigs rus
NK103(pe)001:2437: lam gang yang rung ste rgyal bar nga rgyal byas
NK103(pe)001:2438: pa des // dang por mgo la bde ba'i rol pa sna tshogs bya'o //
NK103(pe)001:2439: thabs de dag dang phyag rgya bzhis sbyar bas rtsa
NK103(pe)001:2440: mdud dgrol ba dang dbab thabs kyis bde ba bkug
NK103(pe)001:2443: dgos pa bde ba 'dod pa pa rtsa gsum po de 'dzin pa dang 'bebs pas yan lag gis //
NK103(pe)001:2444: ye shes 'bad rtsol med par sa non pas rgyal por rig par bya //
NK103(pe)001:2445: bde ba myongs pa'i rtags mgo bo sprug cing g.ya' ba dang smin ma langs //
NK103(pe)001:2446: lus rgyas shing bde ba brten pa'i rtags mig dmar
NK103(pe)001:2447: ba dang de bzhin du mdog kyang dmar te mdog
NK103(pe)001:2450: brtan pa'i ye shes rim par phyi nang kun tu spro bar bya //
NK103(pe)001:2451: sbyor ba'i yan lag snga mar bstan pa bzhin //
NK103(pe)001:2454: ka ra'i bstan chos kyang sngar bzhin rim par bya //
NK103(pe)001:2455: thig le rgyas nas 'dzag dus su rtsa mgo sna
NK103(pe)001:2456: tshogs 'dus pa'i rdzing 'og lag gis mnan par byas
NK103(pe)001:2457: te bzlog pa dang gzung ba'i thabs la 'bad //
NK103(pe)001:2458: rdo rje skam pa'i phyag rgya yis //
NK103(pe)001:2459: thabs dang shes rab 'phar ba bcang //
NK103(pe)001:2460: zhes pas 'phar ba gcad cing mtshan ma phyi nang du rgyu ba thabs kyis dbral //
NK103(pe)001:2461: dwangs ma'i rtsa mu kha sgo'i kha ni bde ba'i
NK103(pe)001:2462: dwangs ma dang bcas pa'i rlung gis shin tu dbye
NK103(pe)001:2463: // de'i rtags ni gnyid log dus su dngangs 'dar sprug pa dang ba spu ldang ba dang //
NK103(pe)001:2464: rngul chu yi zil pa phrom me gnas pa spyod
NK103(pe)001:2465: yul kun tu mdog bde bar 'gyur te res dkar
NK103(pe)001:2466: res dmar ba la sogs pa //
NK103(pe)001:2467: rang lus mchog gi mig gis gang bltas pa'i thad kar snang ba kun 'byung //
NK103(pe)001:2468: de nas bde ba rang rgyud pa la brtags pas
NK103(pe)001:2469: gang du yang ma mthong zhing sgyu ma tsam du
NK103(pe)001:2470: gsal ba'i bde ba'i rim pa gzhag /
NK103(pe)001:2471: bde ba'i gol sa dang bral bas legs pa la
NK103(pe)001:2472: sems kyis dus gsum du ma yengs par bcang bar
NK103(pe)001:2473: bya // snying la pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi'i dbus na
NK103(pe)001:2474: lte ba'i gnas 'dab ma bzhi la ye shes bzhi'i
NK103(pe)001:2475: ngo bo rang bzhin gyis gnas //
NK103(pe)001:2476: rang la gnas pas gzhan du 'dab ma ma phyin
NK103(pe)001:2477: 'dab ma bzhi dang snying po la gnas pa'i dwangs
NK103(pe)001:2478: ma'i bde ba ma 'dres pas ye shes lngas gang
NK103(pe)001:2479: bar 'gyur zhing // nyon mongs pas mi 'khrug ste
NK103(pe)001:2480: dran rtog ci skyes bde ba 'phel zhing g.yos par
NK103(pe)001:2481: bar 'gyur zhing // 'gyur te // snying rtsa'i dwangs
NK103(pe)001:2482: mar zhugs nas gnas pas rin chen rtsa thun mong
NK103(pe)001:2483: ba kun gyi ye shes rdzing gang zhing rgyas te
NK103(pe)001:2485: med pa la sogs pa 'dod khams kyi dang bsam
NK103(pe)001:2486: gtan bzhi'i bde ba dang mngon shes dang cho 'phrul
NK103(pe)001:2488: dga' bzhi'i skye tshul mi 'jig par 'khyil pa'i thig
NK103(pe)001:2489: le 'khor lo dang rdo rje'i gnas bzhi thabs kyi
NK103(pe)001:2490: sgo nas // 'jig rten pa'i chags pa spong ba'i 'das pa'i bde ba 'byung //
NK103(pe)001:2491: gsang ba'i rdo rje'i sgo ni rtsa dang 'brel ba'i mkhal ma'i bcud thig le la brten nas //
NK103(pe)001:2492: bde ba yin ma nu'i rtsa sgo ro rkyang kun rdar gsum //
NK103(pe)001:2493: bde ba 'phel ba'i dang po zla ba tshes pa
NK103(pe)001:2494: lta bu dang thams cad du khyab pa'i bde ba
NK103(pe)001:2495: bco lnga'i zla ba'i gzugs can dang gnyis //
NK103(pe)001:2496: thabs shes kha sbyar chos nyid kyi bde bas rgyas par bya //
NK103(pe)001:2497: 'gugs pa dang 'dzin pas lag pa ste me rlung
NK103(pe)001:2498: gnyis dang thabs shes rab kyi rtsa ste 'khrig sgor
NK103(pe)001:2499: gzhug pa ni a wa d+hu tir gzhug pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:2500: nyi zla'i thig le ma nu ni de'i snod do rtsa sgo gsum //
NK103(pe)001:2501: bde ba 'phel ba'i gnas ni nu ma lte ba /
NK103(pe)001:2504: tsa na kra ni 'khor lo bzhi dang drug go //
NK103(pe)001:2505: dang su ka'i ni bde ba ste lus la khyab pas gling ngo //
NK103(pe)001:2506: dbab gzung bzlog sbyang ba'i 'du byed las dang steng 'og gi dbang po sbyor ba yis //
NK103(pe)001:2507: 'bras bu bde ba yun je ring je ring la mnyam rjes med par /
NK103(pe)001:2508: 'phel ba dang rtsa la thig le rgyas //
NK103(pe)001:2509: chu skyes mu kha gdong pa rkyen gyis phog pa bzhin du thig le 'dzag par 'gyur ro //
NK103(pe)001:2510: thabs shes khyad par gyi 'khor lo kha sbyar bzlog pa ni bkug pa dang dbab pa ni /
NK103(pe)001:2512: lhar sbyor bas thun mong gi 'dod chags kun dang
NK103(pe)001:2513: bral ba'i tshul gyi sbyar ba ste phyag rgya bzhis
NK103(pe)001:2515: bshad pa'i ka ra'i sbyor ba bde stong phan tshun lta ba'i mig spros kyis //
NK103(pe)001:2516: su ka bde ba b+ho d+d+hi byang chub ni ka
NK103(pe)001:2517: sems te de'i sgo bla ma'i man ngag gis dbye
NK103(pe)001:2518: // theg le khu ba mi rgyu bar gzung bas
NK103(pe)001:2519: 'khyil pa ste thabs kyis nyams su myong ba'i sgo
NK103(pe)001:2520: // phye nas // dang po tha mal gyi zhen
NK103(pe)001:2521: rtog mi srid de nas lus la dri ma'ang mi
NK103(pe)001:2523: lus kyang kha dog dmar por 'gyur ba'o //
NK103(pe)001:2524: bde bas brgyal bas lus g.yo ba dang 'phar ba sgra 'byung sprug pa la sogs pa 'byung //
NK103(pe)001:2525: thun mong gi shes pa las lhag bde la mi rtog pa'ang rgyun du skye bar 'gyur //
NK103(pe)001:2526: des kun tu rtog pa thams cad nyams par 'gyur //
NK103(pe)001:2527: gang la gtad pa'i dmigs pa'i yul de zin //
NK103(pe)001:2529: lus la steng 'og gi rlung gzung thabs gis 'phen pa phyi rlung nang rlung du 'jug /
NK103(pe)001:2530: bzung na zin btang na thongs mi rgyu ba la
NK103(pe)001:2531: sogs pa rlung gi las rnams kyis mchog thun mong
NK103(pe)001:2533: bde ba nyams su len pa'i skabs der ni rdo rje chu 'dzag pa'i lam nas //
NK103(pe)001:2534: ye shes chen po'i rgyu rkyen thig le'i phyir 'byung ba min //
NK103(pe)001:2535: gal te shor na bde ba mi 'byung la dam nyams par 'gyur bas lces blang ngo //
NK103(pe)001:2536: tshul de bas na thig le rang gi lus las
NK103(pe)001:2537: bskyed cing mi rtog pa ye shes su smin par
NK103(pe)001:2538: bya // rtsa so so nas thig le'i rdul phran zil pa mang po gnas pa de /
NK103(pe)001:2539: rlung gis bskyod pa ltar ga cig la thim ste lus bde bas gang /
NK103(pe)001:2540: mgrin snying lte ba gnas gsum bde ba'i bsti gnas
NK103(pe)001:2541: rgyu zhabs nas rdo rje'i bum pa yan chad rgyas
NK103(pe)001:2542: pas su // khu ba'i thig le dang bde ba
NK103(pe)001:2543: dang mi rtog par mi 'byed 'brel cing 'grogs pas
NK103(pe)001:2544: rdo rje'i gzugs su mi 'phro zhing mi 'chor bar
NK103(pe)001:2545: pas su // chags // rang gi rtsa bye ba
NK103(pe)001:2546: phrag sa ya bcu gsum khyab par spros kyang mi
NK103(pe)001:2547: shor bar lus thig les khyab pas bde ba'i gzugs
NK103(pe)001:2549: man ngag dang ldan pa'i rdo rje rgyal po ru'i thabs chen po yin no //
NK103(pe)001:2550: rdo rje rtse'i thig le kha yis bzhib par bya zhing //
NK103(pe)001:2551: chags pa dang drod 'bar ba'i rdo rje dang pad+ma
NK103(pe)001:2552: bsrub cing rtse mo la bzung bas dril zhing phyi
NK103(pe)001:2553: brtan par bya // bde ba skyes nas mi thub
NK103(pe)001:2554: na lag gi gong 'og gnan pa'i sbyor bas khu
NK103(pe)001:2555: ba thig le dwangs snyigs dbye //
NK103(pe)001:2556: mtshan ldan gyi rig ma nyid lha mo ru brlabs
NK103(pe)001:2557: te sgo gsum rdo rje gsum du bsgom ste byin
NK103(pe)001:2558: gyis brlabs bo // de yang mdzes shing yid du
NK103(pe)001:2559: 'ong ba ni dper na pad+ma kha bye la bltas
NK103(pe)001:2560: pa dang rjes su mthun par blta bas chog mi
NK103(pe)001:2561: gyis brlabs bo // shes // lus la dri zhim
NK103(pe)001:2562: pos byug pa'i phrad sbyor ni u pa ma tsan+dana
NK103(pe)001:2563: gyis brlabs bo // shes // dkar dmar / gos bya //
NK103(pe)001:2564: a kar ru nag po dang rgya spos dang du ru ska dang //
NK103(pe)001:2565: gla rtsi'am 'brug rtsi bo che zhes kyang bya bu yi sman gyi snying po ga bur dang //
NK103(pe)001:2566: ra yi mar dang de bzhin du bya //
NK103(pe)001:2567: gag dang ka lan+ta ka'i sgo nga gnyis kyis sbrus
NK103(pe)001:2568: shing mnyam par sbyar ba rgya shug gi 'bras bu
NK103(pe)001:2569: tsam byas te // gsang ba rdo rje la bskus la lag gi sbyor bas rne phur bya //
NK103(pe)001:2570: yang na shing 'jam po'am srin lag la bskus la
NK103(pe)001:2571: rtsa gsum 'dom pa'i dbus su kha kha mu kha'am
NK103(pe)001:2575: de bzhin g.yas g.yon brlab par bya //
NK103(pe)001:2576: shes pa dang na so gzhon pa la legs par bslabs la 'bar bas bya //
NK103(pe)001:2577: sman nam bzhibs pas mnu bar bya //
NK103(pe)001:2578: gal te'am brgya la bde ba thig le'am rtsa mngon du byung gyur na //
NK103(pe)001:2579: pad+ma ni yon tan mang du skyed pas rin chen
NK103(pe)001:2580: te 'dzed 'gengs sgyil bas rdzing du gsang ba rdo
