NK103(pe)001:2583: rlung gis nang du rdub cing me 'bar bas lus
NK103(pe)001:2584: la drod 'byung rlung gzung pa dang gtang bas brlabs
NK103(pe)001:2585: byas nas // thabs des ni bde ba rgyas pa de tsam 'grub par 'gyur zhes bstan to //
NK103(pe)001:2586: de ltar 'bad pas rtags dbugs rgod pa dang 'dar ba dang brgyal ba ngo tsha med /
NK103(pe)001:2589: mthun pa'i rtags ni byung bar gyur na skabs der
NK103(pe)001:2590: gcig la gcig /'khril ba dang 'dod pa'i pra khrid
NK103(pe)001:2591: bstan bcos te bshad pa ltar bya //
NK103(pe)001:2592: lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes rang byung bde ba mngon sum du bya'o //
NK103(pe)001:2593: byed pa sdom pa'i thabs nyon mongs kyi mya ngan
NK103(pe)001:2594: gyi pha rol tu phyin te 'das par 'gyur bar
NK103(pe)001:2595: bya // dbang gi thabs kyis bstan pa phyag rgya chen po bsten par bya //
NK103(pe)001:2596: thig le gnyis bcud chen 'dres pa'i thabs ni phyi rlung bcad de nang rlung gis bsdu ba'o //
NK103(pe)001:2597: rgyu rkyen gyi thig le 'khyil te mi 'phro bar gnas pa dwangs ma'i rtsa sgo phye na //
NK103(pe)001:2598: gyen rgyu stod thur sel smad rgyus pa de nang du bsdam pa dang bcas pas rlung bsdus te //
NK103(pe)001:2599: rig pa bcad de bems po phyi nang rgyu ba'i
NK103(pe)001:2600: steng 'og can gyi rlung gis phyi rgyu gyen thur
NK103(pe)001:2601: du 'phen pa dang slar nang du sdud pa bya
NK103(pe)001:2602: // de'i rkyen gyis thig le g.yo ba nyams su
NK103(pe)001:2603: myongs te thig le 'chor ba snyam byed par gyur
NK103(pe)001:2604: // nas // rin chen rdzing gis bde ba thig le de barnguba par bya'o //
NK103(pe)001:2605: nyi ma'i bcud de yang gsang ba rdo rje'i rdzing ste bum pa yan chad la thug par rngub //
NK103(pe)001:2606: cing mi gtang bar byas na steng 'og gi rlung
NK103(pe)001:2607: rlung phyi ru rgyu ba rnams bsdams te rgyu rkyen
NK103(pe)001:2608: gyi ye shes bde ba sdud pa'i rlung gis drang
NK103(pe)001:2609: ngo // de ltar byas pa'i thabs kyis bu ga /
NK103(pe)001:2610: rtsa gsum rdo rje'i nang la zug pa nas babs thig le la brten pa yi //
NK103(pe)001:2611: bde ba dang bcas pas dper na rin chen gyi
NK103(pe)001:2612: skud pa la dngul gyi phreng ba brgyus pa bzhin
NK103(pe)001:2613: no // rnam rtog sdug bsngal sreg pas rdo rje me yi gzugs su 'bar zhes bstan //
NK103(pe)001:2614: de dag bsregs pas cir 'gyur zhe na bde ba
NK103(pe)001:2615: chen po'i ye shes rgyu rkyen las 'das pas rang
NK103(pe)001:2616: 'bar nyid skye bas bcud thig le rdo rje'i khar
NK103(pe)001:2617: dbyung ba min te gtang bar mi bya'o //
NK103(pe)001:2618: rig pa'i ye shes phyogs ris med pa'i lus can skye med rdo rje'i gzugs so //
NK103(pe)001:2619: snang grags dran rtog thams cad de ltar gsal bas
NK103(pe)001:2620: ye shes lus can yin la des na bde ba
NK103(pe)001:2621: chen po 'bad rtsol med par lhun gyis grub pa'o
NK103(pe)001:2622: // bde ba'i mtshan nyid 'dod rgyal las byung ba'i
NK103(pe)001:2623: thabs kyi rim pa bcos ma'i mtshan nyid de dag
NK103(pe)001:2624: // yang // thabs 'dis thams cad rang byung ye shes phyogs med du gsal pas //
NK103(pe)001:2625: 'dod rgyal te de nyid yul dang shes pa gang
NK103(pe)001:2626: shar ba bde chen gyi ngo bor sgo gsum gyi
NK103(pe)001:2627: rgyas btab pas thabs kyi rim pa'i nas //
NK103(pe)001:2628: don dam tshangs pa chen po snang srid rdo rje'i ngo bor gsal ba'i dbang bskur bar bya'o //
NK103(pe)001:2629: de nyid kyang gzhan la rag ma lus pas rang
NK103(pe)001:2630: la rdzogs pa'i de thabs kyis lhun gyis grub pa
NK103(pe)001:2631: de sbyin no // 'dis zin cing rtogs na brkam
NK103(pe)001:2632: chags ni 'dod pa lnga ste yul lnga la 'dod
NK103(pe)001:2634: de nyid brdar shar cing de ltar snang ba'i spyod
NK103(pe)001:2635: yul drug gis bsdus pa thams cad kyang sems nyid
NK103(pe)001:2637: brda dang thabs kyis bshad pa'i chos thams cad sems nyid du rig par bya'o //
NK103(pe)001:2638: rig ma'i reg bya de nyid ma bcos pa'i bde ba chen po yin te //
NK103(pe)001:2639: bde ba nyid rang gi rig pa chen po nyid snang ba ste //
NK103(pe)001:2640: ma bcos pa'i ye shes de nyid ni ji snyed
NK103(pe)001:2641: pa'i chos ma lus pa kun gyi dngos gzhi can
NK103(pe)001:2643: de'i phyir 'khor ba chos nyid du shes pas spong len med pa'i ye shes chen po te //
NK103(pe)001:2644: de ltar rtogs pa la spyod lam ma bcos par
NK103(pe)001:2645: bzhag kyang 'bad rtsol med par lhun gyis grub pa
NK103(pe)001:2647: dus kyi matha'i skad cig tsam las ma 'gyangs par gang snang zhing dran pa de nyid kyis //
NK103(pe)001:2649: bde ba dang ting 'dzin thams cad 'thob par 'gyur gyi brgyud nas thob pa ni ma yin no //
NK103(pe)001:2650: sngags phyi nang gi rgyud rnams dang nyan rang byang sems kyi bstan pa ma lus pa'i //
NK103(pe)001:2651: chos kun ma lus dus gcig tu rdzogs te de'i phyir //
NK103(pe)001:2652: de ni rgyal thabs spyi blugs tshangs pa'i dbang zhes
NK103(pe)001:2653: bya ste rgyal po rgyal thabs thob pa lta bu'o
NK103(pe)001:2654: // e ma ho rdo rje rigs kyi bu zhes dbang thob pa'i sgo nas bos pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:2655: skal ldan rdo rje rigs kun bdag ces yon tan gyi sgo nas bos pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:2656: nga rgyal dang dregs pa spangs pa'i gus pa'i sems kyis bla ma bkur bas zung //
NK103(pe)001:2657: rnyog ma'i dri ma dag pas tshangs pa chen po'i ye shes kyi //
NK103(pe)001:2658: rgyu rkyen med rang byung gi ye shes phyogs med kyi klong gdal ba'i //
NK103(pe)001:2659: ngang 'bad rtsol med pa'i ma bcos pa bde ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'di //
NK103(pe)001:2660: rtogs nas ched du byas pa'i rgyu rkyen gyis spros
NK103(pe)001:2661: pa med pa'i rig pa'i mkha' la yengs pa med
NK103(pe)001:2662: par zhog cig / snang srid dran rtog ma lus
NK103(pe)001:2663: pa bde ba chen po'i ye shes su ltos shig
NK103(pe)001:2664: par zhog cig / / de las rgyal ba kun
NK103(pe)001:2665: 'byung bas kun gyi gsang ba'i yum ste ro myong
NK103(pe)001:2666: ba dang rtogs par dka' bas so //
NK103(pe)001:2667: rdo rje'i tshig gcig rtogs pas kun rtogs pas 'phrul
NK103(pe)001:2668: gyi thabs chen rtogs pa'i nad thams cad la bdud
NK103(pe)001:2669: rtsir // gyur pa 'di ni mi bstan par sba zhing sems la brnag pas zung zhig pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:2670: de bas na sangs rgyas ma lus pa bskyed cing bzhugs pa'i gnas yin pas 'dus pa'i mkha' //
NK103(pe)001:2671: b+ha ga yangs pa'i thig le klong //
NK103(pe)001:2672: de la dus gsum rgyal ba'i spyod cing ro myong ba'i yul yin pas gsang mchog dbyings //
NK103(pe)001:2673: don 'di rtogs na khams gsum ma lus pa nyid bde ba chen po'i zhing //
NK103(pe)001:2674: ye shes kyi rol pa yin pas mkha' dbyings 'di las //
NK103(pe)001:2675: mi 'gyur ba brtan pa'i sems kyis dran pa bzung zhig /
NK103(pe)001:2676: de ltar snyigs ma'i gnas khams gsum nyid bde ba chen po'i mdzad par spyod de //
NK103(pe)001:2677: cir snang ba thams cad rang byung ye shes rol pa yi //
NK103(pe)001:2678: bde ba chen por phyogs med du sgyur bar byed pas //
NK103(pe)001:2679: ye shes rol pa'i thig ler grol bas thim //
NK103(pe)001:2681: de kho na nyid de thabs kyi rgyal po dbang 'dis tshegs med par rtogs pa yis //
NK103(pe)001:2682: gang gi yang yul min pas sgro skur zad pa'i
NK103(pe)001:2683: ye shes dkyil 'khor nyid lam yin pas de nyid
NK103(pe)001:2684: du gzhug la // ma lus pa bde ba chen po'i rol pa zhes bya'o //
NK103(pe)001:2685: chos thams cad rang byung ye shes nyid rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor drug du //
NK103(pe)001:2686: gsal bas spyod yul bde ba'i ye shes su mngon sum du zhugs pas /
NK103(pe)001:2687: snang srid rig pa'i rgyal po skye med de nyid
NK103(pe)001:2688: bde ba chen por shar te de nyid skye med
NK103(pe)001:2689: kya ye shes kyi klong du gang dmigs pa thams
NK103(pe)001:2690: cad dgrol lo // snang ba ma lus pa ma bcos rang snang lhun grub pa'i //
NK103(pe)001:2691: bkra gsal sku yi dkyil 'khor du //
NK103(pe)001:2692: rang rig bde ba chen por gsal bas 'khyil //
NK103(pe)001:2693: chags med ye shes brjod dang bral //
NK103(pe)001:2694: tshig gi lam chad sgra brnyan tshul //
NK103(pe)001:2695: rtog bral ma chags pa nyid brjod pa'i phyag rgyar shar bas rdo rje'i gsung ste de nyid //
NK103(pe)001:2696: rnam par dag pa ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ngang du //
NK103(pe)001:2697: ye shes rnam dag gsung du gsal bar 'jug pas 'khyil //
NK103(pe)001:2698: dri ngad ma lus pa yang dngos bral rang bzhin
NK103(pe)001:2699: med pa'i thig le las byung zhing dri thams cad
NK103(pe)001:2701: rtog 'dzin bral ba'i chags med pa //
NK103(pe)001:2704: bdag nyid kyi lce la mu kha ro ji snyed
NK103(pe)001:2705: myong ba thams cad de nyid kyi sgo nas bde
NK103(pe)001:2707: 'dzin med longs spyod rnam dag pa'i //
NK103(pe)001:2708: ma lus sgrub byed thig le can //
NK103(pe)001:2709: yon tan rdzogs pa'i chos nyid kyi dkyil 'khor du ston pa //
NK103(pe)001:2710: rol pa'i ye shes thig ler 'khyil //
NK103(pe)001:2711: reg bya 'jam rtsub bde sdug ji ltar snang ba ril dbyings phyug b+ha ga'i klong dkyil du //
NK103(pe)001:2712: lus kyi dkyil 'khor ye shes sgron mar gsal bar 'bar //
NK103(pe)001:2713: bde mchog dbyings su sdud pa'i thig ler thim //
NK103(pe)001:2714: ma lus rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog /
NK103(pe)001:2715: mi rtog bde ba'i dkyil 'khor du //
NK103(pe)001:2716: grol bas ma lus dkyil 'khor thig ler thim //
NK103(pe)001:2717: dran rig gang snang ba la yang rang rig ye shes nyid //
NK103(pe)001:2718: ma bcos mkha' mnyam dkyil 'khor du //
NK103(pe)001:2719: 'dzin chags med pa thig le dbang bskur te //
NK103(pe)001:2720: gsang ba'i ye shes rmad po che //
NK103(pe)001:2721: spyod yul ma lus thams cad kun //
NK103(pe)001:2722: ye shes chen po'i ros gang ba //
NK103(pe)001:2723: rnam pa sna tshogs shes pa nyid //
NK103(pe)001:2724: kun 'dus chos kyi dal du ye shes lnga yi bde bas rgyas btab pas grol lo //
NK103(pe)001:2725: de ltar snang srid thams cad ye shes mnyam nyid bde ba chen po yin pa la //
NK103(pe)001:2726: de ltar ma rtogs na phyogs gcig khu ba rig
NK103(pe)001:2727: ma'i bde ba las bde chen grub par 'dod pa
NK103(pe)001:2728: ni // phyogs su bltas pas bde chen grub pa med do //
NK103(pe)001:2729: rnam pa dang mtshan nyid dang rang bzhin gsum sku gsum du rgyas pa'i klungs //
NK103(pe)001:2730: bde ba chen por lhun grub pa //
NK103(pe)001:2731: thams cad rgyas btab dbang chen te //
NK103(pe)001:2732: ye shes rol pa'i phyag rgya can //
NK103(pe)001:2734: phra rag che chung ma lus pa ma bcos de bzhin nyid //
NK103(pe)001:2735: rgyal ba'i sku ru lhun grub pa //
NK103(pe)001:2736: phyag rgya'i sku ru dbang chen yin //
NK103(pe)001:2737: de bas na rgyud 'gro ba drug 'khor ba'i rten lus su bcas pa rnams ni //
NK103(pe)001:2738: ye shes sprul pa rgya mtsho sna tshogs su snang ba'i sku //
NK103(pe)001:2739: ma lus pa ril rang bzhin lhun grub pa //
NK103(pe)001:2740: sku mchog mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo'i dbang bskur thabs ston to //
NK103(pe)001:2741: thar pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i gsung dang 'khor ba yi //
NK103(pe)001:2742: sgra skad rab 'bring tha ma gsum ma lus pa yis //
NK103(pe)001:2743: ma lus lhun grub rdo rje'i gsung du grol bas //
NK103(pe)001:2744: gsung gi phyag rgya chen po'i dbang bskur ba'i thabs bstan to //
NK103(pe)001:2745: bdag dang gzhan du snang ba'i dran rtog sna tshogs ma lus pa rdo rje'i sems //
NK103(pe)001:2746: thugs kyi ye shes mkha' mnyam pa //
NK103(pe)001:2747: lhun grub bde ba chen po'i thugs rgyan gyi 'khor
NK103(pe)001:2748: lo'i sgo nas dbang bskur bas grol thabs bstan pa'o
NK103(pe)001:2749: // ji skad bshad pa'i dbang de ni spyi blugs ye shes rgyal ba'i dbang zhes bya ste //
NK103(pe)001:2750: de thob cing rtogs na dus thams cad du rang rig ye shes rgyun mi 'chad pa yin no //
NK103(pe)001:2751: de dag bde ba chen po ma bcos pa'i don dang nam yang mi 'bral bas gzungs zhes bya'o //
NK103(pe)001:2752: rang lus la ye shes kyi rin po che //
NK103(pe)001:2753: snang srid ma lus pa rig pa'i bde ba chen
NK103(pe)001:2754: po yon tan tshang zhing rdzogs pa'i lnga'i rgyas btab
NK103(pe)001:2755: pa'o // rnam pa ma lus pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i //
NK103(pe)001:2756: ye shes stong pa chen po'i go chas bar chad mi 'byung bar bsrung ba'o //
NK103(pe)001:2757: tshangs pa'i dbang rtogs na ye shes 'khyil pa rdo rje'i bum pa'i dbang yin te //
NK103(pe)001:2758: bde ba chen po'i ros gang ba yis //
NK103(pe)001:2759: rnam rtog ma lus dag par 'khrud pas bum chu yi mchog yin //
NK103(pe)001:2760: don dam tshangs pa nyid gang gis kyang mi rtogs
NK103(pe)001:2761: pas gsang ba'i ye shes dkyil 'khor chen po ste
NK103(pe)001:2762: de ltar rtogs pas gsang ba'i dbang yin no //
NK103(pe)001:2763: bde ba ma lus pa thams cad kyang dbang 'dir 'dus pa bcud kyi bdag nyid yin pas //
NK103(pe)001:2764: gsal ba'i shes rab ye shes kyi dbang yang yin bde chen po //
NK103(pe)001:2765: de bas na dbang ma lus pa thams cad kun
NK103(pe)001:2766: 'dus pa ni rig pa'i spyi blugs kyi dbang yin
NK103(pe)001:2767: // rig pa rang byung gi rgyal po zhes bya
NK103(pe)001:2768: ba'i ming gis mtshon pas ming gi dbang thob cing
NK103(pe)001:2769: // rdzogs pa'o // dbang 'di dag thams cad kyang
NK103(pe)001:2770: rtsol bas bskur ba min te rang byung rtogs pa'i
NK103(pe)001:2772: don dam tshangs pa'i dbang la bskur bas thob pa'i dbang rnams rdzogs par bstan no //
NK103(pe)001:2773: 'dir bskur du med med pa cis she na /
NK103(pe)001:2774: dbang bskur ba'i 'bras bu rang byung ji bzhin par
NK103(pe)001:2775: thug la de gzhan nas 'byung ba ma yin te
NK103(pe)001:2776: // 'bras bu thob tu med pa'i phyir ro //
NK103(pe)001:2777: des na ma lus pa rang la yod pa mngon du gsal bar thob bo //
NK103(pe)001:2778: dngos po mi 'gyur bar bstan pas rtogs pa mi
NK103(pe)001:2779: 'gyur bar rdo rje tshangs pa'i dbang 'char la de
NK103(pe)001:2780: rtogs goms // kun rdzogs pas bde ba chen por thim zhe'o //
NK103(pe)001:2782: de bas na dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyi //
NK103(pe)001:2783: thugs la brnag pa'i zhe phugs man ngag gi bcud thob bya de nyid //
NK103(pe)001:2784: de thabs khachen 'dis bstan pa yin pas rang kala rdzogs la //
NK103(pe)001:2785: rig pa ye shes lngar bstan pa'i brda ste sku'am yin no //
NK103(pe)001:2786: snang srid lhun gagrub bde chen mi rtog pa //
NK103(pe)001:2787: ma bcos de nyid bde ba'i klong ste //
NK103(pe)001:2788: lhun grub gsum du gsal bas rang byung klong du shar //
NK103(pe)001:2789: rang byung gi ye shes mkha' khyab pa nyid rtsal gang du yang //
NK103(pe)001:2790: ma bkag rig pa'i mkha' la rdzogs //
NK103(pe)001:2791: rang byung rig pa bde chen po //
NK103(pe)001:2792: yon tan lhun grub tu rdzogs pa rig pa'i klong gdal ba //
NK103(pe)001:2793: spros med kyi thig le chen por nyid chos thams cad du shar ba'o //
NK103(pe)001:2794: h'u thugs rtsa ba gcig tu gsal ba'o //
NK103(pe)001:2795: mi rtog pa'i ye shes byang chub sems su chos ma lus pa thams cad gsal bas //
NK103(pe)001:2796: 'dzin rtog bral ba'i chags med yul //
NK103(pe)001:2797: rang rig cir yang mi rtog pa //
NK103(pe)001:2798: ye shes rgyal po ma lus pa de ltar gsal //
NK103(pe)001:2799: cir yang mi rtog bde ba chen por smin //
NK103(pe)001:2800: yang de nyid stong pa chen po phyogs cir yang ma yin mi rtog dmigs su med //
NK103(pe)001:2801: yi ge rnam rtog sems kyi rgyu ba dus gcig tu zad de bral ba //
NK103(pe)001:2802: ye shes rang rig ma lus kun bral ba'i chos nyid du bstan pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:2804: rang rig rnam pa ye shes sku //
NK103(pe)001:2805: bde klong mngon du gsal ba'i rig pa stong nyid kyi thig le //
NK103(pe)001:2806: rang rgyud pa'i phyogs thams cad dang bral bas rtog
NK103(pe)001:2807: med thun mong ma yin pa'i sgyu chen po ye
NK103(pe)001:2808: shes kyi rol pa 'char ba ste //
NK103(pe)001:2809: rnam dag sgyu ma'i ye shes klong //
NK103(pe)001:2810: rang rig ye shes sgyu ma'i ngang //
NK103(pe)001:2811: rang byung sgyu mar mngon sum gsal //
NK103(pe)001:2812: lhun grub sgyu ma ma bcos pa //
NK103(pe)001:2813: bde chen sgyu ma'i rang rig gsal //
NK103(pe)001:2814: sgyu ma de yang rang gi sems lhun grub che ba'i yon tan rin po che //
NK103(pe)001:2815: rang rig nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam par khyab pa rdo rje'i sku //
NK103(pe)001:2816: sgyu ma'i ye shes sprul pa'i tshul //
NK103(pe)001:2817: gsal bas kun gyi don byed nus par khams gsum gyi gzugs brnyan du 'char ba'o //
NK103(pe)001:2818: ma 2h+aa chen po d+ha k+she dag pa'i gshed po
NK103(pe)001:2819: a 1 ti rdzogs pa shin tu rnal 'byor gyi
NK103(pe)001:2820: don a bi k+sha a 3don de bstim pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:2821: gong du bstan pa'i sku gsung thugs 'bru gsum ste
NK103(pe)001:2822: brda de dang ldan pas bstan pa 'khor pa'i re
NK103(pe)001:2823: dogs las skyob pas sngags dang bcas she'o //
NK103(pe)001:2824: rdo rje ni skye med kyi don te sems nyid
NK103(pe)001:2825: rin chen snying gi sbubs su gzhug cing btsal ba'o
NK103(pe)001:2826: // rtog pa'i bar chod kyi rlung ngam snyigs ma
NK103(pe)001:2827: phyir 'phro ba'i rlung dang yang bral bar bya ste
NK103(pe)001:2828: brda ngag dang rig pa skye med du thim pas
NK103(pe)001:2830: dbang de dag kyang dus gang du bstan na bco
NK103(pe)001:2831: rig pa 'char ba dang byin gyis rlobs pa'i dus
NK103(pe)001:2832: yin pas lnga'i tho rengs dus su bstan //
NK103(pe)001:2833: tshul ji ltar sgrub na sngon 'gro bcos ma dang
NK103(pe)001:2834: rnal ba'i dbang bskur ba de nyams su blang tshul
NK103(pe)001:2835: gyis 'phrul tshig gong du bshad pa rnams rig pa'i
NK103(pe)001:2836: ngang gis bsdebs la bstan pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:2838: rgyal bu phru gu 'khyams pa ltar //
NK103(pe)001:2841: rgyal bu 'khyams pa de nong bu'i sa nas 'khor
NK103(pe)001:2842: gyis khyod rgyal po yin zhes brda bkrol te 'khor
NK103(pe)001:2843: skyongs shig par dbang bskur ba'o //
NK103(pe)001:2844: gser dngul zangs lcags kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba bzhi
NK103(pe)001:2845: gling bzhi gsum gnyis gcig la rim par dbang byed
NK103(pe)001:2846: cing // stobs brgyad kyis gling bzhi 'dul zhing dpung
NK103(pe)001:2847: bzhi 'khor bas kun gyi mthu yi bdag por gyur
NK103(pe)001:2849: dpe de bzhin du don skal ldan rigs kyi bu //
NK103(pe)001:2850: rig pa rang snang yin par brda yis don lhun grub tu grol ba thob nas //
NK103(pe)001:2851: don rang bzhin mtshan nyid ma bcos pa brda don
NK103(pe)001:2852: dbral ba'i rim par brgyud nas mngon sum bstan pa'i
NK103(pe)001:2854: khams gsum mngon du gsal ba yi lhun grub sku gsum du snang bas //
NK103(pe)001:2855: sgyu ma'i ye shes lhun grub pa //
NK103(pe)001:2856: gcig grol bas kun grol ba 'phrul gyi man ngag gi thabs bstan par bya zhing //
NK103(pe)001:2857: gang la'ang chags pa med pa ni ye shes kyi klong ste de nyid du blo gzhug go //
NK103(pe)001:2858: bla ma'i thabs kyis ye shes mngon sum du gsal te //
NK103(pe)001:2859: dus ni skad cig dus mtha' lhun gyis grub ces bstan to //
NK103(pe)001:2860: chos thams cad rtsa ba nas ma grub pa'i don
NK103(pe)001:2861: la ci snang ci srid ni sgyu ma dang chu
NK103(pe)001:2862: zla dang smig rgyu ltar nyams thob pas nyam nga
NK103(pe)001:2863: ba med pas bde ba chen po'i klong du gsal
NK103(pe)001:2864: lo // de'i nyams ni mi rtog thabs kyi ye shes 'di //
NK103(pe)001:2865: ma bcos rang byung ji bzhin la //
NK103(pe)001:2866: rnam pa'i ye shes thabs kyis rol //
NK103(pe)001:2867: rgyal ba'i dgongs pa klong brdol ba //
NK103(pe)001:2868: rnam pa'i ye shes bde chen 'di //
NK103(pe)001:2869: mngon du snang yang kun gyis rtogs par dka' la yul ma yin pas mthong ba med do //
NK103(pe)001:2870: rang la rdzogs la grub pa med //
NK103(pe)001:2871: dbang 'di dang bral na skyon dang nyes pa ni rtog pa'i bdag /
NK103(pe)001:2872: mtshan ma'i mdud pa grol mi 'gyur zhes bstan //
NK103(pe)001:2873: des na bde ba chen po spyod pa'i skal ldan nam de'i rigs can gang yin pa des //
NK103(pe)001:2874: rlung dang g.yo ba sprad pa'i lam mtshon pa'i bde
NK103(pe)001:2875: ba chen po'i rgyas btab pa ni gang la gang
NK103(pe)001:2876: gis btab pas de nyid de'i ngo bor gsal ba
NK103(pe)001:2878: mi rtog pa'i ye shes su thams cad lhun gyis grub pa'i //
NK103(pe)001:2879: bde ba chen por rang snang ba'i rol pas bsgrub par bya zhes spyi don du bstan to //
NK103(pe)001:2880: g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba las g.yo ba'i rlung ngo //
NK103(pe)001:2881: de dang mnyam du gnas kyang rtog pas bslad pas mi g.yo ba mi mthong ba yi //
NK103(pe)001:2882: stong pa dang bde ba bar ma chad pas rgyun dang bcas par gsal ba'i ye shes te //
NK103(pe)001:2883: de nyid bde ba chen po'i ngo bo las mi g.yo'i klungs su dbab ce'o //
NK103(pe)001:2884: de yang rlung gi khyad par ni rlung ni rnam pa gnyis yin te //
NK103(pe)001:2885: de nyid gang zhe na rig pa'i sems kyi rlung dang bems po rgyu ba'i rlung //
NK103(pe)001:2886: bems po la ni rnam gsum ste //
NK103(pe)001:2887: srog 'dzin pa ni gnas pa don gyi rlung ste /
NK103(pe)001:2888: snying gi dwangs ma'i dwangs ma a thung la brten
NK103(pe)001:2889: nas mi rgyu ba srog dbang dang mnyam du gnas
NK103(pe)001:2890: shes pa'i rten byed pa nyid dang //
NK103(pe)001:2891: tshe'i dus byed tsam na dwangs ma dang bcas nas
NK103(pe)001:2892: rgyu ba de rnam par lus kyi gzungs 'dzin par
NK103(pe)001:2893: byed cing der bcud dang 'dres par byed pa ni
NK103(pe)001:2894: dwangs ma'i rlung kun d+har na gnas shing dal bar
NK103(pe)001:2895: rgyu ba dang // snyigs ma ni phyir rgyu zhing
NK103(pe)001:2896: nang du 'jug lus kyi dwangs snyigs 'byed cing 'byung
NK103(pe)001:2898: lte ba nas gyen du snying mgrin dbang po kun rgyu bar byed /
NK103(pe)001:2899: des phye ba'i snyigs ma mchis snabs la sogs pa dang /
NK103(pe)001:2900: dwangs ma dbang por gyur nas mthong ba la sogs
NK103(pe)001:2901: par byed pa dang lte ba nas thur du rgyu
NK103(pe)001:2902: ba'i dwangs mas bde ba skyed snyigs ma gshang gci
NK103(pe)001:2904: rig pa'i rlung chos nyid gsal la rtog pa med pas gcig yin te //
NK103(pe)001:2905: de la brten pa'i bye brag rnam shes brgyad dam
NK103(pe)001:2906: dran rtog dpag tu med pa nyid du snang ba'o
NK103(pe)001:2907: // dwangs ma'i rlung ni 'pho ba gcig gis kun d+har ma'i nang du rgyu'o //
NK103(pe)001:2908: 'phen pa gcig ni rtsa'i phyi rol dang rlung phyir rgyu'o //
NK103(pe)001:2909: shes pa rten pa ste phyi nang gi las rlung zin par gyur pa'i dus na //
NK103(pe)001:2910: phyir rgyu ba'i dran rig kun kyang nang du thim pas rig pa zin pa yin //
NK103(pe)001:2911: rlung zin cing thim pa'i thabs kyi byin rlabs rang
NK103(pe)001:2912: rgyud pa'i shes pa 'gags nas ye shes rang 'bar
NK103(pe)001:2914: dran rig bde ba chen po'i ye shes rang snang gi rol pa'i sku ru snang ngo //
NK103(pe)001:2915: rang snang la 'bad rtsol dang bral ba'i bde chen las //
NK103(pe)001:2916: lhun grub kyi thabs te de la ma yengs par brten nas 'grub //
NK103(pe)001:2917: pa'i ye shes rang rig de phyogs 'dzin las 'phags pas chen po che //
NK103(pe)001:2918: de rtogs na ngang gis mi ldog pa ni thabs kyi mchog go //
NK103(pe)001:2919: skal ldan tshe 'di nyid la ye shes rgyal po thob par 'dod pa des //
NK103(pe)001:2920: zla phyed dam nyin mtshan gcig gi bar las 'pho
NK103(pe)001:2921: ba brtsis pa'i thun mtshams thung ngu bcu gnyis kyis
NK103(pe)001:2922: // bcad la bsgoms la brtson pas dang du blangs
NK103(pe)001:2923: na ye shes rig pa brtan pa'i phur pa thebs
NK103(pe)001:2924: // // rtog pa gzhom ste zhi pa'i rlung dang bral ba nyid kyis rang log par 'gyur ro //
NK103(pe)001:2925: 'dod pa lnga la dmigs pa'i yul thams cad dang bral //
NK103(pe)001:2926: bde ba mthar phyin pa'i dus kyi thun mtshams ni nyin mtshan gcig gis kyang 'grub tu rung //
NK103(pe)001:2927: bde ba'i ye shes 'phro 'du med pas thig le'i dngos grub zag med thob par 'gyur //
NK103(pe)001:2928: snang srid bde ba chen por ji ltar bsgyur ba'ang 'thob //
NK103(pe)001:2929: thabs 'di ni thar pa'i bde gzhan las 'phags pas lam mchog ste //
NK103(pe)001:2930: rgyu nyid 'bras bur nges pas rgyu 'bras rim pa med pa'i mthar phyin yin no //
NK103(pe)001:2931: dang po rlung la bslab pa ni phyi nang du
NK103(pe)001:2932: rgyu ba rags pa'i rlung 'di nyid thabs kyis bzung
NK103(pe)001:2933: ste // nyin mo dang mtshan gyi dus gnyis la //
NK103(pe)001:2934: nyi khri chig stong drug brgya rgyu 'byung bzhi'i rlung
NK103(pe)001:2935: ste g.yas g.yon gnyis ka nas rgyu ba'i grangs kyang
NK103(pe)001:2936: dabye'o // 'pho ba'i thun mtshams bcu gnyis yin te //
NK103(pe)001:2937: dwangs ma'i bde ba chos nyid kyi rlung kun d+har 'pho ba ni rgyu ba lan gcig yin te //
NK103(pe)001:2938: rnam rtog 'khor ba'i rlung snyigs ma bcu gcig phal cher 'tsho bar rgyu /
NK103(pe)001:2939: 'pho ba yin te bcu gnyis so //
NK103(pe)001:2940: snyigs ma de thabs kyis dwangs ma kun+d+ha ma'i 'pho bar thim zhing phyir mi spro par bya //
NK103(pe)001:2941: rlung de ni bsgom pa'i rim pa 'di yin te //
NK103(pe)001:2942: ye shes nyid mtshon pas gzha' tshon lta bu'i dbyibs reng bu'am gong bu 'od sna lngas 'khrigs pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:2943: rang rig bde ba chen po'i ye shes rtsa mdud
NK103(pe)001:2944: rlung dang bde bas bkrol te rlung dang bde ba'i
NK103(pe)001:2946: khams gsum ma lus ye shes chen po'i sku //
NK103(pe)001:2947: ra 'gyur ba'i phyir dang du blang /
NK103(pe)001:2948: mi g.yo ba ye shes kyi rtags thig le kha
NK103(pe)001:2949: dog lnga pa nor bu'am sran ma lta bu dgu'i
NK103(pe)001:2950: rgyu bar byas te nang du thim na 'ja' yal
NK103(pe)001:2951: ba ltar stong phyir rgyu na tshon skud 'ja' brkyang
NK103(pe)001:2953: nang du brdubs pas rkyal pa bus pa ltar //
NK103(pe)001:2954: phyir spros pas de nyid gshobs pa ltar //
NK103(pe)001:2955: ye shes kyi rlung gis dran rtog dang rlung stong par bya'o //
NK103(pe)001:2956: a ni rlung stong par thim pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:2957: mgrin pa'i pad 'das nas ldang gi bar //
NK103(pe)001:2958: kun d+har mar zhugs nas g.yo med chos nyid rang
NK103(pe)001:2959: byung mi shig pa'i thig ler thim par gzung bar
NK103(pe)001:2960: bya // rlung zin pa de nas rlung dang bde
NK103(pe)001:2961: bar 'dres pa thig les gang ba'i rtags 'byung ste
NK103(pe)001:2962: bya // // 'du ba bzhi dang bral zhing khams
NK103(pe)001:2963: snyoms rang lus bde bas gang zhing rgyas pa dang
NK103(pe)001:2964: bya // // // nyams zag pa dang lci ba
NK103(pe)001:2965: dang bral nas lus yang bas mkha' la 'dug pa'o
NK103(pe)001:2966: bya // // // // lus la tshor ba thams cad bde ba chen por skye //
NK103(pe)001:2967: dran rtog gi rgyu ba thams cad ye shes su gsal zhing bye brag ma nor bar shes pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:2968: rags pa de las su rung nas bde ba 'pho ba yi //
NK103(pe)001:2969: phra ba'i ye shes rlung la 'jug la bslab par bya ste //
NK103(pe)001:2970: 'dir phra ba'am dal ba'i rlung cig 'byung ba de
NK103(pe)001:2971: nyid nang du bsring ba dang brtag pa'i thabs kyis
NK103(pe)001:2972: ye shes gnas pa dgug pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:2973: dper na rags pa smad nas gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung //
NK103(pe)001:2974: de yang rig bya dang bcas par rtsa kun d+har
NK103(pe)001:2975: ma cha phra ba'i rlung sngar rgyu ba bzhin du
NK103(pe)001:2976: dal bar // gsang ba'i pad+ma ni lte ba nyid
NK103(pe)001:2977: de de nas kun d+har mar zhugs nas thig le
NK103(pe)001:2978: snying po la thim par bya'o //
NK103(pe)001:2979: gyen rgyu'i rlung phyir 'phro ba ni na sa sna ste 'dus pa'i lte ba sna rtse la /
NK103(pe)001:2980: sna sgor thig le shin tu phra ba nyungs 'bru
NK103(pe)001:2981: tsam dal zhing 'jam pas dal ba de nyid rig
NK103(pe)001:2983: rang byung ye shes rlung gis ni lhun grub ngo bo skyed pa'i phyir //
NK103(pe)001:2984: rlung dang thig ler bcas pa bde ba chen po'i kun d+har mar 'jug cing rgyu ba bya //
NK103(pe)001:2985: rlung gi thun nyin mtshan gyi phyed phyed kyi bar dag tu //
NK103(pe)001:2986: stobs kyis mi 'pho bar thabs dang ting nge'i stobs kyis bsdam bar nus 'gyur na //
NK103(pe)001:2987: yun je ring je ring de nas rgyu ba med par bslab //
NK103(pe)001:2988: ste de'i thabs ni lus bsrang lus sems bde ba'i bag yangs kyis 'dug la //
NK103(pe)001:2989: lce rtse la dang rkan la h'u du bsams la de gnyis mtshams sbyar bar bya ste //
NK103(pe)001:2990: gsang ba'i lte bar ni lte ba'i nang bum pa lta bu la ting nges dmigs par byas te //
NK103(pe)001:2991: dbugs nang du rngub pa dang phyir 'byung ba yun
NK103(pe)001:2992: ring du bzhag pa dang ma thub na'ang rim gyis
NK103(pe)001:2993: mgrin par / de ma thub na sna'i nang du /
NK103(pe)001:2994: sna rtser gzung bar bya te //
NK103(pe)001:2995: des kyang ma thub na dal bar phyir gtang bar bya'o //
NK103(pe)001:2996: b+ha ga bde ba rgyas par de nas phyi ma la yang de bzhin du gzung bar bya'o //
NK103(pe)001:2997: lus gzungs ni rlung phyi nang du rgyu ba can no //
NK103(pe)001:2998: dbugs dang bcud du bsre ba gong du bshad zin 'dres //
NK103(pe)001:2999: bzung bas zin te las su rung na de la mthun pa'i rtags 'byung ste //
NK103(pe)001:3000: ji ltar rgyu ba dal ba'i reg pas bde ba
NK103(pe)001:3001: skyed de des lus kyi zungs rgyas par gyur te
NK103(pe)001:3002: // de lus dang spyod yul ma lus pa bde ba chen po'i ye shes su skye'o //
NK103(pe)001:3003: de nas na sa sna'i sgo na rgyu ba dang
NK103(pe)001:3004: mig dang rna ba'i dbang po'i lam nas rgyu ba
NK103(pe)001:3005: na ba spu bu ga nas rgyu ba la bslab
NK103(pe)001:3006: bo // de nyid gang du yang gtang nus pa
NK103(pe)001:3007: ni rlung kun du spro nus pa nang du 'jug
NK103(pe)001:3009: zla phyed du nang du ma bsdams kyang 'du ba ldang med cing khams la mi gnod par //
NK103(pe)001:3012: rlung dang thig le chen po las byung ba'i bcud
NK103(pe)001:3013: kyis lus kyi dbang po'i sgo'i lam nas drangs kyang
NK103(pe)001:3014: 'drongs la de dag kyang rang rig pa'i ngang tu
NK103(pe)001:3015: // ye shes chen po ru 'dres nas bde ba 'bar bar 'gyur ro //
NK103(pe)001:3016: de ltar de nyid nus pa brtan pa'i stobs kyis thig le ma lus 'dren //
NK103(pe)001:3017: yul sems kun rlung dang thig ler thim pa la
NK103(pe)001:3018: bskal pa du ma'i yun du dbugs gnas pa dang
NK103(pe)001:3020: kyang snang ba dang rlung du 'dres /
NK103(pe)001:3021: rlung bde ba'i thig ler 'dres de ni rig pa
NK103(pe)001:3022: skye med du 'dres pas bdag gi lus dang khams
NK103(pe)001:3023: la gnod pa med par bsdam pa'ang 'grub bo //
NK103(pe)001:3024: rlung sgom pa 'di ni thabs chen gsang ba'i lam //
NK103(pe)001:3025: bde ba chen pos rgyas 'debs pas //
NK103(pe)001:3026: rol pa'i klungs su phebs pa yin //
NK103(pe)001:3027: thun mong gi rlung las su rung ba de nas
NK103(pe)001:3028: phyi'i bde ba'i rig pa'i rlung gsum dbyer med pa'i
NK103(pe)001:3029: bdag nyid kyang lus kyi rtsol ba'i rgyu rkyen bral
NK103(pe)001:3031: bde ba chen por rang snang yang gzhan du ma spros pa nyid 'i thig ler gsal //
NK103(pe)001:3032: ji snyed pa'i chos sems nyid du 'dus te de'i
NK103(pe)001:3033: rang gi mtshan nyid ma bcos pa'i chos nyid de
NK103(pe)001:3034: // de ni bde ba la phyogs ris med pa'i 'od kyis rang lus gsal //
NK103(pe)001:3035: bas bsgom zhing bsgrub tu med de rang byung gi
NK103(pe)001:3036: ye shes bde ba'i phur pa thebs pas dus gsum
NK103(pe)001:3038: de'i yon tan 'bras bu phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad kun //
NK103(pe)001:3039: ye shes chen po'i 'od kyis khyab //
NK103(pe)001:3040: ye shes sku yi 'od la bzhugs //
NK103(pe)001:3041: rang byung gsung gi gzer la rol //
NK103(pe)001:3042: lhun grub bde ba chen po'i thugs //
NK103(pe)001:3043: mi 'gyur ye shes klungs su babs //
NK103(pe)001:3044: de nas bde chen 'khor lo bskor //
NK103(pe)001:3045: rang byung ye shes rnal ma'i lus //
NK103(pe)001:3046: rang gi mtshan nyid ma bcos pa //
NK103(pe)001:3047: bde ba mngon sum thig ler shar //
NK103(pe)001:3048: bde ba chen po rang nyid grub //
NK103(pe)001:3049: ma btsal rdzogs pa'i ye shes sku //
NK103(pe)001:3050: de bas na che ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho dang
NK103(pe)001:3051: rlabs ltar rdzogs pas 'bad rtsol med par gnas pa
NK103(pe)001:3052: / de ltar 'gyur ba med pa la bsgom du
NK103(pe)001:3053: med kyang ma yengs pa'i nyams bkra gsal bde ba
NK103(pe)001:3054: / chen po'i gzugs // rang rig sgyu ma ye shes gsal //
NK103(pe)001:3057: lam bgrod pa'i rtsol bas 'jug gnas rten //
NK103(pe)001:3058: bsti gnas tsam du bstan pa yin //
NK103(pe)001:3059: de yang bus pa'i sa pa ste //
NK103(pe)001:3060: mos pa spyod pa'i sa pas drod thob nas //
NK103(pe)001:3061: ms rtse gcig pa'i dmigs pa thob par bsgom par bya //
NK103(pe)001:3062: ste gang la goms shing las su rung ba de bzhin du dngos po ma lus pa la //
NK103(pe)001:3063: ma yengs pa'i dran pa'i thag pas gdags byas te zhe'o //
NK103(pe)001:3064: de nas rim pa nas rim par 'phar ba'i man ngag rang byung bden pa'i lung phog ste //
NK103(pe)001:3065: spyod yul zhi ba'i phyag rgyas gdab //
NK103(pe)001:3066: gang 'dod de yi lung gsal bya //
NK103(pe)001:3067: las dang po pa'i gang zag gang zhig nyon mongs
NK103(pe)001:3068: pa lnga dang dbang po che 'bring gang dang ldan
NK103(pe)001:3069: par gyur pa yis bstan te //
NK103(pe)001:3070: gang zag de la yang de dang mthun pa'i des
NK103(pe)001:3071: bstan na 'bras bu 'grub cing smin par 'gyur ba'ang
NK103(pe)001:3072: // de nyid dang mthun pas de yi phyag rgya can //
NK103(pe)001:3073: gang zag de ni mthun pa'i thabs de med na grol bar mi 'gyur //
NK103(pe)001:3074: thabs gang gis bstan pa 'di ni rig pa de yi thabs chen yin te //
NK103(pe)001:3075: dper na pad+ma can gyi gser gling na gnas pa'i srin mo pad+ma can /
NK103(pe)001:3078: 'od ldan ma la sogs pa'am ngam //
NK103(pe)001:3079: sha za'i gling sha za mo dur long 'khrigs pa
NK103(pe)001:3080: can yod de'i gzugs brnyan mthong yang 'gro ba phal
NK103(pe)001:3081: pa skrag cing 'bros par 'gyur zhing brgyal bar 'gyur
NK103(pe)001:3082: la phyis de'i rnam pa dran pas kyang sdug bsngal
NK103(pe)001:3083: drag po skye'o // de bzhin du dga' ba'i gling
NK103(pe)001:3084: 0du phyin te dang 'khrug pa'i gling 0du phyin te
NK103(pe)001:3085: drag po skye'o // // gnas pas yid bde ba 0dang zhe sdang 0skye ba ltar //
NK103(pe)001:3086: 'gro ba sems can las dang po pa'i skal ldan
NK103(pe)001:3087: la thabs gang gis bstan pa de ltar smin par
NK103(pe)001:3089: drug gam thun mtshams bcu gnyis gang 'tsham par su //
NK103(pe)001:3090: thabs dang man ngag thob nas 'bad pa'i rtsol bas sgrub par bya'o //
NK103(pe)001:3091: de ltar bsgrubs pa de nas rang byung bde 'di
NK103(pe)001:3092: dag ni snying po de kho na'i don rtogs pa
NK103(pe)001:3093: la go sla bas bshad pa ma byas so //
NK103(pe)001:3096: spyod yul thams cad man+da la //
NK103(pe)001:3097: thams cad ye shes rnam par gsal //
NK103(pe)001:3098: khyab gdal chen po'i ngang la rdzogs //
NK103(pe)001:3099: ye shes rig pa'i klong du chub //
NK103(pe)001:3100: mkha' ltar khyab pas mu mtha' med //
NK103(pe)001:3101: skye 'gro rdo rje'i sa ru chub //
NK103(pe)001:3102: ma bcos thig le mngon sangs rgyas //
NK103(pe)001:3103: rang byung snying po rdo rje'i sku //
NK103(pe)001:3104: yon tan lhun grub rdo rje'i rgyan //
NK103(pe)001:3105: bkod pa med par rang la rdzogs //
NK103(pe)001:3106: khams gsum bde ba'i longs spyod zhing //
NK103(pe)001:3107: rin chen lhun grub byang chub zhing //
NK103(pe)001:3108: rgyal ba'i dgongs pa sems kyi gter //
NK103(pe)001:3109: ma lus 'dus pa'i thig le can //
NK103(pe)001:3110: bdag nyid sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos //
NK103(pe)001:3111: rdo rje rgyal po kun gyi mes //
NK103(pe)001:3112: thams cad rdzogs pa'i bde chen po //
NK103(pe)001:3113: log rtogs sems kyi rnam grangs dang //
NK103(pe)001:3114: rnam brtags dngos po tha dad pa //
NK103(pe)001:3115: lhun grub bde ba'i klong na gsal //
NK103(pe)001:3116: ma 'dres gsal ba'i bde chen po //
NK103(pe)001:3117: gang snga ma snang ba'i dran rtog nyon mongs pa
NK103(pe)001:3118: thams cad de dang gang da ltar gi gang ma
NK103(pe)001:3120: yul de dang shes pa de nyid gnyis ka'i ngo
NK103(pe)001:3121: bo de rig pa phyogs ris med pa de ru
NK103(pe)001:3122: // thun mong gi spang bya'i chos de nyid gang
NK103(pe)001:3123: zag dbang po yang rab de la ji snyed pa'i
NK103(pe)001:3125: chos nyid ma bcos de nyid la gdod nas dran
NK103(pe)001:3126: rtog dang rig pa de snang ba'i dus de na
NK103(pe)001:3127: ma bcos pa'i de bzhin nyid de yi rang bzhin
NK103(pe)001:3128: pas // de kho na nyid rtogs pa'i gang zag
NK103(pe)001:3129: de la ni chos thams cad ma btsal bar lhun
NK103(pe)001:3130: pas // gyis grub pa'o // phyogs 'dzin ma lus
NK103(pe)001:3131: pa thams cad rnam par dag pa mngon sum du
NK103(pe)001:3132: pas // gyis grub pa'o // gsal pa'i // rig
NK103(pe)001:3133: pa rang byung gi ye shes la 'dod pa rdzogs
NK103(pe)001:3134: pas // gyis grub pa'o // gsal pa'i // pas // mtshon te rlung la goms nas /
NK103(pe)001:3135: dang po'i thun mtshams lo gcig zla ba bcu gnyis sam //
NK103(pe)001:3136: gdon mi za bar zla ba bcu yis 'grub //
NK103(pe)001:3137: zla 1ba la zla phyed 0la zla ba lnga yi zhag /
NK103(pe)001:3138: rnam 1pa mtshan 0nyid des brtsis pa 'dod rnams la //
NK103(pe)001:3139: rgyu dang bral ba'i rig pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa mngon sum par gsal pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:3140: bde ba chen po la bslab tshul ni rim gyis cig car goms par bya //
NK103(pe)001:3141: spong len 'dzin rtog re dogs dang //
NK103(pe)001:3142: bag med gtsang sme log sred pa //
NK103(pe)001:3143: grub mtha' log rtog 'dod rtsol dang //
NK103(pe)001:3144: grags pa'i tha snyad g.yo 'phan pa //
NK103(pe)001:3145: rang byung rtogs pa'i rgyal pos thogs med par //
NK103(pe)001:3146: spyod pa rgya mtsho gang yang ma spangs par ci bder spyod //
NK103(pe)001:3147: gang ltar spyod kyang rdzogs longs spyod //
NK103(pe)001:3148: lus ngag bya ba sgo gsum gyi spyod pa ma lus pa //
NK103(pe)001:3149: rang gi nus pa lus dang gdul bya blo ngo gang la dga' ba yi rim pa ltar //
NK103(pe)001:3150: nyams par mi 'gyur thabs kyis spyad //
NK103(pe)001:3151: rang byung spyod pa'i rgyal por bya //
NK103(pe)001:3152: khyung chen nam mkhar 'phur ba bzhin //
NK103(pe)001:3153: thabs kyis zin nas goms na lus gang la yang chags med nyam nga'i sems med cing //
NK103(pe)001:3154: gnas med gnas la gnas par bya //
NK103(pe)001:3155: rig pa rang byung mkha' ltar khyab par 'gyur bas //
NK103(pe)001:3156: skye med lus ni rdo rje'i sku //
NK103(pe)001:3157: bde ba'i thabs ni bsgrub par bya zhes gdams pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:3158: bems po'i rlung nyid lung bstan na //
NK103(pe)001:3159: snyigs ma'i rlung bsdus nas dwangs ma'i rlung rtsa kun d+har na gnas pa la bstim /
NK103(pe)001:3161: lus zungs kyi rlung ste srog mi shigs pa'i thig le la gtim par bya //
NK103(pe)001:3162: de ltar snyigs ma dang dwangs ma'i lus zungs dang
NK103(pe)001:3163: dwangs ma lnga'i bde ba'i bcud du 'dres nas mi
NK103(pe)001:3164: g.yo ba chos nyid kyi rlung //
NK103(pe)001:3165: snying gi srog mi shigs pa'i thig le las mi
NK103(pe)001:3166: g.yo ba'i rlung dang gcig tu 'gyur nas phyir mi
NK103(pe)001:3168: 'du ba bzhi dang bral za ba'i kham dang bral
NK103(pe)001:3169: gyur nas 'chi med rdo rje'i lus su 'gyur ro
NK103(pe)001:3170: // bslab pa'i rim pa thun mong bdud rtsi lnga'i
NK103(pe)001:3171: cho ga'i sbyor bas rlung gcad cing bde ba skyed
NK103(pe)001:3172: pa dang 'o ma ka ra nye shing la sogs
NK103(pe)001:3173: pa'i zas la rten te zas dang rlung du bcas
NK103(pe)001:3174: pa je phra la bslab bo //
NK103(pe)001:3175: snying la gnas pa'i thig le 'khyil pa dang mngon shes rig pa'i sgo phye nas //
NK103(pe)001:3176: srog gzungs kyi rlung dang 'brel pa nang na gnas
NK103(pe)001:3177: shing rgyu ba la thim nas bcu dang 'dres par
NK103(pe)001:3178: gyur te bcud des lus spyir rgyas shing khyab par
NK103(pe)001:3179: gyur te // rin chen rdzing ni lte ba'i 'og sor bzhi'o //
NK103(pe)001:3180: de'i 'og gi ngan rgyu'i lam ste rgyu zhing 'jug pas lam mo //
NK103(pe)001:3181: bu ga bshang gci gnyis kyi sgo yan chad du'o //
NK103(pe)001:3182: rdo rje ni stong pa bde ba'i thig le til
NK103(pe)001:3183: 'bru'i gzugs su dbyer med par 'dres pas 'khyil pa'o
NK103(pe)001:3184: // ye shes rig pa rlung gnas pa rgyu ba dang khu ba kun d+ha khrag nyi ma'o //
NK103(pe)001:3185: de rnams kyi bcud ni dwangs ma 'khyil pa bde ba'i bcud //
NK103(pe)001:3186: yongs su 'khyil te 'dres nas rang gi nyams bde
NK103(pe)001:3187: ba chen pos gang nas rang 'bar ba'i gzugs so
NK103(pe)001:3188: // de nyid pas na snyigs ma bral ba dang
NK103(pe)001:3189: rgyu ba chad pa dang zag pa bzhi zad pa
NK103(pe)001:3190: dang mi 'chi ba thob pa dus gcig go //
NK103(pe)001:3191: nas zag pa med pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:3192: de yan chad khams kyi zas la mi rten pas rang byung bde ba chen po'i zas //
NK103(pe)001:3193: 'chi ba med pa'i mi 'gyur bde ba lhun grub che //
NK103(pe)001:3194: thob nas rang byung lhun grub sangs rgyas nyid tu //
NK103(pe)001:3195: dus skad cig de la myur du bsgrub par bya'o //
NK103(pe)001:3196: 'di ni 'grub pa'i dus rab 'bring thun mtshams kyis //
NK103(pe)001:3197: nges par grub ste gzhan du na //
NK103(pe)001:3198: zla ba bzhi yis gdon mi za'o //
NK103(pe)001:3199: 'di ni ngo mtshar ya mtshan gyi //
NK103(pe)001:3200: rmad byung thabs kyi 'phrul chen yin //
NK103(pe)001:3201: bde gshegs ma lus dgongs pa yi //
NK103(pe)001:3202: rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs kyi bcud //
NK103(pe)001:3203: rdo rje zam pa'i rna brgyud 'di //
NK103(pe)001:3204: bstan pa kun gyi nying khu yi //
NK103(pe)001:3205: bka' yi rgyal por phyung ba ste //
NK103(pe)001:3206: rgyud kyi rgyal po lung gi mdo //
NK103(pe)001:3207: man ngag sems kyi mdo 'dzin pa //
NK103(pe)001:3209: rgyal po mngon du ston pa yi //
NK103(pe)001:3210: ngo mtshar 'phrul gyi lde mig yin //
NK103(pe)001:3211: thabs rgyal 'di dang bral ba yi //
NK103(pe)001:3212: skal ngan rnams ni mun par ltung //
NK103(pe)001:3213: bskal pa bye ba mtha' klas par //
NK103(pe)001:3215: 'di ni dngos grub ya mtshan gyi //
NK103(pe)001:3216: mngon sum 'phrul gyi lde mig ste //
NK103(pe)001:3217: dus matha'i skad cig de nyid la //
NK103(pe)001:3218: gang yin de nyid mngon du ston //
NK103(pe)001:3219: rang byung nyag gcig mngon sum las //
NK103(pe)001:3220: 'di las gzhan pa'i shes pa med //
NK103(pe)001:3221: man ngag bstan pas rgyal ba'i gral du 'jog /'di ni tshegs dang bral ba ste //
NK103(pe)001:3222: thun mtshams gsum dang ldan pa yis //
NK103(pe)001:3223: rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid du grub //
NK103(pe)001:3224: gzhan du bstan pa'i mtshan nyid kyis //
NK103(pe)001:3225: nges par gdon mi za bar 'grub //
NK103(pe)001:3226: rgyal thabs spyi blugs tshangs pa'i dbang 'di kun gyi yul min pas /
NK103(pe)001:3231: spos chen po dgu rim gyis byugs la dar dang
NK103(pe)001:3232: za 'og gis btums te rin po che'i za ma
NK103(pe)001:3233: tog tu bcug la rgya bdun gyis btab la sba
NK103(pe)001:3234: ba'i gnas ni brag dang chu la gzhag /
NK103(pe)001:3235: srog dang bral ba'i kha bzhin bsdam //
NK103(pe)001:3236: 'di rnams ldan pa'i sems can ni //
NK103(pe)001:3237: khams gsum byugs kyang gcig 'ga' ldan //
NK103(pe)001:3238: 'di ni srog bzhin bral ba yin //
NK103(pe)001:3239: grags pa'i chos brgyad gtsor bzhag nas //
NK103(pe)001:3240: nyams pa'i sems kyis 'phel gyur na //
NK103(pe)001:3241: 'di la rdo rje dmyal ba'i gnas //
NK103(pe)001:3242: nges 'gyur the tsom med par nges //
NK103(pe)001:3243: des na bstan pa'i bka' dang bstun //
NK103(pe)001:3244: bka' yi bcud bsdus thugs kyi nying khu 'di //
NK103(pe)001:3245: lag na rdo rjes rna brgyud sems la gtim //
NK103(pe)001:3246: rdo rje zam nas 'phrul gyi lung bcu phog /
NK103(pe)001:3257: kha cig 'bru dgu thabs kyi lung yang zer ro //
NK103(pe)001:3258: lung bstan thob cing skal ba dang ldan pa'i gang zag rnams kyi sems la thums zhes gdams pa'o //
NK103(pe)001:3259: rna brgyud spyi blugs tshangs pa'i dbang //
NK103(pe)001:3260: rdzogs so////rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal seng ge 'od can dang /
NK103(pe)001:3261: dge slong ga 'jag stang rnam par snang mdzad kyi
NK103(pe)001:3262: zhal gzigs pa des yul d+ha he na'i 'du khang
NK103(pe)001:3263: du bsgyur ba'o // se'i ban+d+he 'byung ldan gyis /
